h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ pañcakanipātassa ^a^V3.0001^ea^ ^a^M3.0001^ea^ ^a^P3.0222^ea^ paṭhame sattannaṃ sekhānaṃ balānīti ^b^sekhabalāni^eb^. saddhābalādīsu assaddhiye na kampatīti ^b^saddhābalaṃ^eb^. ahirike na kampatīti ^b^hirībalaṃ^eb^. anottappe na kampatīti ^b^ottappabalaṃ^eb^. kosajje na kampatīti ^b^vīriyabalaṃ^eb^. avijjāya na kampatīti ^b^paññābalaṃ. tasmā^eb^ti yasmā imāni sattannaṃ sekhānaṃ balāni, tasmā.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^V3.0002^ea^ ^b^kāyaduccaritenā^eb^tiādīsu upayogatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, hirīyitabbāni kāyaduccaritādīni hirīyati jigucchatīti attho. ottappaniddese hetvatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, kāyaduccaritādīhi ottappassa hetubhūtehi ottappati bhāyatīti attho.

[03] ^b^āraddhavīriyo^eb^ti ^a^M3.0002^ea^ paggahitavīriyo anosakkitamānaso. ^b^pahānāyā^eb^ti pahānatthāya. ^b^upasampadāyā^eb^ti paṭilābhatthāya. ^b^thāmavā^eb^ti vīriyathāmena samannāgato. ^b^daḷhaparakkamo^eb^ti thiraparakkamo. ^b^anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesū^eb^ti kusalesu dhammesu anoropitadhuro anosakkitavīriyo.

[03] ^b^udayatthagāminiyā^eb^ti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayavayagāminiyā udayañca vayañca paṭivijjhituṃ samatthāya. ^b^paññāya^eb^ ^a^P3.0223^ea^ ^b^samannāgato^eb^ti vipassanāpaññāya ceva maggapaññāya ca samaṅgibhūto. ^b^ariyāyā^eb^ti vikkhambhanavasena ca samucchedavasena ca kilesehi ārakā ṭhitāya parisuddhāya. ^b^nibbedhikāyā^eb^ti sā ca abhinivijjhanato nibbedhikāti vuccati, tāya samannāgatoti attho. tattha maggapaññā samucchedavasena anibbiddhapubbaṃ appadālitapubbaṃ lobhakkhandhaṃ dosakkhandhaṃ mohakkhandhaṃ nibbijjhati padāletīti nibbedhikā, vipassanāpaññā tadaṅgavasena nibbedhikā, maggapaññāya paṭilābhasaṃvattanato tabbipassanā nibbedhikāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā^eb^ti idhāpi maggapaññā sammā hetunā nayena vaṭṭadukkhañca kilesadukkhañca khepayamānā gacchatīti sammā dukkhakkhayagāminī nāma, vipassanāpaññā tadaṅgavasena vaṭṭadukkhañca kilesadukkhañca khepayamānā gacchatīti dukkhakkhayagāminī. dukkhakkhayagāminiyā vā maggapaññāya paṭilābhāya saṃvattanatopesā dukkhakkhayagāminīti veditabbā. iti imasmiṃ sutte pañca balāni missakāneva kathitāni, tathā pañcame.
[03] 6^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^akusalassa samāpattī^eb^ti akusaladhammassa samāpajjanā, tena saddhiṃ samaṅgibhāvoti attho. ^b^pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhati.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^V3.0003^ea^ ^b^kāmesu laḷitā^eb^ti vatthukāmakilesakāmesu laḷitā abhiratā. ^b^asitabyābhaṅgi^eb^nti ^a^P3.0224^ea^ tiṇalāyanāsitañceva tiṇavahanakājañca. ^b^kulaputto^eb^ti ācārakulaputto. ^b^ohāyā^eb^ti pahāya. ^b^alaṃ^eb^ ^a^M3.0003^ea^ ^b^vacanāyā^eb^ti yuttaṃ vacanāya. ^b^labbhā^eb^ti sulabhā sakkā labhituṃ. ^b^hīnā kāmā^eb^ti pañcannaṃ nīcakulānaṃ kāmā. ^b^majjhimā kāmā^eb^ti majjhimasattānaṃ kāmā. ^b^paṇītā kāmā^eb^ti rājarājamahāmattānaṃ kāmā. ^b^kāmātveva saṅkhaṃ gacchantī^eb^ti kāmanavasena kāmetabbavasena ca kāmāicceva saṅkhaṃ gacchanti. ^b^vuddho hotī^eb^ti mahallako hoti. ^b^alaṃpañño^eb^ti yuttapañño. ^b^attagutto^eb^ti attanāva gutto rakkhito, attānaṃ vā gopetuṃ rakkhituṃ samattho. ^b^nālaṃ pamādāyā^eb^ti na yutto pamajjituṃ. ^b^saddhāya akataṃ hotī^eb^ti yaṃ saddhāya kusalesu dhammesu kātuṃ yuttaṃ, taṃ na kataṃ hoti. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^anapekkho dānāhaṃ, bhikkhave, tasmiṃ bhikkhusmiṃ homī^eb^ti evaṃ saddhādīhi kātabbaṃ katvāva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhite tasmiṃ puggale anapekkho homīti dasseti. imasmiṃ sutte sotāpattimaggo kathito.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^saddhamme^eb^ti sāsanasaddhamme. ^b^assaddho^eb^ti okappanasaddhāya ca pakkhandanasaddhāya cāti dvīhipi saddhāhi virahito. ^b^cavati nappatiṭṭhātī^eb^ti imasmiṃ sāsane guṇehi cavati, patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti. iti imasmiṃ sutte appatiṭṭhānañca patiṭṭhānañca kathitaṃ.
[03] 9^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^P3.0225^ea^ nāssa gāravoti ^b^agāravo^eb^. nāssa patissoti ^b^appatisso,^eb^ ajeṭṭhako anīcavutti. sesamettha purimasadisameva.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^V3.0004^ea^ ^b^abhabbo^eb^ti abhājanaṃ. ^b^vuddhi^eb^nti vaḍḍhiṃ. ^b^virūḷhi^eb^nti virūḷhamūlatāya niccalabhāvaṃ. ^b^vepulla^eb^nti mahantabhāvaṃ. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] sekhabalavaggo paṭhamo.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa ^a^M3.0004^ea^ paṭhame ^b^pubbāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ananussutesu dhammesū^eb^ti ahaṃ, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu catūsu saccadhammesu. ^b^abhiññāvosānapāramippatto paṭijānāmī^eb^ti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi soḷasavidhassa kiccassa karaṇena abhijānitvā vosānapāramiṃ sabbesaṃ kiccānaṃ niṭṭhitattā katakiccabhāvaṃ pāraṃ patto paṭijānāmīti mahābodhipallaṅke attano āgamanīyaguṇaṃ dasseti. ^b^tathāgatassā^eb^ti aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi tathāgatassa. ^b^tathāgatabalānī^eb^ti yathā tehi gantabbaṃ, tatheva gatāni pavattāni ñāṇabalāni. ^b^āsabhaṃ ṭhāna^eb^nti seṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^sīhanāda^eb^nti abhītanādaṃ. ^b^brahmacakka^eb^nti seṭṭhacakkaṃ. ^b^pavattetī^eb^ti katheti.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^P3.0226^ea^ ^b^sekhabalānī^eb^ti sekhānaṃ ñāṇabalāni. ^b^agga^eb^nti uttamaṃ. sesabalāni gopānasiyo kūṭaṃ viya saṅgaṇhātīti ^b^saṅgāhikaṃ^eb^. tāneva balāni saṃhatāni karotīti ^b^saṅghātaniyaṃ^eb^.
[03] 13^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V3.0005^ea^ tattha muṭṭhassacce na kampatīti ^b^satibalaṃ^eb^. uddhacce na kampatīti ^b^samādhibalaṃ^eb^.
[03] 14^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^satinepakkenā^eb^ti ettha nepakkaṃ vuccati paññā, sā satiyā upakārakabhāvena gahitā.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ pañcame savisayasmiṃyeva lokiyalokuttaradhamme kathetuṃ ^b^kattha ca, bhikkhave, saddhābalaṃ daṭṭhabba^eb^ntiādimāha. yathā hi cattāro seṭṭhiputtā, rājāti rājapañcamesu sahāyesu ``nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā''ti vīthiṃ otiṇṇesu ekassa seṭṭhiputtassa gehaṃ gatakāle itare cattāro ^a^M3.0005^ea^ tuṇhī nisīdanti, gehasāmikova ``imesaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ detha, gandhamālālaṅkārādīni dethā''ti gehe vicāreti. dutiyatatiyacatutthassa gehaṃ gatakāle itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti, gehasāmikova ``imesaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ detha, gandhamālālaṅkārādīni dethā''ti gehe vicāreti. atha sabbapacchā rañño gehaṃ gatakāle kiñcāpi rājā sabbattha issaro, imasmiṃ pana kāle attano geheyeva ``imesaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ detha, gandhamālālaṅkārādīni dethā''ti vicāreti, evamevaṃ saddhāpañcamesu balesu tesu sahāyesu ekato vīthiṃ otarantesu viya ekārammaṇe uppajjamānesupi yathā paṭhamassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti, gehasāmikova vicāreti, evaṃ sotāpattiyaṅgāni patvā adhimokkhalakkhaṇaṃ saddhābalameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ, sesāni tadanvayāni honti. yathā dutiyassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti, gehasāmikova vicāreti, evaṃ sammappadhānāni patvā paggahalakkhaṇaṃ vīriyabalameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ ^a^P3.0227^ea^, sesāni tadanvayāni honti. yathā tatiyassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti, gehasāmikova vicāreti, evaṃ satipaṭṭhānāni patvā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ satibalameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ, sesāni tadanvayāni honti. yathā catutthassa gehe itare cattāro ^a^V3.0006^ea^ tuṇhī nisīdanti, gehasāmikova vicāreti, evaṃ jhānavimokkhe patvā avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ samādhibalameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ, sesāni tadanvayāni honti. sabbapacchā rañño gehaṃ gatakāle pana yathā itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti, rājāva gehe vicāreti, evameva ariyasaccāni patvā pajānanalakkhaṇaṃ paññābalameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ, sesāni tadanvayāni hontīti evamidha pañca balāni missakāni kathitāni. chaṭṭhaṃ uttānatthameva. evaṃ purimavagge ca idha ca aṭṭhasu suttesu sekhabalāneva kathitāni. karaṇḍakolavāsī mahādattatthero panāha -- ``heṭṭhā catūsu suttesu sekhabalāni kathitāni, upari catūsu asekhabalānī''ti.
[03] 17^b^.^eb^ sattame sīlādayo missakāva kathitā. ^b^vimuttī^eb^ti arahattaphalavimuttiyeva. ^b^vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ^eb^ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ, taṃ lokiyameva.
[03] 18-20^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^M3.0006^ea^ dussīlo bahussuto kathito, navame appassuto dussīlo, dasame bahussuto khīṇāsavoti.
[06] balavaggo dutiyo.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa ^a^P3.0228^ea^ paṭhame ^b^asabhāgavuttiko^eb^ti asabhāgāya visadisāya jīvitavuttiyā samannāgato ^a^V3.0007^ea^. ^b^ābhisamācārikaṃ dhamma^eb^nti uttamasamācārabhūtaṃ vattavasena paññattasīlaṃ. ^b^sekhaṃ dhamma^eb^nti sekhapaṇṇattisīlaṃ. ^b^sīlānī^eb^ti cattāri mahāsīlāni. ^b^sammādiṭṭhi^eb^nti vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiṃ. ^b^sammāsamādhi^eb^nti maggasamādhiñceva phalasamādhiñca. imasmiṃ sutte sīlādīni missakāni kathitāni.
[03] 22^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^sīlakkhandha^eb^nti sīlarāsiṃ. sesadvayepi eseva nayo. ime pana tayopi khandhā missakāva kathitāti.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^na ca pabhassara^eb^nti na ca pabhāvantaṃ. ^b^pabhaṅgu cā^eb^ti pabhijjanasabhāvaṃ. ^b^ayo^eb^ti kāḷalohaṃ. ^b^loha^eb^nti ṭhapetvā idha vuttāni cattāri avasesaṃ lohaṃ. ^b^sajjha^eb^nti rajataṃ. ^b^cittassā^eb^ti cātubhūmakakusalacittassa. tebhūmakassa tāva upakkilesā hontu, lokuttarassa kathaṃ hontīti? uppajjituṃ appadānena. yadaggena hi uppajjituṃ na denti, tadaggeneva te lokiyassapi lokuttarassapi upakkilesā nāma honti. ^b^pabhaṅgu cā^eb^ti ārammaṇe cuṇṇavicuṇṇabhāvūpagamanena bhijjanasabhāvaṃ. ^b^sammā^eb^ ^a^P3.0229^ea^ ^b^samādhiyati āsavānaṃ khayāyā^eb^ti āsavānaṃ khayasaṅkhātassa arahattassa atthāya hetunā kāraṇena samādhiyati. ettāvatā ^a^M3.0007^ea^ cittaṃ visodhetvā arahatte patiṭṭhitaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dasseti. idānissa abhiññāpaṭivedhaṃ dassento ^b^yassa yassa cā^eb^tiādimāha. taṃ uttānatthamevāti.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^hatūpaniso^eb^ti hataupanissayo hatakāraṇo. ^b^yathābhūtañāṇadassana^eb^nti nāmarūpaparicchedañāṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā taruṇavipassanā. ^b^nibbidāvirāgo^eb^ti nibbidā ca virāgo ca ^a^V3.0008^ea^. tattha nibbidā balavavipassanā, virāgo maggo. ^b^vimuttiñāṇadassana^eb^nti phalavimutti ca paccavekkhaṇañāṇañca.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^sammādiṭṭhī^eb^ti vipassanāsammādiṭṭhi. ^b^cetovimuttiphalā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^cetovimuttī^eb^ti maggaphalasamādhi. ^b^paññāvimuttī^eb^ti phalañāṇaṃ. ^b^sīlānuggahitā^eb^ti sīlena anuggahitā anurakkhitā. ^b^sutānuggahitā^eb^ti bāhusaccena anuggahitā. ^b^sākacchānuggahitā^eb^ti dhammasākacchāya anuggahitā. ^b^samathānuggahitā^eb^ti cittekaggatāya anuggahitā.

[03] imassa panatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ madhurambabījaṃ ropetvā samantā mariyādaṃ bandhitvā kālānukālaṃ udakaṃ āsiñcitvā kālānukālaṃ mūlāni sodhetvā kālānukālaṃ patitapāṇake hāretvā kālānukālaṃ makkaṭajālaṃ luñcitvā ambaṃ paṭijagganto puriso dassetabbo. tassa hi purisassa madhurambabījaropanaṃ viya vipassanāsammādiṭṭhi daṭṭhabbā, mariyādabandhanaṃ viya sīlena anuggaṇhanaṃ, udakāsecanaṃ ^a^P3.0230^ea^ viya sutena anuggaṇhanaṃ, mūlaparisodhanaṃ viya sākacchāya anuggaṇhanaṃ, pāṇakaharaṇaṃ viya jhānavipassanāpāripanthikasodhanavasena samathānuggaṇhanaṃ, makkaṭajālaluñcanaṃ viya balavavipassanānuggaṇhanaṃ, evaṃ anuggahitassa rukkhassa khippameva vaḍḍhitvā phalappadānaṃ viya imehi sīlādīhi anuggahitāya mūlasammādiṭṭhiyā khippameva maggavasena vaḍḍhitvā cetovimuttipaññāvimuttiphalappadānaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^M3.0008^ea^ ^b^vimuttāyatanānī^eb^ti vimuccanakāraṇāni. ^b^yatthā^eb^ti yesu vimuttāyatanesu. ^b^satthā dhammaṃ desetī^eb^ti catusaccadhammaṃ deseti. ^b^atthapaṭisaṃvedino^eb^ti pāḷiatthaṃ jānantassa. ^b^dhammapaṭisaṃvedino^eb^ti pāḷiṃ jānantassa. ^b^pāmojja^eb^nti taruṇapīti. ^b^pītī^eb^ti tuṭṭhākārabhūtā balavapīti. ^b^kāyo^eb^ti nāmakāyo. ^b^passambhatī^eb^ti paṭippassambhati. ^b^sukhaṃ vedetī^eb^ti sukhaṃ paṭilabhati. ^b^cittaṃ samādhiyatī^eb^ti arahattaphalasamādhinā samādhiyati. ayañhi taṃ dhammaṃ suṇanto āgatāgataṭṭhāne jhānavipassanāmaggaphalāni jānāti, tassa evaṃ jānato pīti uppajjati. so ^a^V3.0009^ea^ tassā pītiyā antarā osakkituṃ na dento upacārakammaṭṭhāniko hutvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ``cittaṃ samādhiyatī''ti. sesesupi eseva nayo. ayaṃ pana viseso -- ^b^samādhinimitta^eb^nti aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu aññataro samādhiyeva samādhinimittaṃ. ^b^suggahitaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0231^ea^ ^b^hotī^eb^tiādisu ācariyassa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhantena suṭṭhu gahitaṃ hoti suṭṭhu manasikataṃ suṭṭhu upadhāritaṃ. ^b^suppaṭividdhaṃ paññāyā^eb^ti paññāya suṭṭhu paccakkhaṃ kataṃ. ^b^tasmiṃ dhamme^eb^ti tasmiṃ kammaṭṭhānapāḷidhamme. iti imasmiṃ sutte pañcapi vimuttāyatanāni arahattaṃ pāpetvā kathitānīti.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^appamāṇa^eb^nti pamāṇakaradhammarahitaṃ lokuttaraṃ. ^b^nipakā patissatā^eb^ti nepakkena ca satiyā ca samannāgatā hutvā. ^b^pañca ñāṇānī^eb^ti pañca paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni. ^b^paccattaññeva uppajjantī^eb^ti attaniyeva uppajjanti. ^b^ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho cevā^eb^tiādīsu arahattaphalasamādhi adhippeto. maggasamādhītipi vadantiyeva. so hi appitappitakkhaṇe sukhattā ^b^paccuppannasukho,^eb^ purimo purimo pacchimassa pacchimassa samādhisukhassa paccayattā ^b^āyatiṃ sukhavipāko,^eb^ kilesehi ārakattā ^b^ariyo,^eb^ kāmāmisavaṭṭāmisalokāmisānaṃ abhāvā ^b^nirāmiso^eb^. buddhādīhi mahāpurisehi sevitattā ^b^akāpurisasevito^eb^. aṅgasantatāya ārammaṇasantatāya sabbakilesadarathasantatāya ca ^b^santo,^eb^ atappaniyaṭṭhena ^b^paṇīto^eb^. kilesappaṭippassaddhiyā laddhattā kilesappaṭippassaddhibhāvaṃ vā laddhattā ^b^paṭippassaddhaladdho^eb^. paṭippassaddhaṃ paṭippassaddhīti hi idaṃ atthato ekaṃ. paṭippassaddhakilesena ^a^M3.0009^ea^ vā arahatā laddhattāpi ^b^paṭippassaddhaladdho,^eb^ ekodibhāvena adhigatattā ekodibhāvameva vā adhigatattā ^b^ekodibhāvādhigato^eb^. appaguṇasāsavasamādhi viya sasaṅkhārena sappayogena ^a^P3.0232^ea^ cittena paccanīkadhamme niggayha kilese vāretvā anadhigatattā ^b^na sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato^eb^. taṃ samādhiṃ samāpajjanto tato vā vuṭṭhahanto sativepullappattattā ^b^satova samāpajjati, satova vuṭṭhahati^eb^. yathāparicchinnakālavasena vā sato samāpajjati, sato vuṭṭhahati. tasmā yadettha ``ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko cā''ti evaṃ paccavekkhamānassa paccattaṃyeva aparappaccayañāṇaṃ uppajjati, taṃ ekaṃ ñāṇaṃ. eseva nayo sesesu. evaṃ imāni pañca ñāṇāni paccattaññeva uppajjantīti.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V3.0010^ea^ ^b^ariyassā^eb^ti vikkhambhanavasena pahīnakilesehi ārakā ṭhitassa. ^b^bhāvanaṃ desessāmī^eb^ti brūhanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ pakāsayissāmi. ^b^imameva kāya^eb^nti imaṃ karajakāyaṃ. ^b^abhisandetī^eb^ti temeti sneheti, sabbattha pavattapītisukhaṃ karoti. ^b^parisandetī^eb^ti samantato sandeti. ^b^paripūretī^eb^ti vāyunā bhastaṃ viya pūreti. ^b^parippharatī^eb^ti samantato phusati. ^b^sabbāvato kāyassā^eb^ti assa bhikkhuno sabbakoṭṭhāsavato kāyassa kiñci upādinnakasantatipavattiṭṭhāne chavimaṃsalohitānugataṃ aṇumattampi ṭhānaṃ paṭhamajjhānasukhena aphuṭaṃ nāma na hoti.

[03] ^b^dakkho^eb^ti cheko paṭibalo nhānīyacuṇṇāni kātuñceva yojetuñca sannetuñca. ^b^kaṃsathāle^eb^ti yena kenaci lohena katabhājane. mattikābhājanaṃ pana thiraṃ na hoti, sannentassa bhijjati. tasmā taṃ na dassesi. ^b^paripphosakaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0233^ea^ ^b^paripphosaka^eb^nti siñcitvā siñcitvā. ^b^sanneyyā^eb^ti vāmahatthena kaṃsathālaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇahatthena pamāṇayuttaṃ udakaṃ siñcitvā siñcitvā parimaddanto piṇḍaṃ kareyya. ^b^snehānugatā^eb^ti udakasinehena anugatā. ^b^snehaparetā^eb^ti udakasinehena pariggahitā. ^b^santarabāhirā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0010^ea^ saddhiṃ antopadesena ceva bahipadesena ca, sabbatthakameva udakasinehena phuṭāti attho. ^b^na ca pagghariṇī^eb^ti na bindu bindu udakaṃ paggharati, sakkā hoti hatthenapi dvīhipi aṅgulīhi gahetuṃ ovaṭṭikāyapi kātunti attho.

[03] dutiyajjhānasukhaupamāyaṃ ^b^ubbhidodako^eb^ti ubbhinnaudako, na heṭṭhā ubbhijjitvā uggacchanaudako, antoyeva pana uppajjanaudakoti attho. ^b^āyamukha^eb^nti āgamanamaggo. ^b^devo^eb^ti megho. ^b^kālena kāla^eb^nti kāle kāle, anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ vā anudasāhaṃ vāti attho. ^b^dhāra^eb^nti vuṭṭhiṃ. ^b^nānuppaveccheyyā^eb^ti nappaveseyya, na vasseyyāti attho. ^b^sītā vāridhārā ubbhijjitvā^eb^ti sītā vāridhārā taṃ rahadaṃ pūrayamānā ^a^P3.0234^ea^ ubbhijjitvā. heṭṭhā uggacchanaudakañhi uggantvā bhijjantaṃ udakaṃ khobheti, catūhi disāhi pavisanaudakaṃ purāṇapaṇṇatiṇakaṭṭhadaṇḍakādīhi udakaṃ khobheti. vuṭṭhiudakaṃ dhārānipātabubbuḷakehi udakaṃ khobheti, sannisinnameva pana hutvā iddhinimmitamiva uppajjamānaṃ udakaṃ imaṃ padesaṃ pharati, imaṃ na pharatīti natthi. tena aphuṭokāso nāma na hoti. tattha rahado viya karajakāyo, udakaṃ viya dutiyajjhānasukhaṃ, sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] tatiyajjhānasukhaupamāyaṃ ^a^V3.0011^ea^ uppalāni ettha santīti ^b^uppalinī^eb^. sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. ettha ca setarattanīlesu yaṃkiñci uppalameva, ūnakasatapattaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ, satapattaṃ padumaṃ. pattaniyamaṃ vā vināpi setaṃ padumaṃ, rattaṃ puṇḍarīkanti ayamettha vinicchayo. ^b^udakānuggatānī^eb^ti udakato na uggatāni. ^b^antonimuggaposīnī^eb^ti udakatalassa anto nimuggāniyeva hutvā posanti vaḍḍhantīti attho. sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] catutthajjhānaupamāyaṃ ^b^parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātenā^eb^ti ettha nirupakkilesaṭṭhena parisuddhaṃ, pabhassaraṭṭhena pariyodātaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^odātena vatthenā^eb^ti idaṃ utupharaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. kiliṭṭhavatthena hi utupharaṇaṃ na hoti, taṅkhaṇadhotaparisuddhena ^a^P3.0235^ea^ utupharaṇaṃ balavaṃ hoti. imissā hi upamāya vatthaṃ viya karajakāyo, utupharaṇaṃ viya catutthajjhānasukhaṃ. tasmā yathā sunhātassa purisassa parisuddhaṃ vatthaṃ sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nisinnassa ^a^M3.0011^ea^ sarīrato utu sabbameva vatthaṃ pharati, na koci vatthassa aphuṭokāso hoti, evaṃ catutthajjhānasukhena bhikkhuno karajakāyassa na koci okāso aphuṭo hotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. catutthajjhānacittameva vā vatthaṃ viya, taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ utupharaṇaṃ viya. yathā hi katthaci katthaci odātavatthe kāyaṃ aphusantepi taṃsamuṭṭhānena utunā sabbatthakameva kāyo phuṭo hoti, evaṃ catutthajjhānasamuṭṭhāpitena sukhumarūpena sabbatthakameva bhikkhuno kāyo phuṭo hotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03] ^b^paccavekkhaṇanimitta^eb^nti paccavekkhaṇañāṇameva. ^b^suggahitaṃ hotī^eb^ti yathā tena jhānavipassanāmaggā suṭṭhu gahitā honti, evaṃ paccavekkhaṇanimittaṃ aparāparena paccavekkhaṇanimittena suṭṭhu gahitaṃ hoti. ^b^añño vā añña^eb^nti añño eko aññaṃ ekaṃ, attanoyeva hi attā na pākaṭo hoti. ^b^ṭhito vā nisinna^eb^nti ṭhitakassāpi nisinno pākaṭo hoti, tenevaṃ vuttaṃ. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^udakamaṇiko^eb^ti samekhalā udakacāṭi. ^b^samatittiko^eb^ti samabharito. ^b^kākapeyyā^eb^ti mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ nisīditvā kākena gīvaṃ anāmetvāva pātabbo.

[03] ^b^subhūmiya^eb^nti samabhūmiyaṃ. ``subhūme sukhette vihatakhāṇuke bījāni patiṭṭhāpeyyā''ti (dī0 ni0 2.438) ettha pana maṇḍabhūmi subhūmīti āgatā. ^b^catumahāpathe^eb^ti ^a^P3.0236^ea^ dvinnaṃ mahāmaggānaṃ vinivijjhitvā gataṭṭhāne. ^b^ājaññaratho^eb^ti vinītāssaratho. ^b^odhastapatodo^eb^ti yathā rathaṃ ^a^V3.0012^ea^ abhiruhitvā ṭhitena sakkā hoti gaṇhituṃ, evaṃ ālambanaṃ nissāya tiriyato ṭhapitapatodo. ^b^yoggācariyo^eb^ti assācariyo. sveva assadamme sāretīti ^b^assadammasārathi. yenicchaka^eb^nti yena yena maggena icchati. ^b^yadicchaka^eb^nti yaṃ yaṃ gatiṃ icchati. ^b^sāreyyā^eb^ti ujukaṃ purato peseyya. ^b^paccāsāreyyā^eb^ti paṭinivatteyya.

[03] evaṃ heṭṭhā pañcahi aṅgehi samāpattiparikammaṃ kathetvā imāhi tīhi upamāhi paguṇasamāpattiyā ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā idāni khīṇāsavassa abhiññāpaṭipāṭiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^so sace ākaṅkhatī^eb^tiādimāha. taṃ uttānatthamevāti.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^M3.0012^ea^ ^b^addhānakkhamo hotī^eb^ti dūraṃ addhānamaggaṃ gacchanto khamati, adhivāsetuṃ sakkoti. ^b^padhānakkhamo^eb^ti vīriyakkhamo. ^b^caṅkamādhigato samādhī^eb^ti caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhahantena adhigato aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ aññatarasamādhi. ^b^ciraṭṭhitiko hotī^eb^ti ciraṃ tiṭṭhati. ṭhitakena gahitanimittañhi nisinnassa nassati, nisinnena gahitanimittaṃ nipannassa. caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhahantena calitārammaṇe gahitanimittaṃ pana ṭhitassapi nisinnassapi nipannassapi na nassatīti.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ dasame uddhaṃ uggatattā ucco, rāsibhāvena ca mahā saddo etesanti ^b^uccāsaddamahāsaddā^eb^. tesu hi uggatuggatesu khattiyamahāsāla-brāhmaṇamahāsālādīsu mahāsakkāraṃ gahetvā ^a^P3.0237^ea^ āgatesu ``asukassa okāsaṃ detha, asukassa okāsaṃ dethā''ti vutte ``mayaṃ paṭhamataraṃ āgatā, mayhaṃ paṭhamataraṃ āgatā, natthi okāso''ti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ kathentānaṃ saddo ucco ceva mahā ca ahosi. ^b^kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilope^eb^ti kevaṭṭā viya macchavilope. tesañhi macchapacchiṃ gahetvā āgatānaṃ vikkiṇanaṭṭhāne ``mayhaṃ detha mayhaṃ dethā''ti vadato mahājanassa evarūpo saddo hoti. ^b^mīḷhasukha^eb^nti asucisukhaṃ. ^b^middhasukha^eb^nti niddāsukhaṃ. ^b^lābhasakkārasilokasukha^eb^nti lābhasakkārañceva vaṇṇabhaṇanañca nissāya uppannasukhaṃ.

[01] ^b^taṃninnāva^eb^ ^a^V3.0013^ea^ ^b^gamissantī^eb^ti taṃ tadeva bhagavato gataṭṭhānaṃ gamissanti, anubandhissantiyevāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^tathā hi, bhante, bhagavato sīlapaññāṇa^eb^nti yasmā tathāvidhaṃ tumhākaṃ sīlañca ñāṇañcāti attho. ^b^mā ca mayā yaso^eb^ti mayā saddhiṃ yasopi mā samāgacchatu. ^b^piyāna^eb^nti piyajanānaṃ. ^b^eso tassa nissando^eb^ti esā piyabhāvassa nipphatti. ^b^asubhanimittānuyoga^eb^nti asubhakammaṭṭhānānuyogaṃ. ^b^subhanimitte^eb^ti ^a^P3.0238^ea^ rāgaṭṭhāniye iṭṭhārammaṇe. ^b^eso tassa nissando^eb^ti esā tassa asubhanimittānuyogassa nipphatti. evamimasmiṃ sutte imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu vipassanāva kathitāti.
[06] pañcaṅgikavaggo tatiyo.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^M3.0013^ea^ paṭhame ^b^sumanā rājakumārī^eb^ti mahāsakkāraṃ katvā patthanaṃ patthetvā evaṃ laddhanāmā rājakaññā. vipassisammāsambuddhakālasmiṃ hi nāgaresu ``yuddhampi katvā satthāraṃ amhākaṃ gaṇhissāmā''ti senāpatiṃ nissāya buddhappamukhaṃ saṅghaṃ labhitvā paṭipāṭiyā puññāni kātuṃ āraddhesu sabbapaṭhamadivaso senāpatissa vāro ahosi. tasmiṃ divase senāpati mahādānaṃ sajjetvā ``ajja yathā añño koci ekabhikkhampi na deti, evaṃ rakkhathā''ti samantā purise ṭhapesi. taṃdivasaṃ seṭṭhibhariyā rodamānā pañcahi kumārikāsatehi saddhiṃ kīḷitvā āgataṃ dhītaraṃ āha -- ``sace, amma, tava pitā jīveyya, ajjāhaṃ paṭhamaṃ dasabalaṃ bhojeyya''nti. sā taṃ āha -- ``amma, mā cintayi, ahaṃ tathā karissāmi, yathā buddhappamukho saṅgho amhākaṃ paṭhamaṃ bhikkhaṃ bhuñjissatī''ti. tato satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇapātiyā nirudakapāyāsaṃ pūretvā sappimadhusakkharādīhi ^a^P3.0239^ea^ abhisaṅkharitvā aññissā pātiyā paṭikujjitvā taṃ sumanamālāguḷehi parikkhipitvā mālāguḷasadisaṃ katvā bhagavato gāmaṃ pavisanavelāya sayameva ukkhipitvā dhātigaṇaparivutā gharā nikkhami.

[03] antarāmagge ^a^V3.0014^ea^ senāpatino upaṭṭhākā, ``amma, mā ito āgamā''ti vadanti. mahāpuññā nāma manāpakathā honti, na ca tesaṃ punappunaṃ bhaṇantānaṃ kathā paṭikkhipituṃ sakkā hoti. sā ``cūḷapita, mahāpita, mātula, kissa tumhe gantuṃ na dethā''ti āha. senāpatinā ``aññassa kassaci khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ mā dethā''ti ṭhapitamha, ammāti. kiṃ pana mama hatthe khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ passathāti? mālāguḷaṃ passāmāti. kiṃ tumhākaṃ senāpati mālāpūjampi kātuṃ na detīti? deti, ammāti. tena hi apethāti bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``mālāguḷaṃ gaṇhatha bhagavā''ti āha. bhagavā ekaṃ senāpatissa upaṭṭhākaṃ oloketvā mālāguḷaṃ gaṇhāpesi. sā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ``bhavābhavābhinibbattiyaṃ me sati paritassanajīvitaṃ nāma mā hotu, ayaṃ sumanamālā viya nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne piyāva ^a^M3.0014^ea^ homi, nāmena ca sumanāyevā''ti patthanaṃ katvā satthārā ``sukhinī hohī''ti vuttā vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.

[03] bhagavāpi senāpatissa gehaṃ gantvā paññattāsane nisīdi. senāpati yāguṃ gahetvā upagañchi, satthā hatthena pattaṃ pidahi. nisinno, bhante, bhikkhusaṅghoti ^a^P3.0240^ea^. atthi no eko antarāmagge piṇḍapāto laddhoti? mālaṃ apanetvā piṇḍapātaṃ addasa. cūḷupaṭṭhāko āha -- ``sāmi mālāti maṃ vatvā mātugāmo vañcesī''ti. pāyāso bhagavantaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbabhikkhūnaṃ pahosi. senāpati attano deyyadhammaṃ adāsi. satthā bhattakiccaṃ katvā maṅgalaṃ vatvā pakkāmi. senāpati ``kā nāma sā piṇḍapātamadāsī''ti pucchi. seṭṭhidhītā sāmīti. sappaññā itthī, evarūpāya ghare vasantiyā purisassa saggasampatti nāma na dullabhāti kaṃ ānetvā jeṭṭhakaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi?

[03] sā pitugehe ca senāpatigehe ca dhanaṃ gahetvā yāvatāyukaṃ tathāgatassa dānaṃ datvā puññāni karitvā tato cutā kāmāvacaradevaloke nibbatti. nibbattakkhaṇeyeva jāṇuppamāṇena odhinā sakalaṃ devalokaṃ paripūrayamānaṃ sumanavassaṃ vassi. devatā ``ayaṃ attanāva attano nāmaṃ gahetvā āgatā''ti ``sumanā devadhītā''tvevassā nāmaṃ akaṃsu. sā ekanavutikappe devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsarantī nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne avijahitasumanavassā ``sumanā sumanā''tveva nāmā ahosi. imasmiṃ pana kāle kosalarañño aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. tāpi pañcasatā kumārikā taṃdivasaññeva tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kule paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā ^a^V3.0015^ea^ ekadivaseyeva sabbā mātukucchito nikkhamiṃsu. taṃkhaṇaṃyeva jāṇuppamāṇena odhinā sumanavassaṃ vassi. taṃ disvā rājā ``pubbe katābhinīhārā esā bhavissatī''ti ^a^P3.0241^ea^ tuṭṭhamānaso ``dhītā me attanāva attano nāmaṃ gahetvā āgatā''ti sumanātvevassā nāmaṃ katvā ``mayhaṃ dhītā na ekikāva nibbattissatī''ti nagaraṃ vicināpento `pañca dārikāsatāni jātānī''ti sutvā sabbā attanāva posāpesi. māse māse sampate ``ānetvā mama dhītu dassethā''ti āha. evamesā mahāsakkāraṃ katvā patthanaṃ patthetvā evaṃladdhanāmāti veditabbā.

[03] tassā ^a^M3.0015^ea^ sattavassikakāle anāthapiṇḍikena vihāraṃ niṭṭhāpetvā tathāgatassa dūte pesite satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro sāvatthiṃ agamāsi. anāthapiṇḍiko gantvā rājānaṃ evamāha -- ``mahārāja, satthu idhāgamanaṃ amhākampi maṅgalaṃ tumhākampi maṅgalameva, sumanaṃ rājakumāriṃ pañcahi dārikāsatehi saddhiṃ puṇṇaghaṭe ca gandhamālādīni ca gāhāpetvā dasabalassa paccuggamanaṃ pesethā''ti. rājā ``sādhu mahāseṭṭhī''ti tathā akāsi. sāpi raññā vuttanayeneva gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. satthā tassā dhammaṃ desesi. sā pañcahi kumārikāsatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. aññānipi pañca dārikāsatāni pañca mātugāmasatāni pañca upāsakasatāni tasmiṃyeva khaṇe sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. evaṃ tasmiṃ divase antarāmaggeyeva dve sotāpannasahassāni jātāni.

[03] ^b^yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti kasmā upasaṅkamīti? pañhaṃ pucchitukāmatāya. kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kira sahāyakā dve bhikkhū ahesuṃ. tesu eko sāraṇīyadhammaṃ pūreti, eko bhattaggavattaṃ. sāraṇīyadhammapūrako itaraṃ āha -- ``āvuso, adinnassa phalaṃ nāma natthi, attanā laddhaṃ paresaṃ datvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī''ti. itaro pana āha -- ``āvuso, tvaṃ na jānāsi, deyyadhammaṃ nāma vinipātetuṃ na ^a^P3.0242^ea^ vaṭṭati, attano yāpanamattameva gaṇhantena bhattaggavattaṃ pūretuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti. tesu ekopi ekaṃ attano ovāde otāretuṃ nāsakkhi. dvepi attano paṭipattiṃ pūretvā tato cutā kāmāvacaradevaloke nibbattiṃsu. tattha sāraṇīyadhammapūrako itaraṃ pañcahi dhammehi adhigaṇhi.

[03] evaṃ te devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsarantā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ khepetvā imasmiṃ kāle sāvatthiyaṃ nibbattiṃsu. sāraṇīyadhammapūrako kosalarañño aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi ^a^V3.0016^ea^, itaro tassāyeva upaṭṭhākaitthiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. te dvepi janā ekadivaseneva jāyiṃsu. te nāmaggahaṇadivase nhāpetvā sirigabbhe nipajjāpetvā dvinnampi mātaro bahi sakkāraṃ saṃvidahiṃsu. tesu sāraṇīyadhammapūrako akkhīni ummīletvā mahantaṃ setacchattaṃ supaññattaṃ sirisayanaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattañca nivesanaṃ disvā ``ekasmiṃ rājakule nibbattosmī''ti aññāsi. so ``kiṃ ^a^M3.0016^ea^ nu kho kammaṃ katvā idha nibbattosmī''ti āvajjento ``sāraṇīyadhammanissandenā''ti ñatvā ``sahāyo me kuhiṃ nu kho nibbatto''ti āvajjento nīcasayane nipannaṃ disvā ``ayaṃ bhattaggavattaṃ pūremīti mama vacanaṃ na gaṇhi, imasmiṃ idāni taṃ ṭhāne niggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī''ti ``samma mama vacanaṃ nākāsī''ti āha. atha kiṃ jātanti. passa mayhaṃ sampattiṃ, setacchattassa heṭṭhā sirisayane nipannosmi, tvaṃ nīcamañce thaddhāttharaṇamatte nipannosīti. kiṃ pana tvaṃ etaṃ nissāya mānaṃ karosi, nanu veḷusalākāhi katvā pilotikāya paliveṭhitaṃ sabbametaṃ pathavīdhātumattamevāti?

[03] sumanā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā ``mama bhātikānaṃ santike koci natthī''ti tesaṃ samīpaṃ gacchantī dvāraṃ nissāya ṭhitā ``dhātū''ti vacanaṃ ^a^P3.0243^ea^ sutvā ``idaṃ dhātūti vacanaṃ bahiddhā natthi. mama bhātikā samaṇadevaputtā bhavissantī''ti cintetvā -- ``sacāhaṃ `ime evaṃ kathentī'ti mātāpitūnaṃ kathessāmi, `amanussā ete'ti nīharāpessanti. idaṃ kāraṇaṃ aññassa akathetvā kaṅkhacchedakaṃ purisaheraññikaṃ mama pitaraṃ mahāgotamadasabalaṃyeva pucchissāmī''ti bhuttapātarāsā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``dasabalassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gamissāmī''ti āha. rājā pañca rathasatāni yojāpesi. jambudīpatalasmiñhi tissova kumāriyo pitūnaṃ santikā pañca rathasatāni labhiṃsu -- bimbisārarañño dhītā cundī rājakaññā, dhanañcayassa seṭṭhissa dhītā visākhā, ayaṃ sumanā rājakaññāti. sā gandhamālaṃ ādāya rathe ṭhitā pañcarathasataparivārā ``imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmī''ti yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.

[03] ^b^idhassū^eb^ti idha bhaveyyuṃ. ^b^eko dāyako^eb^ti eko attanā laddhalābhato parassa datvā paribhuñjanako sāraṇīyadhammapūrako. ^b^eko adāyako^eb^ti eko attanā laddhaṃ parassa adatvā paribhuñjanako bhattaggavattapūrako. ^b^devabhūtānaṃ pana nesa^eb^nti devabhūtānaṃ etesaṃ. ^b^adhigaṇhātī^eb^ti adhibhavitvā gaṇhāti ajjhottharati atiseti. ^b^ādhipateyyenā^eb^ti jeṭṭhakakāraṇena. ^b^imehi pañcahi ṭhānehī^eb^ti sesadeve sakko devarājā viya imehi pañcahi kāraṇehi adhigaṇhāti. ^b^mānusakenā^eb^tiādīsu ^a^V3.0017^ea^ ^a^M3.0017^ea^ āyunā mahākassapatthero viya bākulatthero ^a^P3.0244^ea^ viya ānandatthero viya ca, vaṇṇena mahāgatimbābhayatthero viya bhaṇḍāgārāmacco viya ca, sukhena raṭṭhapālakulaputto viya soṇaseṭṭhiputto viya yasadārako viya ca, yasena dhammāsoko viya, tathā ādhipaccenāti imehi pañcahi kāraṇehi atireko jeṭṭhako hoti.

[03] ^b^yācitova bahula^eb^nti bākulatthera-sīvalitthera-ānandattherādayo viya yācitova bahulaṃ cīvarādīni paribhuñjatīti imehi kāraṇehi atireko hoti jeṭṭhako. ^b^yadidaṃ vimuttiyā vimutti^eb^nti yaṃ ekassa vimuttiyā saddhiṃ itarassa vimuttiṃ ārabbha nānākaraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ bhaveyya, taṃ na vadāmīti attho. sattavassikadārako vā hi vimuttiṃ paṭivijjhatu vassasatikatthero vā bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā, paṭividdhalokuttaramagge nānattaṃ nāma natthi. ^b^alamevā^eb^ti yuttameva. ^b^yatra hi nāmā^eb^ti yāni nāma.

[03] ^b^gacchaṃ ākāsadhātuyā^eb^ti ākāsena gacchanto. ^b^saddho^eb^ti ratanattayaguṇānaṃ saddhātā. ^b^thanaya^eb^nti gajjanto. ^b^vijjumālī^eb^ti mālāsadisāya meghamukhe carantiyā vijjulatāya samannāgato. ^b^satakkakū^eb^ti satakūṭo, ito cito ca uṭṭhitena valāhakakūṭasatena samannāgatoti attho. ^b^dassanasampanno^eb^ti sotāpanno. ^b^bhogaparibyūḷho^eb^ti udakoghena viya dānavasena dīyamānehi bhogehi paribyūḷho, devalokaṃ sampāpitoti attho. ^b^peccā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0245^ea^ paraloke. ^b^sagge pamodatī^eb^ti yasmiṃ sagge uppajjati, tattheva modatīti.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^pañcahi rathasatehī^eb^ti bhuttapātarāsā pitu santikaṃ pesetvā pañca rathasatāni yojāpetvā tehi parivutāti attho. ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti bhātarā saddhiṃ pavattitaṃ pañhasākacchaṃ pucchissāmīti gandhamālacuṇṇādīni ādāya upasaṅkami. ^b^yadeva so hotī^eb^ti yadā eva so hoti. atha vā yo eva so hoti. ^b^ariyakantāni sīlānī^eb^ti maggaphalasampayuttāni ^a^M3.0018^ea^ sīlāni. tāni hi ariyānaṃ kantāni honti, bhavantarepi na pariccajanti. sesaṃ catukkanipāte aggappasādasutte vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V3.0018^ea^ ^b^bhaddiye^eb^ti bhaddiyanagare. ^b^jātiyāvane^eb^ti sayaṃjāte aropite himavantena saddhiṃ ekābaddhe vanasaṇḍe, taṃ nagaraṃ upanissāya tasmiṃ vane viharatīti attho. ^b^attacatuttho^eb^ti attanā catuttho. kasmā panesa bhagavantaṃ attacatutthaṃyeva nimantesi? gehe kirassa maṅgalaṃ mahantaṃ, tattha mahantena saṃvidhānena bahū ^a^P3.0246^ea^ manussā sannipatissanti. te bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisantena dussaṅgahā bhavissantīti attacatutthaṃyeva nimantesi. api cassa evampi ahosi -- ``daharakumārikāyo mahābhikkhusaṅghamajjhe satthari ovadante olīnamanā ovādaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkuṇeyyu''nti. imināpi kāraṇena attacatutthameva nimantesi. ^b^ovadatu tāsaṃ, bhante^eb^ti, bhante bhagavā, etāsaṃ ovadatu, etā ovadatūti attho. upayogatthasmiñhi etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^yaṃ tāsa^eb^nti yaṃ ovādānusāsanaṃ etāsaṃ. evañca pana vatvā so seṭṭhi ``imā mama santike ovādaṃ gaṇhamānā harāyeyyu''nti bhagavantaṃ vanditvā pakkāmi.

[03] ^b^bhattū^eb^ti sāmikassa. ^b^anukampaṃ upādāyā^eb^ti anuddayaṃ paṭicca. ^b^pubbuṭṭhāyiniyo^eb^ti sabbapaṭhamaṃ uṭṭhānasīlā. ^b^pacchānipātiniyo^eb^ti sabbapacchā nipajjanasīlā. itthiyā hi paṭhamataraṃ bhuñjitvā sayanaṃ āruyha nipajjituṃ na vaṭṭati, sabbe pana gehaparijane bhojetvā upakaraṇabhaṇḍaṃ saṃvidhāya gorūpādīni āgatānāgatāni ñatvā sve kattabbakammaṃ vicāretvā kuñcikāmuddikaṃ hatthe katvā sace bhojanaṃ atthi, bhuñjitvā, no ce atthi, aññaṃ pacāpetvā sabbe santappetvā pacchā nipajjituṃ vaṭṭati. nipannāyapi yāva sūriyuggamanā niddāyituṃ na vaṭṭati, sabbapaṭhamaṃ pana uṭṭhāya dāsakammakare pakkosāpetvā ``idañcidañca kammaṃ karothā''ti kammantaṃ vicāretvā dhenuyo duhāpetvā sabbaṃ gehe kattabbakiccaṃ attano paccakkhaṃyeva ^a^P3.0247^ea^ kātuṃ vaṭṭati ^a^M3.0019^ea^. etamatthaṃ sandhāya ``pubbuṭṭhāyiniyo pacchānipātiniyo''ti āha. ^b^``kiṃkārapaṭissāviniyo^eb^ti kiṃ karoma kiṃ karomā''ti mukhaṃ oloketvā vicaraṇasīlā. ^b^manāpacāriniyo^eb^ti manāpaṃyeva kiriyaṃ karaṇasīlā. ^b^piyavādiniyo^eb^ti piyameva vacanaṃ vādanasīlā. ^b^pūjessāmā^eb^ti catupaccayapūjāya pūjayissāma.

[03] ^b^abbhāgate^eb^ti attano santikaṃ āgate. ^b^āsanodakena paṭipūjessāmā^eb^ti āsanena ca pādadhovanaudakena ca pūjayissāma. ettha ca mātāpitūnaṃ devasikaṃ sakkāro kātabbo. samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ ^a^V3.0019^ea^ pana abbhāgatānaṃ āsanaṃ datvā pādadhovanañca dātabbaṃ, sakkāro ca kātabbo.

[03] ^b^uṇṇā^eb^ti eḷakalomaṃ. ^b^tattha dakkhā bhavissāmā^eb^ti eḷakalomānaṃ vijaṭanadhovanarajanaveṇikaraṇādīsu kappāsassa ca vaṭṭanapisanaphoṭanakantanādīsu chekā bhavissāma. ^b^tatrupāyāyā^eb^ti tasmiṃ uṇṇākappāsasaṃvidhāne upāyabhūtāya ``imasmiṃ kāle idaṃ nāma kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti evaṃ pavattāya vīmaṃsāya samannāgatā. ^b^alaṃ kātuṃ alaṃ saṃvidhātu^eb^nti attanā kātumpi parehi kārāpetumpi yuttā ceva samatthā ca bhavissāmāti attho.

[03] ^b^katañca katato jānissāma, akatañca akatato^eb^ti sakaladivasaṃ idaṃ nāma kammaṃ katvā āgatānaṃ, upaḍḍhadivasaṃ idaṃ ^a^P3.0248^ea^ nāma kammaṃ katvā āgatānaṃ, nikkammānaṃ gehe nisinnānaṃ idaṃ nāma dātuñca evañca kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti evaṃ jānissāma. ^b^gilānakānañca balābala^eb^nti sace hi gilānakāle tesaṃ bhesajjabhojanādīni datvā rogaṃ phāsuṃ na karonti, ``ime arogakāle amhe yaṃ icchanti, taṃ kārenti. gilānakāle atthi bhāvampi no na jānantī''ti virattarūpā pacchā kiccāni na karonti, dukkaṭāni vā karonti. tasmā nesaṃ balābalaṃ ñatvā dātabbañca kātabbañca jānissāmāti evaṃ tumhehi sikkhitabbanti dasseti. ^b^khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyañcassā^eb^ti khādanīyañca bhojanīyañca assa antojanassa. ^b^paccaṃsenā^eb^ti paṭilabhitabbena aṃsena, attano attano laddhabbakoṭṭhāsānurūpenāti attho. ^b^saṃvibhajissāmā^eb^ti dassāma. ^b^sampādessāmā^eb^ti sampādayissāma.
[03] ^b^adhuttī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0020^ea^ purisadhuttasurādhuttatāvasena adhuttiyo. ^b^athenī^eb^ti atheniyo acoriyo. ^b^asoṇḍī^eb^ti surāsoṇḍatādivasena asoṇḍiyo.

[03] evaṃ suttantaṃ niṭṭhapetvā idāni gāthāhi kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto ^b^yo naṃ bharati sabbadā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^bharatī^eb^ti posati paṭijaggati. ^b^sabbakāmahara^eb^nti sabbakāmadadaṃ. ^b^sotthī^eb^ti suitthī. ^b^evaṃ vattatī^eb^ti ettakaṃ vattaṃ pūretvā vattati. ^b^manāpā nāma te devā^eb^ti nimmānaratī devā. te hi icchiticchitaṃ ^a^P3.0249^ea^ rūpaṃ māpetvā abhiramaṇato nimmānaratīti ca manāpāti ca vuccantīti.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^V3.0020^ea^ ^b^sandiṭṭhika^eb^nti sāmaṃ passitabbakaṃ. ^b^dāyako^eb^ti dānasūro. na so saddhāmattakeneva tiṭṭhati, pariccajitumpi sakkotīti attho. ^b^dānapatī^eb^ti yaṃ dānaṃ deti, tassa pati hutvā deti, na dāso, na sahāyo. yo hi attanā madhuraṃ bhuñjati, paresaṃ amadhuraṃ deti, so dānasaṅkhātassa deyyadhammassa dāso hutvā deti. yo yaṃ attanā bhuñjati, tadeva deti, so sahāyo hutvā deti. yo pana attanā yena kenaci yāpeti, paresaṃ madhuraṃ deti, so pati jeṭṭhako sāmī hutvā deti. tādisaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ``dānapatī''ti.

[03] ^b^amaṅkubhūto^eb^ti na nittejabhūto. ^b^visārado^eb^ti ñāṇasomanassappatto. ^b^sahabyataṃ gatā^eb^ti sahabhāvaṃ ekībhāvaṃ gatā. ^b^katāvakāsā^eb^ti yena kammena tattha avakāso hoti, tassa katattā katāvakāsā. taṃ pana yasmā kusalameva hoti, tasmā ^b^katakusalā^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^modare^eb^ti modanti pamodanti. ^b^asitassā^eb^ti anissitassa tathāgatassa. ^b^tādino^eb^ti tādilakkhaṇaṃ pattassa.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^gihidhammā anapagato hotī^eb^ti akhaṇḍapañcasīlo hoti. ^b^sataṃ dhammaṃ anukkama^eb^nti sappurisānaṃ mahāpurisānaṃ dhammaṃ anukkamanto ^a^M3.0021^ea^. ^b^santo^eb^ ^a^P3.0250^ea^ ^b^naṃ bhajantī^eb^ti sappurisā buddhapaccekabuddhatathāgatasāvakā etaṃ bhajanti.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^kāladānānī^eb^ti yuttadānāni, pattadānāni anucchavikadānānīti attho. ^b^navasassānī^eb^ti aggasassāni. ^b^navaphalānī^eb^ti ārāmato paṭhamuppannāni aggaphalāni. ^b^paṭhamaṃ sīlavantesu patiṭṭhāpetī^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ sīlavantānaṃ datvā pacchā attanā paribhuñjati. ^b^vadaññū^eb^ti bhāsitaññū. ^b^kālena dinna^eb^nti yuttappattakālena dinnaṃ. ^b^anumodantī^eb^ti ekamante ṭhitā anumodanti. ^b^veyyāvacca^eb^nti kāyena veyyāvaṭikakammaṃ karonti. ^b^appaṭivānacitto^eb^ti anukkaṇṭhitacitto. ^b^yattha dinnaṃ mahapphala^eb^nti yasmiṃ ṭhāne dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti, tattha dadeyya.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^V3.0021^ea^ ^b^āyuṃ detī^eb^ti āyudānaṃ deti. ^b^vaṇṇa^eb^nti sarīravaṇṇaṃ. ^b^sukha^eb^nti kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ. ^b^bala^eb^nti sarīrathāmaṃ. ^b^paṭibhāna^eb^nti yuttamuttappaṭibhānaṃ.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^anukampantī^eb^ti anuggaṇhanti. ^b^khandhimāva mahādumo^eb^ti khandhasampanno mahārukkho viya. ^b^manorame āyatane^eb^ti ramaṇīye samosaraṇaṭṭhāne. ^b^chāyaṃ chāyatthikā yantī^eb^ti chāyāya atthikāva chāyaṃ upagacchanti. ^b^nivātavutti^eb^nti nīcavuttiṃ. ^b^atthaddha^eb^nti kodhamānathaddhatāya rahitaṃ. ^b^sorata^eb^nti soraccena sucisīlena samannāgataṃ. ^b^sakhila^eb^nti sammodakaṃ.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^bhato vā no bharissatī^eb^ti amhehi thaññapāyanahatthapādavaḍḍhanādīhi bhato paṭijaggito amhe mahallakakāle ^a^P3.0251^ea^ hatthapādadhovana-nhāpanayāgubhattadānādīhi bharissati. ^b^kiccaṃ vā no karissatī^eb^ti attano kammaṃ ṭhapetvā amhākaṃ rājakulādīsu uppannaṃ kiccaṃ gantvā karissati ^a^M3.0022^ea^. ^b^kulavaṃso ciraṃ ṭhassatī^eb^ti amhākaṃ santakaṃ khettavatthuhiraññasuvaṇṇādiṃ avināsetvā rakkhante putte kulavaṃso ciraṃ ṭhassati, amhehi vā pavattitāni salākabhattādīni anupacchinditvā pavattessati, evampi no kulavaṃso ciraṃ ṭhassati. ^b^dāyajjaṃ paṭipajjissatī^eb^ti kulavaṃsānurūpāya paṭipattiyā attānaṃ dāyajjārahaṃ karonto amhākaṃ santakaṃ dāyajjaṃ paṭipajjissati. ^b^dakkhiṇaṃ anuppadassatī^eb^ti pattidānaṃ katvā tatiyadivasato paṭṭhāya dānaṃ anuppadassati.

[03] ^b^santo sappurisā^eb^ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne mātāpitūsu sammā paṭipattiyā santo sappurisāti veditabbā. ^b^pubbe katamanussara^eb^nti mātāpitūhi paṭhamataraṃ kataguṇaṃ anussarantā. ^b^ovādakārī^eb^ti mātāpitūhi dinnassa ovādassa kattā. ^b^bhataposī^eb^ti yehi bhato, tesaṃ posako. ^b^pasaṃsiyo^eb^ti diṭṭheva dhamme mahājanena pasaṃsitabbo hoti.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^V3.0022^ea^ ^b^mahāsālā^eb^ti mahārukkhā. ^b^sākhāpattapalāsena vaḍḍhantī^eb^ti khuddakasākhāhi ca pattasaṅkhātena ca palāsena vaḍḍhanti. ^b^araññasmi^eb^nti agāmake padese. ^b^brahāvane^eb^ti mahāvane aṭaviyaṃ. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] sumanavaggo catuttho.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa ^a^P3.0252^ea^ paṭhame ^b^bhogānaṃ ādiyā^eb^ti bhogānaṃ ādātabbakāraṇāni. ^b^uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatehī^eb^ti uṭṭhānasaṅkhātena vīriyena adhigatehi. ^b^bāhābalaparicitehī^eb^ti bāhubalena sañcitehi. ^b^sedāvakkhittehī^eb^ti sedaṃ avakkhipetvā uppāditehi. ^b^dhammikehī^eb^ti dhammayuttehi. ^b^dhammaladdhehī^eb^ti dasakusalakammaṃ akopetvā laddhehi. ^b^pīṇetī^eb^ti pīṇitaṃ ^a^M3.0023^ea^ thūlaṃ karoti. sesamettha catukkanipāte vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. dutiyaṃ uttānatthameva.
[03] 43^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^āyusaṃvattanikā paṭipadā^eb^ti dānasīlādikā puññapaṭipadā. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^atthābhisamayā^eb^ti atthassa abhisamāgamena, atthappaṭilābhenāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^V3.0023^ea^ ^b^uggo^eb^ti guṇehi uggatattā evaṃladdhanāmo. ^b^sālapupphakaṃ khādanīya^eb^nti catumadhurayojitena sālipiṭṭhena kataṃ sālapupphasadisaṃ khādanīyaṃ. tañhi paññāyamānavaṇṭapattakesaraṃ katvā jīrakādisambhārayutte sappimhi pacitvā sappiṃ vinivattetvā kolumbe pūretvā gandhavāsaṃ gāhāpetvā pidahitvā lañchetvā ṭhapitaṃ ^a^P3.0253^ea^ hoti. taṃ so yāguṃ pivitvā nisinnassa bhagavato antarabhatte dātukāmo evamāha. ^b^paṭiggahesi bhagavā^eb^ti desanāmattametaṃ, upāsako pana taṃ bhagavato ca pañcannañca bhikkhusatānaṃ adāsi. yathā ca taṃ, evaṃ sūkaramaṃsādīnipi. tattha ^b^sampannakolaka^eb^nti sampannabadaraṃ. ^b^sūkaramaṃsa^eb^nti madhurarasehi badarehi saddhiṃ jīrakādisambhārehi yojetvā pakkaṃ ekasaṃvaccharikasūkaramaṃsaṃ. ^b^nibbattatelaka^eb^nti vinivattitatelaṃ. ^b^nāliyasāka^eb^nti sālipiṭṭhena saddhiṃ madditvā jīrakādisaṃyutte sappimhi pacitvā catumadhurena yojetvā vāsaṃ gāhāpetvā ṭhapitaṃ nāliyasākaṃ. ^b^netaṃ bhagavato kappatī^eb^ti ettha akappiyaṃ upādāya kappiyampi na kappatīti vuttaṃ, seṭṭhi pana sabbampi taṃ āharāpetvā rāsiṃ katvā yaṃ yaṃ akappiyaṃ, taṃ taṃ antarāpaṇaṃ pahiṇitvā kappiyaṃ upabhogaparibhogabhaṇḍaṃ adāsi. candanaphalakaṃ nātimahantaṃ dīghato aḍḍhateyyaratanaṃ, tiriyaṃ diyaḍḍharatanaṃ, sāravarabhaṇḍattā pana mahagghaṃ ahosi. bhagavā taṃ paṭiggahetvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chedāpetvā bhikkhūnaṃ añjanapisanatthāya dāpesi.

[03] ^b^ujjubhūtesū^eb^ti ^a^M3.0024^ea^ kāyavācācittehi ujukesu. ^b^chandasā^eb^ti pemena. ^b^catta^eb^ntiādīsu pariccāgavasena ^b^cattaṃ^eb^. muttacāgatāya ^b^muttaṃ^eb^. anapekkhacittatāya cittena na uggahitanti ^b^anuggahītaṃ. khettūpame^eb^ti ^a^P3.0254^ea^ viruhanaṭṭhena khettasadise.

[03] ^b^aññataraṃ manomaya^eb^nti suddhāvāsesu ekaṃ jhānamanena nibbattaṃ devakāyaṃ. ^b^yathādhippāyo^eb^ti yathājjhāsayo. iminā kiṃ pucchati? tassa kira manussakāle arahattatthāya ajjhāsayo ahosi, taṃ pucchāmīti pucchati. devaputtopi arahattaṃ pattatāya ^b^taggha me bhagavā yathādhippāyo^eb^ti āha. ^b^yattha yatthūpapajjatī^eb^ti tīsu vā kulasampattīsu chasu vā kāmasaggesu yattha yattha uppajjati, tattha tattha dīghāyu yasavā hotīti. pañcamaṃ catukkanipāte vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. chaṭṭhasattamāni uttānatthāneva.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V3.0024^ea^ ^b^alabbhanīyānī^eb^ti aladdhabbāni, na sakkā labhituṃ. ^b^ṭhānānī^eb^ti kāraṇāni. ^b^jarādhammaṃ mā jīrī^eb^ti yaṃ mayhaṃ jarāsabhāvaṃ, taṃ mā jīratu. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^nacchādeyyā^eb^ti na rucceyya. ^b^abbuhī^eb^ti nīhari.

[03] ^b^yato^eb^ti yasmiṃ kāle. ^b^āpadāsū^eb^ti upaddavesu. ^b^na vedhatī^eb^ti na kampati nānusocati. ^b^atthavinicchayaññū^eb^ti kāraṇatthavinicchaye kusalo. ^b^purāṇa^eb^nti nibbikāratāya porāṇakameva. ^b^jappenā^eb^ti vaṇṇabhaṇanena. ^b^mantenā^eb^ti mahānubhāvamantaparivattanena. ^b^subhāsitenā^eb^ti subhāsitakathanena. ^b^anuppadānenā^eb^ti satassa vā sahassassa vā dānena. ^b^paveṇiyā^eb^ ^a^P3.0255^ea^ ^b^vā^eb^ti kulavaṃsena vā, ``idaṃ amhākaṃ paveṇiyā āciṇṇaṃ, idaṃ anāciṇṇa''nti evaṃ paveṇikathanenāti attho. ^b^yathā yathā yattha labhetha attha^eb^nti etesu jappādīsu yena yena yattha yattha ṭhāne jarādhammādīnaṃ ajīraṇatādiatthaṃ labheyya. ^b^tathā tathā tattha parakkameyyā^eb^ti tena tena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne parakkamaṃ kareyya. ^b^kammaṃ daḷha^eb^nti vaṭṭagāmikammaṃ mayā thiraṃ katvā āyūhitaṃ, svāhaṃ idāni kinti karomīti evaṃ paccavekkhitvā adhivāseyyāti.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^M3.0025^ea^ ^b^upakaṇṇake^eb^ti kaṇṇamūle. ^b^dummano^eb^ti duṭṭhumano. ^b^pattakkhandho^eb^ti patitakkhandho. ^b^pajjhāyanto^eb^ti cintayanto. ^b^appaṭibhāno^eb^ti nippaṭibhāno hutvā. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^ajjhomucchito^eb^ti adhiomucchito gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā gahaṇasabhāvāya atirekamucchāya taṇhāya samannāgato. ^b^mahaccā rājānubhāvenā^eb^ti mahatā rājānubhāvena, aṭṭhārasahi senīhi parivārito mahatiyā rājiddhiyā pāyāsīti attho. ^b^tagghā^eb^ti ekaṃsatthe nipāto ^a^V3.0025^ea^, ekaṃseneva sokasallaharaṇoti attho. iti rājā imaṃ ovādaṃ sutvā tasmiṃ ṭhito dhammena samena rajjaṃ kāretvā saggaparāyaṇo ahosi.
[06] muṇḍarājavaggo pañcamo.
[06] paṭhamapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa ^a^M3.0026^ea^ ^a^V3.0026^ea^ ^a^P3.0256^ea^ paṭhame āvaraṇavasena ^b^āvaraṇā^eb^. nīvaraṇavasena ^b^nīvaraṇā^eb^. ceto ajjhāruhantīti ^b^cetaso ajjhāruhā^eb^. vipassanāpaññañca maggapaññañca uppattinivāraṇaṭṭhena dubbalaṃ karontīti ^b^paññāya dubbalīkaraṇā^eb^. yā vā etehi saddhiṃ vokiṇṇā paññā uppajjati, taṃ dubbalaṃ karontītipi ^b^paññāya dubbalīkaraṇā. abalāyā^eb^ti pañcanīvaraṇapariyonaddhattā apagatabalāya. ^b^uttari vā manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesa^eb^nti dasakusalakammapathasaṅkhātā manussadhammā uttari ariyabhāvaṃ kātuṃ samatthaṃ ñāṇadassanavisesaṃ. ^b^hārahārinī^eb^ti haritabbaṃ harituṃ samatthā. ^b^naṅgalamukhānī^eb^ti mātikāmukhāni. tāni hi naṅgalasarikkhakattā naṅgalehi ca khatattā naṅgalamukhānīti vuccanti.

[03] ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha sotaṃ viya vipassanāñāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, ubhato naṅgalamukhānaṃ vivaraṇakālo viya chasu dvāresu saṃvarassa vissaṭṭhakālo, majjhenadiyā rukkhapāde koṭṭetvā palālatiṇamattikāhi āvaraṇe kate udakassa vikkhittavisaṭabyādiṇṇakālo viya pañcahi nīvaraṇehi pariyonaddhakālo, evaṃ āvaraṇe kate vihatavegassa udakassa tiṇapalālādīni ^a^P3.0257^ea^ parikaḍḍhitvā samuddaṃ pāpuṇituṃ asamatthakālo viya vipassanāñāṇena sabbākusale viddhaṃsetvā nibbānasāgaraṃ pāpuṇituṃ asamatthakālo veditabbo. sukkapakkhe vuttavipallāsena yojanā kātabbā. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ. dutiyaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V3.0027^ea^ ^b^padhāniyaṅgānī^eb^ti padhānaṃ vuccati padahanabhāvo, padhānamassa atthīti padhāniyo, padhāniyassa bhikkhuno aṅgānīti padhāniyaṅgāni. ^b^saddho^eb^ti saddhāya samannāgato. saddhā panesā āgamasaddhā adhigamasaddhā okappanasaddhā pasādasaddhāti catubbidhā. tattha sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ saddhā, abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya āgatattā ^b^āgamasaddhā^eb^ nāma. ariyasāvakānaṃ ^a^M3.0027^ea^ paṭivedhena adhigatattā ^b^adhigamasaddhā^eb^ nāma. buddho dhammo saṅghoti vutte acalabhāvena okappanaṃ ^b^okappanasaddhā^eb^ nāma. pasāduppatti ^b^pasādasaddhā^eb^ nāma. idha okappanasaddhā adhippetā. ^b^bodhi^eb^nti catumaggañāṇaṃ. taṃ suppaṭividdhaṃ tathāgatenāti saddahati. desanāsīsameva cetaṃ, iminā pana aṅgena tīsupi ratanesu saddhā adhippetā. yassa hi buddhādīsu pasādo balavā, tassa padhānavīriyaṃ ijjhati.

[03] ^b^appābādho^eb^ti arogo. ^b^appātaṅko^eb^ti niddukkho. ^b^samavepākiniyā^eb^ti samavipākiniyā. ^b^gahaṇiyā^eb^ti kammajatejodhātuyā. ^b^nātisītāya nāccuṇhāyā^eb^ti atisītalaggahaṇiko hi sītabhīruko hoti, accuṇhaggahaṇiko uṇhabhīruko, tesaṃ padhānaṃ na ijjhati, majjhimaggahaṇikassa ijjhati. tenāha -- ^b^majjhimāya padhānakkhamāyā^eb^ti. ^b^yathābhūtaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0258^ea^ ^b^attānaṃ āvikattā^eb^ti yathābhūtaṃ attano aguṇaṃ pakāsetā. ^b^udayatthagāminiyā^eb^ti udayañca atthañca gantuṃ paricchindituṃ samatthāya. etena paññāsalakkhaṇapariggāhakaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^ariyāyā^eb^ti parisuddhāya. ^b^nibbedhikāyā^eb^ti anibbiddhapubbe lobhakkhandhādayo nibbijjhituṃ samatthāya. ^b^sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā^eb^ti tadaṅgavasena kilesānaṃ pahīnattā yaṃ dukkhaṃ khīyati, tassa dukkhassa khayagāminiyā. iti sabbehipi imehi padehi vipassanāpaññāva kathitā. duppaññassa hi padhānaṃ na ijjhati.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^padhānāyā^eb^ti vīriyakaraṇatthāya. ^b^na sukaraṃ uñchena paggahena yāpetu^eb^nti na sakkā hoti pattaṃ gahetvā uñchācariyāya yāpetuṃ. imasmimpi sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.
[03] 55^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^V3.0028^ea^ ^b^pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti pariyādiyitvā gahetvā khepetvā tiṭṭhati. ^b^ugghātitā^eb^ti uddhumātā.

[03] ^b^asihatthenā^eb^ti sīsacchedanatthāya asiṃ ādāya āgatenāpi. ^b^pisācenā^eb^ti khādituṃ āgatayakkhenāpi. ^b^āsīde^eb^ti ghaṭṭeyya. ^b^mañjunā^eb^ti mudukena. ^b^kāmoghavuḷhāna^eb^nti kāmoghena vuḷhānaṃ kaḍḍhitānaṃ. ^b^kālaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0259^ea^ ^b^gati bhavābhava^eb^nti ^a^M3.0028^ea^ vaṭṭakālaṃ gatiñca punappunabbhave ca. ^b^purakkhatā^eb^ti purecārikā purato gatāyeva. ^b^ye ca kāme pariññāyā^eb^ti ye paṇḍitā duvidhepi kāme tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā. ^b^caranti akutobhayā^eb^ti khīṇāsavānaṃ kutoci bhayaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā te akutobhayā hutvā caranti. ^b^pāraṅgatā^eb^ti pāraṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ, taṃ upagatā, sacchikatvā ṭhitāti attho. ^b^āsavakkhaya^eb^nti arahattaṃ. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathetvā gāthāsu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^madhurakajāto^eb^ti sañjātagarubhāvo. ^b^disā ca me na pakkhāyantī^eb^ti catasso disā ca anudisā ca mayhaṃ na upaṭṭhahantīti vadati. ^b^dhammā ca maṃ nappaṭibhantī^eb^ti samathavipassanādhammāpi me na upaṭṭhahanti. ^b^anabhirato ca brahmacariyaṃ carāmī^eb^ti ukkaṇṭhito hutvā brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasāmi. ^b^yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti tassa kathaṃ sutvā ``buddhaveneyyapuggalo aya''nti taṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavato ārocetuṃ upasaṅkami. ^b^avipassakassa kusalānaṃ dhammāna^eb^nti kusaladhamme avipassantassa, anesantassa agavesantassāti attho. ^b^bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammāna^eb^nti satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ sattatiṃsadhammānaṃ.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^jarādhammomhī^eb^ti jarāsabhāvo amhi. ^b^jaraṃ anatīto^eb^ti jaraṃ anatikkanto, antojarāya eva carāmi. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^kammassako^eb^tiādīsu ^a^P3.0260^ea^ kammaṃ mayhaṃ sakaṃ ^a^V3.0029^ea^ attano santakanti kammassako amhi. kammassa dāyādoti ^b^kammadāyādo,^eb^ kammaṃ mayhaṃ dāyajjaṃ santakanti attho. kammaṃ mayhaṃ yoni kāraṇanti ^b^kammayoni^eb^. kammaṃ mayhaṃ bandhūti ^b^kammabandhu,^eb^ kammañātakoti attho. kammaṃ mayhaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ patiṭṭhāti ^b^kammapaṭisaraṇo. tassa dāyādo bhavissāmī^eb^ti tassa kammassa dāyādo tena dinnaphalapaṭiggāhako bhavissāmīti attho. ^b^yobbanamado^eb^ti yobbanaṃ ārabbha uppannamado. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^maggo sañjāyatī^eb^ti lokuttaramaggo sañjāyati. ^b^saṃyojanāni sabbaso pahīyantī^eb^ti dasa saṃyojanāni sabbaso pahīyanti. ^b^anusayā byantīhontī^eb^ti satta anusayā vigatantā paricchinnā parivaṭumā ^a^M3.0029^ea^ honti. evamettha heṭṭhā pañcasu ṭhānesu vipassanā kathitā, imesu pañcasu lokuttaramaggo.

[03] idāni gāthāhi kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto ^b^byādhidhammā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^ñatvā dhammaṃ nirūpadhi^eb^nti upadhirahitaṃ arahattamaggaṃ ñatvā. ^b^sabbe made abhibhosmī^eb^ti sabbe ime tayopi made adhibhaviṃ, atikkamma ṭhitosmīti attho. ^b^nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato^eb^ti pabbajjaṃ khemato disvā. ^b^tassa me ahu ussāho, nibbānaṃ abhipassato^eb^ti tassa mayhaṃ nibbānaṃ abhipassantassa vāyāmo ahosi. ^b^anivatti bhavissāmī^eb^ti pabbajjato anivattiko bhavissāmi, brahmacariyavāsato ^a^P3.0261^ea^ anivattiko, sabbaññutaññāṇato anivattiko bhavissāmi. ^b^brahmacariyaparāyaṇo^eb^ti maggabrahmacariyaparāyaṇo. iminā lokuttaro aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo kathitoti.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^sajjāni dhanūnī^eb^ti sajiyāni āropitadhanūni. ^b^addasū^eb^ti addasaṃsu. ^b^bhavissanti vajjī^eb^ti vaḍḍhissanti vajjirājāno. ^b^apānubhā^eb^ti avaḍḍhinissitā mānathaddhā. ^b^pacchāliyaṃ khipantī^eb^ti pacchato gantvā piṭṭhiṃ pādena paharanti. ^b^raṭṭhikassā^eb^tiādīsu raṭṭhaṃ bhuñjatīti ^b^raṭṭhiko^eb^. pitarā dattaṃ sāpateyyaṃ bhuñjatīti ^b^pettaniko^eb^. senāya pati jeṭṭhakoti ^b^senāpatiko. gāmagāmaṇikassā^eb^ti gāmānaṃ gāmaṇikassa, gāmasāmikassāti attho. ^b^pūgagāmaṇikassā^eb^ti gaṇajeṭṭhakassa. ^b^kulesū^eb^ti tesu tesu kulesu. ^b^paccekādhipaccaṃ kārentī^eb^ti paccekaṃ jeṭṭhakaṭṭhānaṃ kārenti. ^b^kalyāṇena manasā anukampantī^eb^ti sundarena cittena anuggaṇhanti. ^b^khettakammantasāmantasabyohāre^eb^ti ye ca attano khettakammantānaṃ sāmantā anantarakkhettasāmino, te ca rajjudaṇḍehi bhūmippamāṇaggāhake sabbohāre ca. ^b^balipaṭiggāhikā^eb^ ^a^V3.0030^ea^ ^a^P3.0262^ea^ ^b^devatā^eb^ti kulappaveṇiyā āgatā ārakkhadevatā. ^b^sakkarotī^eb^ti tā devatā aggayāgubhattādīhi sakkaroti.

[03] ^b^kiccakaro^eb^ti uppannānaṃ kiccānaṃ kārako. ^b^ye cassa anujīvino^eb^ti ye ca etaṃ upanissāya jīvanti. ^b^ubhinnañceva atthāyā^eb^ti ubhinnampi hitatthāya paṭipanno hotīti attho. ^b^pubbapetāna^eb^nti paralokagatānaṃ. ^b^diṭṭhe dhamme ca jīvata^eb^nti ye ca diṭṭhe dhamme ^a^M3.0030^ea^ jīvanti. iti padadvayenāpi atītapaccuppanne ñātayo dasseti. ^b^vittisañjanano^eb^ti tuṭṭhijanano. ^b^gharamāvasa^eb^nti gharāvāsaṃ vasanto. ^b^pujjo hoti pasaṃsiyo^eb^ti pūjetabbo ca pasaṃsitabbo ca hotīti.

[03] 59-60^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^nipuṇo^eb^ti saṇho sukhumakāraṇaññū. ^b^ākappasampanno^eb^ti samaṇākappena sampanno. dasame ^b^padakkhiṇaggāhī^eb^ti dinnovādaṃ padakkhiṇato gaṇhanto. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] nīvaraṇavaggo paṭhamo.

[03] 61-62^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa paṭhame ^b^mahapphalā^eb^ti vipākaphalena mahapphalā. vipākānisaṃseneva ^b^mahānisaṃsā. amatogadhā^eb^ti nibbānapatiṭṭhā. ^b^sabbaloke^eb^ ^a^P3.0263^ea^ ^b^anabhiratisaññā^eb^ti sabbasmiṃ tedhātusannivese loke ukkaṇṭhitassa uppajjanakasaññā. dutiyaṃ uttānatthameva.
[03] 63-64^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V3.0031^ea^ ^b^varādāyī^eb^ti uttamassa varassa ādāyako. sesamettha catutthe ca uttānatthamevāti.
[03] 65^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^alaṃsākaccho^eb^ti sākacchāya yutto. ^b^āgataṃ pañha^eb^nti pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ. ^b^byākattā hotī^eb^ti vissajjitā hoti.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^M3.0031^ea^ ^b^alaṃsājīvo^eb^ti sājīvāya yutto. ^b^sājīvo^eb^ti pañhapucchanañceva pañhavissajjanañca. sabbepi hi sabrahmacārino pañhaṃ upajīvanti, tenetaṃ pañhapucchanavissajjanaṃ samānājīvatāya sājīvoti vuttaṃ. ^b^kataṃ pañha^eb^nti abhisaṅkhataṃ pañhaṃ.

[03] 67-70^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^ussoḷhī^eb^ti adhimattavīriyaṃ. aṭṭhame attano bodhimaṇḍe paṭividdhe āgamanaiddhipāde kathetvā upari attanova cha abhiññā kathesīti. navamadasamesu vipassanā kathitā. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] saññāvaggo dutiyo.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa ^a^V3.0032^ea^ paṭhame ^b^yato kho, bhikkhave^eb^ti heṭṭhā vuttanayena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattassa bhikkhuno idāni vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ idaṃ āraddhaṃ. tattha ^a^P3.0264^ea^ ^b^yato kho^eb^ti yadā kho. ^b^ukkhittapaligho^eb^ti avijjāpalighaṃ ukkhipitvā apanetvā ṭhito. ^b^saṃkiṇṇaparikho^eb^ti saṃsāraparikhaṃ saṃkiritvā vināsetvā ṭhito. ^b^abbūḷhesiko^eb^ti taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ esikāthambhaṃ abbuyha luñcitvā ṭhito. ^b^niraggaḷo^eb^ti nīvaraṇakavāṭaṃ ugghāṭetvā ṭhito. ^b^pannaddhajo pannabhāro^eb^ti mānaddhajañca khandhābhisaṅkhārakilesabhārañca pātetvā otāretvā ṭhito. ^b^visaṃyutto^eb^ti vaṭṭena visaṃyutto. sesaṃ pāḷinayeneva veditabbaṃ. ettāvatā bhagavatā maggena kilese khepetvā nirodhasayanavaragatassa nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā viharato khīṇāsavassa kālo dassito.

[03] yathā hi dve nagarāni ekaṃ coranagaraṃ ekaṃ khemanagaraṃ. atha ekassa mahāyodhassa evaṃ bhaveyya -- ``yāvimaṃ coranagaraṃ tiṭṭhati, tāva khemanagaraṃ bhayato ^a^M3.0032^ea^ na muccati, coranagaraṃ anagaraṃ karissāmī''ti sannāhaṃ katvā khaggaṃ gahetvā coranagaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nagaradvāre ussāpite esikāthambhe khaggena chinditvā saddhiṃ dvārabāhāhi kavāṭaṃ bhinditvā palighaṃ ukkhipitvā pākāraṃ bhinditvā parikhaṃ vikiritvā nagarasobhatthāya ussite dhaje pātetvā nagaraṃ agginā jhāpetvā khemanagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādaṃ āruyha ñātigaṇaparivuto surasabhojanaṃ bhuñjeyya. evaṃ coranagaraṃ viya sakkāyo, khemanagaraṃ viya nibbānaṃ, mahāyodho viya yogāvacaro. tassevaṃ hoti -- ``yāva sakkāyavaṭṭaṃ vaṭṭati, tāva dvattiṃsakammakāraṇāaṭṭhanavutirogapañcavīsatimahābhayehi ^a^P3.0265^ea^ parimuccanaṃ natthī''ti. so mahāyodho sannāhaṃ viya sīlasannāhaṃ katvā paññākhaggaṃ gahetvā khaggena esikāthambhe viya arahattamaggena taṇhesikaṃ luñcitvā, so yodho sadvārabāhakaṃ nagarakavāṭaṃ viya pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanāggaḷaṃ ugghāṭetvā, so yodho palighaṃ viya avijjāpalighaṃ ukkhipitvā, so yodho pākāraṃ bhindanto parikhaṃ viya kammābhisaṅkhāraṃ bhindanto jātisaṃsāraparikhaṃ vikiritvā, so yodho nagaraṃ sobhatthāya ^a^V3.0033^ea^ ussāpitaddhaje viya mānaddhaje pātetvā sakkāyanagaraṃ jhāpetvā, so yodho khemanagare uparipāsāde subhojanaṃ viya kilesaparinibbānanagaraṃ pavisitvā amataṃ nirodhārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattisukhaṃ anubhavamāno kālaṃ vītināmeti.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^aniccasaññā^eb^ti khandhapañcakaṃ hutvā abhāvākārena aniccanti uppajjanakasaññā. ^b^anicce dukkhasaññā^eb^ti yadaniccaṃ, taṃ paṭipīḷanākārena dukkhanti uppajjanakasaññā. ^b^dukkhe anattasaññā^eb^ti yaṃ dukkhaṃ, taṃ avasavattanākārena anattāti uppajjanakasaññā. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. imesu pana dvīsupi suttesu vipassanāphalaṃ nāma kathitanti.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^divasaṃ atināmetī^eb^ti divasaṃ atikkāmeti. ^b^riñcati paṭisallāna^eb^nti ekībhāvaṃ vissajjeti. ^b^desetī^eb^ti katheti pakāseti. ^b^dhammapaññattiyā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0033^ea^ dhammassa paññāpanāya. ^b^dhammaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0266^ea^ ^b^pariyāpuṇātī^eb^ti navaṅgavasena catusaccadhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti vaḷañjeti katheti. ^b^na riñcati paṭisallāna^eb^nti ekībhāvaṃ na vissajjeti. ^b^anuyuñjati ajjhattaṃ cetosamatha^eb^nti niyakajjhatte cittasamādhiṃ āsevati bhāveti, samathakammaṭṭhāne yuttappayutto hoti.

[03] ^b^hitesinā^eb^ti hitaṃ esantena. ^b^anukampakenā^eb^ti anukampamānena. ^b^anukampaṃ upādāyā^eb^ti anukampaṃ cittena pariggahetvā, paṭiccātipi vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^kataṃ vo taṃ mayā^eb^ti taṃ mayā ime pañca puggale desentena tumhākaṃ kataṃ. ettakameva hi anukampakassa satthu kiccaṃ yadidaṃ aviparītadhammadesanā, ito paraṃ pana paṭipatti nāma sāvakānaṃ kiccaṃ. tenāha -- ^b^etāni bhikkhu rukkhamūlāni...pe0... amhākaṃ anusāsanī^eb^ti. tattha ca ^b^rukkhamūlānī^eb^ti iminā rukkhamūlasenāsanaṃ dasseti. ^b^suññāgārānī^eb^ti iminā janavivittaṭṭhānaṃ. ubhayenāpi ca yogānurūpaṃ senāsanamācikkhati, dāyajjaṃ niyyāteti. ^b^jhāyathā^eb^ti ārammaṇūpanijjhānena aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇāni, lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena ca aniccādito khandhāyatanādīni upanijjhāyatha, samathañca ^a^V3.0034^ea^ vipassanañca vaḍḍhethāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^mā pamādatthā^eb^ti mā pamajjittha. ^b^mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvatthā^eb^ti ye hi pubbe daharakāle ārogyakāle sattasappāyādisampattikāle satthu sammukhībhāvakāle ca yonisomanasikāravirahitā rattindivaṃ maṅkulabhattā hutvā seyyasukhamiddhasukhamanuyuttā pamajjanti, te pacchā jarākāle rogakāle maraṇakāle vipattikāle ^a^P3.0267^ea^ satthu parinibbānakāle ca taṃ pubbe pamādavihāraṃ anussarantā sappaṭisandhikālakiriyañca bhāriyaṃ sampassamānā vippaṭisārino honti. tumhe pana tādisā mā ahuvatthāti etamatthaṃ dassento āha -- ``mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvatthā''ti. ^b^ayaṃ vo amhākaṃ anusāsanī^eb^ti ayaṃ amhākaṃ santikā ``jhāyatha mā pamādatthā''ti tumhākaṃ anusāsanī, ovādoti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^uttari cassa paññāya atthaṃ nappajānātī^eb^ti tato pariyattito uttari tassa dhammassa sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya atthaṃ nappajānāti ^a^M3.0034^ea^, cattāri saccāni na passati nappaṭivijjhatīti attho. sesavāresupi eseva nayo. evametesu dvīsupi suttesu bahussutabhikkhu vipassanākammiko sotāpanno sakadāgāmī anāgāmī khīṇāsavoti cha janā dhammavihārino nāmāti veditabbā.

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^yodhājīvā^eb^ti yuddhūpajīvino. ^b^rajagga^eb^nti hatthiassādīnaṃ pādappahārabhinnāya bhūmiyā uggataṃ rajakkhandhaṃ. ^b^na santhambhatī^eb^ti santhambhitvā ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti. ^b^sahati rajagga^eb^nti rajakkhandhaṃ disvāpi adhivāseti. ^b^dhajagga^eb^nti hatthiassadīnaṃ piṭṭhesu vā rathesu vā ussāpitānaṃ dhajānaṃ aggaṃ. ^b^ussāraṇa^eb^nti hatthiassarathānañceva balakāyassa ca uccāsaddamahāsaddaṃ. ^b^sampahāre^eb^ti samāgate appamattakepi pahāre. ^b^haññatī^eb^ti vihaññati vighātaṃ āpajjati. ^b^byāpajjatī^eb^ti vipattiṃ āpajjati, pakatibhāvaṃ jahati. ^b^sahati sampahāra^eb^nti dve tayo pahāre patvāpi sahati adhivāseti. ^b^tameva^eb^ ^a^P3.0268^ea^ ^b^saṅgāmasīsa^eb^nti taṃyeva jayakkhandhāvāraṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^ajjhāvasatī^eb^ti sattāhamattaṃ abhibhavitvā āvasati. kiṃ kāraṇā ^a^V3.0035^ea^? laddhapahārānaṃ pahārajagganatthañceva katakammānaṃ visesaṃ ñatvā ṭhānantaradānatthañca issariyasukhānubhavanatthañca.

[03] idāni yasmā satthu yodhājīvehi kiccaṃ natthi, imasmiṃ pana sāsane tathārūpe pañca puggale dassetuṃ idaṃ opammaṃ ābhataṃ. tasmā te puggale dassento ^b^evameva kho^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^saṃsīdatī^eb^ti micchāvitakkasmiṃ saṃsīdati anuppavisati. ^b^na sakkoti brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretu^eb^nti brahmacariyavāsaṃ anupacchijjamānaṃ gopetuṃ na sakkoti. ^b^sikkhādubbalyaṃ āvikatvā^eb^ti sikkhāya dubbalabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā. ^b^kimassa rajaggasmi^eb^nti kiṃ tassa puggalassa rajaggaṃ nāmāti vadati. ^b^abhirūpā^eb^ti abhirūpavatī. ^b^dassanīyā^eb^ti dassanayoggā. ^b^pāsādikā^eb^ti dassaneneva cittappasādāvahā. ^b^paramāyā^eb^ti uttamāya. ^b^vaṇṇapokkharatāyā^eb^ti sarīravaṇṇena ceva aṅgasaṇṭhānena ca. ^b^ūhasatī^eb^ti avahasati. ^b^ullapatī^eb^ti katheti. ^b^ujjhagghatī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0035^ea^ pāṇiṃ paharitvā mahāhasitaṃ hasati. ^b^uppaṇḍetī^eb^ti uppaṇḍanakathaṃ katheti. ^b^abhinisīdatī^eb^ti abhibhavitvā santike vā ekāsane vā nisīdati. dutiyapadepi ^a^P3.0269^ea^ eseva nayo. ^b^ajjhottharatī^eb^ti avattharati. ^b^viniveṭhetvā vinimocetvā^eb^ti gahitaṭṭhānato tassā hatthaṃ vinibbeṭhetvā ceva mocetvā ca. sesamettha uttānatthamevāti. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^asicammaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti asiñca cammañca gahetvā. ^b^dhanukalāpaṃ sannayhitvā^eb^ti dhanuñca sarakalāpañca sannayhitvā. ^b^viyūḷha^eb^nti yuddhasannivesavesena ṭhitaṃ. ^b^saṅgāmaṃ otaratī^eb^ti mahāyuddhaṃ otarati. ^b^ussahati vāyamatī^eb^ti ussāhañca vāyāmañca karoti. ^b^hanantī^eb^ti ghātenti. ^b^pariyāpādentī^eb^ti pariyāpādayanti. ^b^upalikkhantī^eb^ti vijjhanti. ^b^apanentī^eb^ti sakasenaṃ gahetvā gacchanti. ^b^apanetvā ñātakānaṃ nentī^eb^ti sakasenaṃ netvā tato ñātakānaṃ santikaṃ nenti. ^b^nīyamāno^eb^ti attano gehaṃ vā sesañātisantikaṃ vā niyyamāno. ^b^upaṭṭhahanti paricarantī^eb^ti pahārasodhanavaṇakappanādīni karontā jagganti gopayanti.

[03] ^b^arakkhiteneva kāyenā^eb^ti arakkhitena kāyadvārena. ^b^arakkhitāya vācāyā^eb^ti arakkhitena vacīdvārena. ^b^arakkhitena cittenā^eb^ti arakkhitena manodvārena. ^b^anupaṭṭhitāya satiyā^eb^ti satiṃ supaṭṭhitaṃ ^a^V3.0036^ea^ akatvā. ^b^asaṃvutehi^eb^ ^a^P3.0270^ea^ ^b^indriyehī^eb^ti manacchaṭṭhehi indriyehi apihitehi agopitehi. ^b^rāgo cittaṃ anuddhaṃsetī^eb^ti rāgo uppajjamānova samathavipassanācittaṃ dhaṃseti, dūre khipati. ^b^rāgapariyuṭṭhitomhi, āvuso, rāgapareto^eb^ti ahaṃ, āvuso, rāgena ratto, rāgena anugato.

[03] ^b^aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā^eb^ appassādaṭṭhena. ^b^maṃsapesūpamā^eb^ bahusādhāraṇaṭṭhena. ^b^tiṇukkūpamā^eb^ anudahanaṭṭhena. ^b^aṅgārakāsūpamā^eb^ mahābhitāpaṭṭhena. ^b^supinakūpamā^eb^ ittarapaccupaṭṭhānaṭṭhena. ^b^yācitakūpamā^eb^ tāvakālikaṭṭhena. ^b^rukkhaphalūpamā^eb^ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgapalibhañjanaṭṭhena. ^b^asisūnūpamā^eb^ adhikuṭṭanaṭṭhena. ^b^sattisūlūpamā^eb^ vinivijjhanaṭṭhena. ^b^sappasirūpamā^eb^ sāsaṅkasappaṭibhayaṭṭhena ^a^M3.0036^ea^. ^b^ussahissāmī^eb^ti ussāhaṃ karissāmi. ^b^dhārayissāmī^eb^ti samaṇabhāvaṃ dhārayissāmi. ^b^abhiramissāmī^eb^ti abhiratiṃ uppādessāmi na ukkaṇṭhissāmi. sesamettha uttānatthameva. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti.

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^āraññakenā^eb^ti araññavāsinā. ^b^appattassā^eb^ti asampattassa jhānavipassanāmaggaphalappabhedassa visesassa pattiyā. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^so mamassa antarāyo^eb^ti so mama jīvitantarāyo ca brahmacariyantarāyo ca, puthujjanakālakiriyaṃ karontassa saggantarāyo ca maggantarāyo ca bhaveyya. ^b^handā^eb^ti vavassaggatthe nipāto. ^b^vīriyaṃ ārabhāmī^eb^ti duvidhampi vīriyaṃ karomi. ^b^satthakā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0271^ea^ satthaṃ viya sandhibandhanacchedakavātā. ^b^vāḷehī^eb^ti kakkhaḷehi. ^b^māṇavehī^eb^ti corehi. ^b^katakammehi vā akatakammehi vā^eb^ti ettha corikaṃ katvā nikkhantā katakammā nāma, corikaṃ kātuṃ gacchantā akatakammā nāma. tattha katakammā kammassa nipphannattā sattānaṃ galalohitaṃ gahetvā devatānaṃ baliṃ karonti, akatakammā ``evaṃ no kammaṃ nipphajjissatī''ti paṭhamataraṃ karonti. idaṃ sandhāya ^b^te maṃ jīvitā voropeyyu^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^vāḷā amanussā^eb^ti kakkhaḷā duṭṭhā yakkhādayo amanussā.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^purā maṃ so dhammo āgacchatī^eb^ti yāva so dhammo maṃ na upagacchati, tāva ^a^V3.0037^ea^ ahaṃ puretarameva vīriyaṃ ārabhāmīti attho. ^b^khīrodakībhūtā^eb^ti khīrodakaṃ viya bhūtā ekībhāvaṃ upagatā. ^b^piyacakkhūhī^eb^ti mettacakkhūhi.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^dhammasandosā vinayasandoso^eb^ti dhammasandosena vinayasandoso hoti. kathaṃ pana dhammasmiṃ dussante vinayo dussati nāma? samathavipassanādhammesu gabbhaṃ aggaṇhantesu pañcavidho vinayo na hoti ^a^M3.0037^ea^, evaṃ dhamme dussante vinayo dussati. dussīlassa pana saṃvaravinayo nāma na hoti, tasmiṃ asati samathavipassanā gabbhaṃ na gaṇhāti. evaṃ vinayasandosenapi dhammasandoso veditabbo. ^b^abhidhammakatha^eb^nti sīlādiuttamadhammakathaṃ. ^b^vedallakatha^eb^nti vedapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ ñāṇamissakakathaṃ. ^b^kaṇhadhammaṃ okkamamānā^eb^ti randhagavesitāya upārambhapariyesanavasena ^a^P3.0272^ea^ kāḷakadhammaṃ okkamamānā. apica duṭṭhacittena puggalaṃ ghaṭṭentāpi taṃ kaṇhadhammaṃ attano dahantāpi lābhasakkāratthaṃ kathentāpi kaṇhadhammaṃ okkamantiyeva.

[03] ^b^gambhīrā^eb^ti pāḷigambhīrā. ^b^gambhīratthā^eb^ti atthagambhīrā. ^b^lokuttarā^eb^ti lokuttaradhammadīpakā. ^b^suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttā^eb^ti khandhadhātuāyatanapaccayākārapaṭisaṃyuttā. ^b^na aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapessantī^eb^ti jānanatthāya cittaṃ na ṭhapessanti. ^b^uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabba^eb^nti uggahetabbe ca vaḷañjetabbe ca. ^b^kavitā^eb^ti silokādibandhanavasena kavīhi katā. ^b^kāveyyā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^bāhirakā^eb^ti sāsanato bahiddhā ṭhitā. ^b^sāvakabhāsitā^eb^ti bāhirasāvakehi bhāsitā. sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayattā suviññeyyattā ca uttānatthameva.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^kalyāṇakāmā^eb^ti sundarakāmā. ^b^rasaggānī^eb^ti uttamarasāni. ^b^saṃsaṭṭhā viharissantī^eb^ti pañcavidhena saṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭhā viharissanti. ^b^sannidhikāraparibhoga^eb^nti sannidhikatassa paribhogaṃ. ^b^oḷārikampi nimitta^eb^nti ettha pathaviṃ khaṇantopi khaṇāhīti āṇāpentopi pathaviyaṃ oḷārikaṃ nimittaṃ karoti nāma. tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṃ chindantopi chindāti āṇāpentopi haritagge ^a^P3.0273^ea^ oḷārikaṃ nimittaṃ karoti nāma. ājīvatthāya paṇṇanivāpāadīni ^a^V3.0038^ea^ gāhāpento phalāni ocinante vā ocināpentena vattabbameva natthi. imesu catūsu suttesu satthārā sāsane vuddhiparihāni kathitāti.
[06] yodhājīvavaggo tatiyo.
[03] 81^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^M3.0038^ea^ paṭhame ^b^rajanīyesū^eb^ti rāgassa paccayesu ārammaṇesu. sesesupi eseva nayo.
[03] 82^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^makkhī^eb^ti guṇamakkhako. ^b^paḷāsī^eb^ti yugaggāhalakkhaṇena paḷāsena samannāgato.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^kuhako^eb^ti tīhi kuhanavatthūhi samannāgato. ^b^lapako^eb^ti lābhasannissitāya lapanāya samannāgato. ^b^nemittiko^eb^ti nimittakiriyakārako. ^b^nippesiko^eb^ti nippesanakatāya samannāgato. ^b^lābhena ca lābhaṃ nijigīsitā^eb^ti lābhena lābhagavesako. sukkapakkho vuttavipallāsavasena veditabbo. catutthaṃ uttānameva.
[03] 85^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^V3.0039^ea^ ^b^akkhamo hoti rūpāna^eb^nti rūpārammaṇānaṃ anadhivāsako hoti, tadārammaṇehi rāgādīhi abhibhuyyati. eseva nayo sabbattha.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^P3.0274^ea^ ^b^atthapaṭisambhidāppatto^eb^ti pañcasu atthesu pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ patto. ^b^dhammapaṭisambhidāppatto^eb^ti catubbidhe dhamme pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ patto. ^b^niruttipaṭisambhidāppatto^eb^ti dhammaniruttīsu pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ patto. ^b^paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāppatto^eb^ti tesu tīsu ñāṇesu pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ patto. so pana tāni tīṇi ñāṇāneva jānāti, na tesaṃ kiccaṃ karoti. ^b^uccāvacānī^eb^ti mahantakhuddakāni. ^b^kiṃkaraṇīyānī^eb^ti iti kattabbāni.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ sattamaṃ ^a^M3.0039^ea^ uttānatthameva. sīlaṃ panettha khīṇāsavasīlameva, bāhusaccampi khīṇāsavabāhusaccameva, vācāpi khīṇāsavassa kalyāṇavācāva, jhānānipi kiriyajjhānāneva kathitānīti veditabbāni.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^thero^eb^ti thirabhāvappatto. ^b^rattaññū^eb^ti pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya atikkantānaṃ bahūnaṃ rattīnaṃ ñātā. ^b^ñāto^eb^ti paññāto pākaṭo. ^b^yasassī^eb^ti yasanissito. ^b^micchādiṭṭhiko^eb^ti ayāthāvadiṭṭhiko. ^b^saddhammā vuṭṭhāpetvā^eb^ti dasakusalakammapathadhammato vuṭṭhāpetvā. ^b^asaddhamme patiṭṭhāpetī^eb^ti akusalakammapathesu patiṭṭhāpeti.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^V3.0040^ea^ ^b^sekhassā^eb^ti sikkhakassa sakaraṇīyassa. ^b^parihānāyā^eb^ti upariguṇehi parihānatthāya. ^b^kammārāmatā^eb^ti navakamme ramanakabhāvo. ^b^bhassārāmatā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0275^ea^ ālāpasallāpe ramanakabhāvo. ^b^niddārāmatā^eb^ti niddāyane ramanakabhāvo. ^b^saṅgaṇikārāmatā^eb^ti gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya ramanakabhāvo. ^b^yathāvimuttaṃ cittaṃ na paccavekkhatī^eb^ti yathā yaṃ cittaṃ vimuttaṃ, ye ca dosā pahīnā, guṇā ca paṭiladdhā, te paccavekkhitvā upariguṇapaṭilābhāya vāyāmaṃ na karotīti attho. iti imasmiṃ sutte sattannaṃ sekhānaṃ upariguṇehi parihānikāraṇañca vuddhikāraṇañca kathitaṃ. yañca nāma sekhassa parihānakāraṇaṃ, taṃ puthujjanassa paṭhamameva hotīti.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^viyatto^eb^ti byatto cheko. ^b^kiṃkaraṇīyesū^eb^ti iti kattabbesu. ^b^cetosamatha^eb^nti samādhikammaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^ananulomikenā^eb^ti sāsanassa ananucchavikena. ^b^atikālenā^eb^ti atipātova. ^b^atidivā^eb^ti divā vuccati majjhanhiko, taṃ atikkamitvā. ^b^ābhisallekhikā^eb^ti ativiya kilesasallekhikā. ^b^cetovivaraṇasappāyā^eb^ti cittavivaraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ samathavipassanānaṃ sappāyā. ^b^appicchakathā^eb^ti appicchā hothāti ^a^M3.0040^ea^ kathanakathā. ^b^santuṭṭhikathā^eb^ti catūhi paccayehi santuṭṭhā hothāti kathanakathā. ^b^pavivekakathā^eb^ti tīhi vivekehi vivittā hothāti kathanakathā. ^b^asaṃsaggakathā^eb^ti pañcavidhena saṃsaggena asaṃsaṭṭhā hothāti kathanakathā. ^b^vīriyārambhakathā^eb^ti duvidhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhathāti kathanakathā. ^b^sīlakathā^eb^dīsu sīlaṃ ārabbha kathā sīlakathā. samādhiṃ ārabbha, paññaṃ ārabbha, pañcavidhaṃ ^a^P3.0276^ea^ vimuttiṃ ārabbha, ekūnavīsatipaccavekkhaṇasaṅkhātaṃ vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ ārabbha kathā vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā. ^b^na nikāmalābhī^eb^tiādīsu na icchiticchitalābhī, dukkhalābhī na vipulalābhīti attho. sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06] theravaggo catuttho.
[03] 91-92^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa ^a^V3.0041^ea^ paṭhame pañca sampadā missikā kathitā. dutiye purimā catasso missikā, pañcamī lokikāva.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^aññābyākaraṇānī^eb^ti arahattabyākaraṇāni. ^b^mandattā^eb^ti mandabhāvena aññāṇena. ^b^momūhattā^eb^ti atimūḷhabhāvena. ^b^aññaṃ byākarotī^eb^ti arahattaṃ pattosmīti katheti. ^b^icchāpakato^eb^ti icchāya abhibhūto. ^b^adhimānenā^eb^ti adhigatamānena. ^b^sammadevā^eb^ti hetunā nayena kāraṇeneva.
[03] 94-95^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^phāsuvihārā^eb^ti sukhavihārā. pañcame ^b^akuppa^eb^nti arahattaṃ.

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^M3.0041^ea^ ^b^appaṭṭho^eb^ti appasamārambho. ^b^appakicco^eb^ti appakaraṇīyo. ^b^subharo^eb^ti sukhena bharitabbo suposo. ^b^susantoso^eb^ti tīhi santosehi suṭṭhu santoso. ^b^jīvitaparikkhāresū^eb^ti jīvitasambhāresu. ^b^appāhāro^eb^ti mandāhāro. ^b^anodarikatta^eb^nti na odarikabhāvaṃ amahagghasabhāvaṃ anuyutto. ^b^appamiddho^eb^ti ^a^P3.0277^ea^ na bahuniddo. sattamaṭṭhamāni uttānatthāni.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^V3.0042^ea^ ^b^sakkaccaññeva deti no asakkacca^eb^nti anavaññāya avirajjhitvāva deti, no avaññāya virajjhitvā. ^b^mā me yoggapatho nassā^eb^ti mayā katayoggapatho mayhaṃ mā nassatu, ``eko sīho uṭṭhāya biḷāraṃ paharanto virajjhitvā paharī''ti evaṃ vattāro mā hontūti attho. ^b^annabhāranesādāna^eb^nti ettha annaṃ vuccati yavabhattaṃ, taṃ bhāro etesanti annabhārā. yācakānaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ. nesādā vuccanti sākuṇikā. iti sabbapacchimāya koṭiyā etesaṃ yācakanesādānampi sakkaccameva deseti.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^attabhāvapaṭilābho^eb^ti sarīrapaṭilābho. ^b^dve vā tīṇi vā māgadhakāni gāmakkhettānī^eb^ti ettha māgadhikaṃ gāmakkhettaṃ atthi khuddakaṃ, atthi majjhimaṃ, atthi mahantaṃ. khuddakaṃ gāmakkhettaṃ ito cattālīsaṃ usabhāni, ito cattālīsanti gāvutaṃ hoti, majjhimaṃ ito gāvutaṃ, ito gāvutanti aḍḍhayojanaṃ hoti, mahantaṃ ito diyaḍḍhagāvutaṃ, ito diyaḍḍhagāvutanti tigāvutaṃ hoti. tesu khuddakena gāmakkhettena tīṇi, khuddakena ca majjhimena ca dve gāmakkhettāni tassa attabhāvo. tigāvutañhissa sarīraṃ. ^b^pariharissāmī^eb^ti paṭijaggissāmi gopayissāmi. ^b^rakkhasseta^eb^nti rakkhassu etaṃ. ^b^moghapuriso^eb^ti tucchapuriso. ^b^nāssassā^eb^ti na ^a^M3.0042^ea^ etassa bhaveyya. ^b^samudācareyyāmā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0278^ea^ katheyyāma. ^b^sammannatī^eb^ti sammānaṃ karoti. ^b^yaṃ tumo karissati tumova tena paññāyissatī^eb^ti yaṃ esa karissati, esova tena kammena pākaṭo bhavissati. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] kakudhavaggo pañcamo.
[06] dutiyapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
[03] 101^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa ^a^M3.0043^ea^ ^a^V3.0043^ea^ paṭhame ^b^vesārajjakaraṇā^eb^ti visāradabhāvāvahā. ^b^sārajjaṃ hotī^eb^ti domanassaṃ hoti.

[03] 102^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^ussaṅkitaparisaṅkito^eb^ti ussaṅkito ca parisaṅkito ca. ^b^api akuppadhammopī^eb^ti api akuppadhammo khīṇāsavo samānopi parehi pāpabhikkhūhi ussaṅkitaparisaṅkito hotīti attho. ^b^vesiyāgocaro^eb^tiādīsu vesiyā vuccanti rūpūpajīviniyo, tā gocaro assāti vesiyāgocaro, tāsaṃ gehaṃ abhiṇhagamanoti attho. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. tattha pana ^b^vidhavā^eb^ti matapatikā. ^b^thullakumārikā^eb^ti mahallikakumārikāyo.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^ito bhogena paṭisantharissāmī^eb^ti ito mama sāpateyyato bhogaṃ gahetvā tena paṭisanthāraṃ karissāmi, tassa ca mama ca antaraṃ pidahissāmīti attho. ^b^gahaṇānī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0279^ea^ parasantakānaṃ bhaṇḍānaṃ gahaṇāni. ^b^guyhamantā^eb^ti guhitabbamantā. ^b^antaggāhikāyā^eb^ti sassataṃ vā ucchedaṃ vā gahetvā ṭhitāya. sesamettha uttānatthameva. catutthe sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[03] 105^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^mettaṃ kāyakamma^eb^nti mettacittena pavattitaṃ kāyakammaṃ. ^b^āvi ceva raho cā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0044^ea^ sammukhe ceva parammukhe ca. itaresupi eseva nayo. ^b^yāni tāni sīlānī^eb^tiādi catupārisuddhisīlavasena vuttaṃ. ^b^samādhisaṃvattanikānī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0044^ea^ maggasamādhiphalasamādhinibbattakāni. ^b^sīlasāmaññagato^eb^ti samānasīlataṃ gato, ekasadisasīlo hutvāti attho. ^b^takkarassā^eb^ti yo naṃ karoti, tassa. iti imasmiṃ sutte sīlaṃ missakaṃ kathitaṃ, diṭṭhi vipassanāsammādiṭṭhīti.

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^no ca paraṃ adhisīle sampavattā hotī^eb^ti paraṃ sīlabhāvena na garahati na upavadati. ^b^attānupekkhī^eb^ti attanova katākataṃ jānanavasena attānaṃ anupekkhitā. ^b^no parānupekkhī^eb^ti parassa katākatesu abyāvaṭo. ^b^apaññāto^eb^ti apākaṭo appapuñño. ^b^apaññātakenā^eb^ti apaññātabhāvena apākaṭatāya mandapuññatāya. ^b^no paritassatī^eb^ti paritāsaṃ nāpajjati. iti imasmiṃ sutte khīṇāsavova kathito.

[03] 107-108^b^.^eb^ sattame sīlasamādhipaññā missikā kathitā, vimutti arahattaphalaṃ ^a^P3.0280^ea^, vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ lokiyameva. aṭṭhamepi eseva nayo. paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ panettha asekhassa pavattattā asekhanti vuttaṃ.
[03] 109-110^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^cātuddiso^eb^ti catūsu disāsu appaṭihatacāro. imasmimpi sutte khīṇāsavova kathito. dasame ^b^ala^eb^nti yutto. idhāpi khīṇāsavova kathito.
[06] phāsuvihāravaggo paṭhamo.

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa ^a^V3.0045^ea^ paṭhame ^b^asanthavavissāsī^eb^ti attanā saddhiṃ santhavaṃ akarontesu vissāsaṃ anāpajjantesuyeva vissāsaṃ karoti. ^b^anissaravikappī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0045^ea^ anissarova samāno ``imaṃ detha, imaṃ gaṇhathā''ti issaro viya vikappeti. ^b^vissaṭṭhupasevī^eb^ti vissaṭṭhāni bhinnakulāni ghaṭanatthāya upasevati. ^b^upakaṇṇakajappī^eb^ti kaṇṇamūle mantaṃ gaṇhāti. sukkapakkho vuttavipariyāyena veditabbo.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^pattapariyāpannaṃ na gaṇhātī^eb^ti upajjhāye nivattitvā ṭhite attano tucchapattaṃ datvā tassa pattaṃ na gaṇhāti, tato vā dīyamānaṃ na gaṇhāti. ^b^na nivāretī^eb^ti idaṃ vacanaṃ āpattivītikkamavacanaṃ nāmāti ^a^P3.0281^ea^ na jānāti. ñatvā vāpi, ``bhante, evarūpaṃ nāma vattuṃ na vaṭṭatī''ti na nivāreti. ^b^kathaṃ opātetī^eb^ti tassa kathaṃ bhinditvā attano kathaṃ paveseti. ^b^jaḷo^eb^ti jaḍo. ^b^eḷamūgo^eb^ti paggharitakheḷamukho. tatiyaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^sīlavā hothā^eb^ti sīlavantā hotha. ^b^ārakkhasatino^eb^ti dvārarakkhikāya satiyā samannāgatā. ^b^nipakkasatino^eb^ti dvārarakkhanakeneva ñāṇena samannāgatassatino. ^b^satārakkhena cetasā samannāgatā^eb^ti satārakkhena cittena samannāgatā. ^b^appabhassā^eb^ti appakathā. ^b^sammādiṭṭhikā^eb^ti kammassakatajjhāna-vipassanāmagga-phalavasena pañcavidhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgatā. apica paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi sammādiṭṭhiyevāti veditabbā.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^V3.0046^ea^ ^b^āvāsamaccharinī^eb^ti āvāsaṃ maccharāyati, tattha aññesaṃ vāsaṃ na sahati. ^b^kulamaccharinī^eb^ti upaṭṭhākakulaṃ maccharāyati, aññesaṃ tattha upasaṅkamanaṃ na sahati. ^b^lābhamaccharinī^eb^ti lābhaṃ maccharāyati, aññesaṃ taṃ uppajjantaṃ na sahati. ^b^vaṇṇamaccharinī^eb^ti guṇaṃ maccharāyati, aññesaṃ guṇakathaṃ na sahati. ^b^dhammamaccharinī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0282^ea^ pariyattidhammaṃ maccharāyati, aññesaṃ dātuṃ na icchati.

[03] 116-117^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^M3.0046^ea^ ^b^saddhādeyyaṃ vinipātetī^eb^ti parehi saddhāya dinnapiṇḍapātato aggaṃ aggahetvā parassa deti. sattame ^b^issukinī^eb^ti issāya samannāgatā. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] andhakavindavaggo dutiyo.
[03] 124^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa catutthe ^b^nappaṭibalo^eb^ti kāyabalena ca ñāṇabalena ca asamannāgato. ^b^āmisantaro^eb^ti āmisahetuko cīvarādīni paccāsīsamāno.
[03] 125-126^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^V3.0047^ea^ ^b^anāyussā^eb^ti āyupacchedanā, na āyuvaḍḍhanā. chaṭṭhepi eseva nayo.

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^nālaṃ saṅghamhā vapakāsitu^eb^nti saṅghato nikkhamitvā ekako vasituṃ na yutto. kāmañcesa saṅghamajjhepi vasituṃ ayuttova asaṅghasobhanatāya, ovādānusāsanippaṭibaddhattā pana nippariyāyeneva saṅghamhā vapakāsituṃ na yutto. ^b^alaṃ saṅghamhā vapakāsitu^eb^nti cātuddisattā saṅghamhā nikkhamma ekako vasituṃ yutto, saṅghasobhanatāya pana saṅghepi vasituṃ yuttoyeva. aṭṭhamaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^āpāyikā^eb^ti apāyagāmino. ^b^nerayikā^eb^ti nirayagāmino. ^b^parikuppā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0283^ea^ parikuppanasabhāvā purāṇavaṇasadisā. ^b^atekicchā^eb^ti akattabbaparikammā. dasamaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06] gilānavaggo tatiyo.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^M3.0047^ea^ paṭhame ^b^dhammenā^eb^ti dasakusaladhammena. ^b^cakka^eb^nti āṇācakkaṃ. ^b^atthaññū^eb^ti rajjatthaṃ jānāti. ^b^dhammaññū^eb^ti paveṇidhammaṃ jānāti. ^b^mattaññū^eb^ti daṇḍe vā balamhi vā pamāṇaṃ jānāti. ^b^kālaññū^eb^ti rajjasukhānubhavanakālaṃ, vinicchayakaraṇakālaṃ, janapadacārikākālañca ^a^V3.0048^ea^ jānāti. ^b^parisaññū^eb^ti ayaṃ parisā khattiyaparisā, ayaṃ brāhmaṇavessasuddasamaṇaparisāti jānāti.

[03] tathāgatavāre ^b^atthaññū^eb^ti pañca atthe jānāti. ^b^dhammaññū^eb^ti cattāro dhamme jānāti. ^b^mattaññū^eb^ti catūsu paccayesu paṭiggahaṇaparibhogamattaṃ jānāti. ^b^kālaññū^eb^ti ayaṃ kālo paṭisallīnassa, ayaṃ samāpattiyā, ayaṃ dhammadesanāya, ayaṃ janapadacārikāyāti evaṃ kālaṃ jānāti. ^b^parisaññū^eb^ti ayaṃ parisā khattiyaparisā...pe0... ayaṃ samaṇaparisāti jānāti. ^b^anuttara^eb^nti navahi lokuttaradhammehi anuttaraṃ. ^b^dhammacakka^eb^nti seṭṭhacakkaṃ.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^pitarā pavattitaṃ cakka^eb^nti cakkavattimhi pabbajite vā kālakate vā cakkaratanaṃ sattāhamattaṃ ṭhatvā antaradhāyati, kathamesa taṃ anuppavatteti nāma? pitu paveṇiyaṃ ^a^P3.0284^ea^ ṭhatvā cakkavattivattaṃ pūretvā cakkavattirajjaṃ kārentopi pitarā pavattitameva anuppavatteti nāma.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ tatiyaṃ tikanipāte vuttanayameva. sevitabbāsevitabbe panettha pacchimapadadvayameva viseso. tattha sammāājīvo sevitabbo, micchāājīvo na sevitabbo. sappāyo gāmanigamo sevitabbo, asappāyo na sevitabbo.

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^M3.0048^ea^ ^b^ubhato^eb^ti dvīhipi pakkhehi. ^b^mātito ca pitito cā^eb^ti yassa hi mātā khattiyā, mātumātā khattiyā, tassāpi mātā khattiyā. pitā khattiyo, pitupitā khattiyo, tassapi pitā khattiyo. so ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca. ^b^saṃsuddhagahaṇiko^eb^ti saṃsuddhāya mātukucchiyā samannāgato. ``samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā''ti ettha pana ^a^V3.0049^ea^ kammajatejodhātu gahaṇīti vuccati. ^b^yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā^eb^ti ettha pitupitā pitāmaho, pitāmahassa yugaṃ pitāmahayugaṃ. yuganti āyuppamāṇaṃ vuccati. abhilāpamattameva cetaṃ, atthato pana pitāmahoyeva pitāmahayugaṃ. tato uddhaṃ sabbepi pubbapurisā pitāmahaggahaṇeneva gahitā. evaṃ yāva sattamo puriso, tāva saṃsuddhagahaṇiko, atha vā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādenāti dasseti. ^b^akkhitto^eb^ti ``apanetha etaṃ, kiṃ iminā''ti evaṃ akkhitto anavakkhitto. ^b^anupakkuṭṭho^eb^ti na upakkuṭṭho na akkosaṃ vā nindaṃ vā pattapubbo. kena ^a^P3.0285^ea^ kāraṇenāti? ^b^jātivādena,^eb^ ``itipi hīnajātiko eso''ti evarūpena vacanenāti attho.
