[03] ^b^aḍḍho^eb^tiādīsu yo koci attano santakena vibhavena aḍḍho hoti. idha pana na kevalaṃ aḍḍhoyeva, ^b^mahaddhano^eb^ mahatā aparimāṇasaṅkhena dhanena samannāgatoti attho. pañcakāmaguṇavasena mahantā uḷārā bhogā assāti ^b^mahābhogo. paripuṇṇakosakoṭṭhāgāro^eb^ti koso vuccati bhaṇḍāgāraṃ, nidahitvā ṭhapitena dhanena paripuṇṇakoso, dhaññena ca paripuṇṇakoṭṭhāgāroti attho. atha vā catubbidho koso hatthī assā rathā raṭṭhanti, tividhaṃ koṭṭhāgāraṃ dhanakoṭṭhāgāraṃ dhaññakoṭṭhāgāraṃ vatthakoṭṭhāgāranti. taṃ sabbampi paripuṇṇamassāti paripuṇṇakosakoṭṭhāgāro. ^b^assavāyā^eb^ti kassaci bahumpi dhanaṃ dentassa senā na suṇāti, sā anassavā nāma hoti. kassaci adentassāpi suṇātiyeva, ayaṃ assavā nāma. ^b^ovādapaṭikarāyā^eb^ti ``idaṃ vo kattabba, idaṃ na kattabba''nti dinnaovādakarāya. ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ti paṇḍiccena samannāgato. ^b^byatto^eb^ti paññāveyyattiyena yutto. ^b^medhāvī^eb^ti ṭhānuppattikapaññāya ^a^M3.0049^ea^ samannāgato. ^b^paṭibalo^eb^ti samattho. ^b^atthe cintetu^eb^nti vaḍḍhiatthe cintetuṃ. so hi paccuppannātthavaseneva ``atītepi evaṃ ahesuṃ, anāgatepi evaṃ bhavissantī''ti cinteti. ^b^vijitāvīna^eb^nti vijitavijayānaṃ, mahantena vā vijayena samannāgatānaṃ. ^b^vimuttacittāna^eb^nti pañcahi vimuttīhi vimuttamānasānaṃ.

[03] 135-136^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^P3.0286^ea^ ^b^negamajānapadassā^eb^ti nigamavāsino ca raṭṭhavāsino ca janassa. ^b^hatthismi^eb^ntiādīhi hatthiassarathatharudhanulekhamuddāgaṇanādīni soḷasa mahāsippāni dassitāni. ^b^anavayo^eb^ti ^a^V3.0050^ea^ samattho paripuṇṇo. sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. chaṭṭhe ^b^oparajja^eb^nti uparājabhāvaṃ.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^purisādhippāyā^eb^ti assaddhammavasena purise uppannādhippāyā purisajjhāsayā. ^b^ādānādhippāyo^eb^ti idāni gahetuṃ sakkhissāmi, idāni sakkhissāmīti evaṃ gahaṇādhippāyo. ^b^visaṃyogādhippāyo^eb^ti idāni nibbānaṃ pāpuṇissāmi, idāni pāpuṇissāmīti evaṃ nibbānajjhāsayo.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^bhattādako^eb^ti bhattakkhādako, bahubhattabhuñjoti attho. ^b^okāsapharaṇo^eb^ti okāsaṃ pharitvā aññesaṃ sambādhaṃ katvā ṭhānena okāsapharaṇo. tattha tattha laṇḍaṃ sāreti pātetīti ^b^laṇḍasāraṇo^eb^. ettakā hatthīti gaṇanakāle salākaṃ gaṇhātīti ^b^salākaggāhī^eb^. nisīdanasayanavasena mañcapīṭhaṃ maddatīti ^b^mañcapīṭhamaddano^eb^. bhikkhugaṇanakāle salākaṃ gaṇhātīti ^b^salākaggāhī^eb^.

[03] 139^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^hatthikāya^eb^nti hatthighaṭaṃ. sesesupi eseva nayo. saṅgāme avacarantīti ^b^saṅgāmāvacarā. ekissā^eb^ ^a^P3.0287^ea^ ^b^vā tiṇodakadattiyā vimānito^eb^ti ^a^M3.0050^ea^ ekadivasaṃ ekena tiṇodakadānena vimānito, ekadivasamattaṃ aladdhatiṇodakoti attho. ito parampi eseva nayo. ^b^ na sakkoti cittaṃ samādahitu^eb^nti ārammaṇe cittaṃ sammā ṭhapetuṃ na sakkoti. sesamettha uttānameva. imasmiṃ pana sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^V3.0051^ea^ ^b^duruttāna^eb^nti na suṭṭhu vuttānaṃ dosavasena pavattitānaṃ pharusavacanānaṃ. ^b^durāgatāna^eb^nti dukkhuppādanākārena sotadvāraṃ āgatānaṃ. ^b^vacanapathāna^eb^nti vacanānaṃ. ^b^dukkhāna^eb^nti dukkhamānaṃ. ^b^tibbāna^eb^nti bahalānaṃ tāpanasabhāvānaṃ vā. ^b^kharāna^eb^nti pharusānaṃ. ^b^kaṭukāna^eb^nti tikhiṇānaṃ. ^b^asātāna^eb^nti amadhurānaṃ. ^b^amanāpāna^eb^nti manaṃ appāyituṃ vaḍḍhetuṃ asamatthānaṃ. ^b^pāṇaharāna^eb^nti jīvitaharānaṃ. ^b^yā sā disā^eb^ti sabbasaṅkhārasamathādivasena dissati apadissatīti nibbānaṃ disāti veditabbaṃ. yasmā pana taṃ āgamma sabbe saṅkhārā samathaṃ gacchanti, tasmā ^b^sabbasaṅkhārasamatho^eb^ti vuttaṃ. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva. imasmiṃ pana sutte sīlasamādhipaññā missikā kathitāti.
[06] rājavaggo catuttho.

[03] 141^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa ^a^P3.0288^ea^ paṭhame ^b^saṃvāsenā^eb^ti ekatovāsena. ^b^ādeyyamukho^eb^ti ādiyanamukho, gahaṇamukhoti attho. ^b^tamenaṃ datvā avajānātī^eb^ti ``ayaṃ dinnaṃ paṭiggahetumeva jānātī''ti evaṃ avamaññati. ^b^tamenaṃ saṃvāsena avajānātī^eb^ti appamattake kismiñcideva kujjhitvā ``jānāmahaṃ tayā katakammaṃ, ettakaṃ addhānaṃ ahaṃ kiṃ karonto vasiṃ, nanu tuyhameva katākataṃ vīmaṃsanto''tiādīni vattā hoti. atha itaro ``addhā koci mayhaṃ doso bhavissatī''ti kiñci paṭippharituṃ na sakkoti. ^b^taṃ khippaññeva adhimuccitā hotī^eb^ti taṃ vaṇṇaṃ vā avaṇṇaṃ vā sīghameva ^a^M3.0051^ea^ saddahati. saddahanaṭṭhena hi ādānena esa ādiyanamukhoti vutto. ^b^ādheyyamukho^eb^ti pāḷiyā ^a^V3.0052^ea^ pana ṭhapitamukhoti attho. magge khaṭāavāṭo viya āgatāgataṃ udakaṃ vaṇṇaṃ vā avaṇṇaṃ vā saddahanavasena sampaṭicchituṃ ṭhapitamukhoti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^ittarasaddho^eb^ti parittakasaddho. ^b^kusalākusale dhamme na jānātī^eb^tiādīsu kusale dhamme ``ime kusalā''ti na jānāti, akusale dhamme ``ime akusalā''ti na jānāti. tathā sāvajje sadosadhamme ``ime sāvajjā''ti, anavajje ca niddosadhamme ``ime anavajjā''ti, hīne hīnāti, paṇīte paṇītāti. ^b^kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge^eb^ti ``ime kaṇhā sukke paṭibāhetvā ṭhitattā sappaṭibhāgā nāma, ime ca sukkā kaṇhe paṭibāhitvā ṭhitattā sappaṭibhāgā''ti na jānāti.

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^P3.0289^ea^ ^b^ārabhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī^eb^ti āpattivītikkamanavasena ārabhati ceva, tappaccayā ca vippaṭisārī hoti. ^b^cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimutti^eb^nti arahattasamādhiñceva arahattaphalañāṇañca. ^b^nappajānātī^eb^ti anadhigatattā na jānāti. ^b^ārabhati na vippaṭisārī hotī^eb^ti āpattiṃ āpajjati, vuṭṭhitattā pana na vippaṭisārī hoti. ^b^nārabhati vippaṭisārī hotī^eb^ti sakiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya pacchā kiñcāpi nāpajjati, vippaṭisāraṃ pana vinodetuṃ na sakkoti. ^b^nārabhati na vippaṭisārī hotī^eb^ti na ceva āpattiṃ āpajjati, na ca vippaṭisārī hoti. ^b^tañca cetovimuttiṃ...pe0... nirujjhantī^eb^ti arahattaṃ pana appatto hoti. pañcamanayena khīṇāsavo kathito.

[03] ^b^ārambhajā^eb^ti āpattivītikkamasambhavā. ^b^vippaṭisārajā^eb^ti vippaṭisārato jātā. ^b^pavaḍḍhantī^eb^ti punappunaṃ uppajjanena vaḍḍhanti. ^b^ārambhaje āsave pahāyā^eb^ti vītikkamasambhave āsave āpattidesanāya vā āpattivuṭṭhānena vā pajahitvā. ^b^paṭivinodetvā^eb^ti suddhante ṭhitabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena nīharitvā. ^b^cittaṃ paññañca bhāvetū^eb^ti vipassanācittañca taṃsampayuttaṃ paññañca bhāvetu. sesaṃ iminā upāyeneva veditabbanti.

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V3.0053^ea^ ^a^M3.0052^ea^ ^b^kāmādhimuttāna^eb^nti vatthukāmakilesakāmesu adhimuttānaṃ. ^b^dhammānudhammappaṭipanno^eb^ti navalokuttaradhammatthāya ^a^P3.0290^ea^ sahasīlakaṃ pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno paṭipattipūrako puggalo dullabho lokasmiṃ.

[03] 144^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^appaṭikūle^eb^ti appaṭikūlārammaṇe. ^b^paṭikūlasaññī^eb^ti paṭikūlanti evaṃsaññī. esa nayo sabbattha. kathaṃ panāyaṃ evaṃ viharatīti? iṭṭhasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ pana asubhāya vā pharati, aniccato vā upasaṃharati. evaṃ tāva appaṭikūle paṭikūlasaññī viharati. aniṭṭhasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ mettāya vā pharati, dhātuto vā upasaṃharati. evaṃ paṭikūle appaṭikūlasaññī viharati. ubhayasmiṃ pana purimanayassa ca pacchimanayassa ca vasena tatiyacatutthavārā vuttā, chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena pañcamo. chaḷaṅgupekkhā cesā khīṇāsavassa upekkhāsadisā, na pana khīṇāsavupekkhā. tattha ^b^upekkhako vihareyyā^eb^ti majjhattabhāve ṭhito vihareyya. ^b^kvacanī^eb^ti kismiñci ārammaṇe. ^b^katthacī^eb^ti kismiñci padese. ^b^kiñcana^eb^ti koci appamattakopi. iti imasmiṃ sutte pañcasu ṭhānesu vipassanāva kathitā. taṃ āraddhavipassako bhikkhu kātuṃ sakkoti, ñāṇavā paññuttaro bahussutasamaṇopi kātuṃ sakkoti. sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmino kātuṃ sakkontiyeva, khīṇāsave vattabbameva natthīti. pañcamaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 146^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^kammantaṃ kāretī^eb^ti khettādikammantaṃ kāreti. ^b^adhikaraṇaṃ ādiyatī^eb^ti cattāri adhikaraṇāni ādiyati. ^b^pāmokkhesu bhikkhūsū^eb^ti disāpāmokkhesu bhikkhūsu. ^b^paṭiviruddho^eb^ ^a^P3.0291^ea^ ^b^hotī^eb^ti paccanīkaggāhitāya viruddho hoti. ^b^anavatthacārika^eb^nti anavatthānacārikaṃ.

[03] 147^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^V3.0054^ea^ ^a^M3.0053^ea^ ^b^asakkaccaṃ detī^eb^ti na sakkaritvā suciṃ katvā deti. ^b^acittīkatvā detī^eb^ti acittīkārena agāravavasena deti. ^b^apaviddhaṃ detī^eb^ti na nirantaraṃ deti, atha vā chaḍḍetukāmo viya deti. ^b^anāgamanadiṭṭhiko detī^eb^ti katassa nāma phalaṃ āgamissatīti na evaṃ āgamanadiṭṭhiṃ na uppādetvā deti.

[03] sukkapakkhe ^b^cittīkatvā detī^eb^ti deyyadhamme ca dakkhiṇeyyesu ca cittīkāraṃ upaṭṭhapetvā deti. tattha deyyadhammaṃ paṇītaṃ ojavantaṃ katvā dento deyyadhamme cittīkāraṃ upaṭṭhapeti nāma. puggalaṃ vicinitvā dento dakkhiṇeyyesu cittīkāraṃ upaṭṭhapeti nāma. ^b^sahatthā detī^eb^ti āṇattiyā parahatthena adatvā ``anamatagge saṃsāre vicarantena me hatthapādānaṃ aladdhakālassa pamāṇaṃ nāma natthi, vaṭṭamokkhaṃ bhavanissaraṇaṃ karissāmī''ti sahattheneva deti. ^b^āgamanadiṭṭhiko^eb^ti ``anāgatabhavassa paccayo bhavissatī''ti kammañca vipākañca saddahitvā detīti.

[03] 148^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^saddhāyā^eb^ti dānañca dānaphalañca saddahitvā. ^b^kālenā^eb^ti yuttappattakālena. ^b^anaggahitacitto^eb^ti aggahitacitto muttacāgo hutvā. ^b^anupahaccā^eb^ti anupaghātetvā guṇe amakkhetvā. ^b^kālāgatā cassa atthā pacurā hontī^eb^ti atthā āgacchamānā vayovuḍḍhakāle ^a^P3.0292^ea^ anāgantvā yuttappattakāle paṭhamavayasmiṃyeva āgacchanti ceva bahū ca honti.
[03] 149^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^samayavimuttassā^eb^ti appitappitakkhaṇeyeva vikkhambhitehi kilesehi vimuttattā samayavimuttisaṅkhātāya lokiyavimuttiyā vimuttacittassa. dasamaṃ uttānatthameva.
[06] tikaṇḍakīvaggo pañcamo.
[06] tatiyapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 151^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^V3.0055^ea^ ^a^M3.0054^ea^ paṭhame ^b^abhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammatta^eb^nti kusalesu dhammesu sammattabhūtaṃ magganiyāmaṃ okkamituṃ abhabbo abhājanaṃ. ^b^kathaṃ paribhotī^eb^tiādīsu ``kiṃ kathā nāma esā''ti vadanto ^b^kathaṃ paribhoti^eb^ nāma. ``kiṃ nāmesa katheti, kiṃ ayaṃ jānātī''ti vadanto ^b^kathikaṃ paribhoti^eb^ nāma. ``mayaṃ kiṃ jānāma, kuto amhākaṃ etaṃ sotuṃ bala''nti vadanto ^b^attānaṃ paribhoti^eb^ nāma. vipariyāyena sukkapakkho veditabbo.
[03] 152^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^anaññāte aññātamānī^eb^ti aviññātasmiṃyeva ``viññātamidaṃ mayā''ti evaṃmānī.

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^makkhī dhammaṃ suṇātī^eb^ti makkhī hutvā guṇamakkhanacittena dhammaṃ suṇāti. ^b^upārambhacitto^eb^ti niggahāropanacitto. ^b^randhagavesī^eb^ti guṇarandhaṃ guṇacchiddaṃ gavesanto.

[03] 154^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^P3.0293^ea^ ^b^na sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇantī^eb^ti ohitasotā sukatakārino hutvā na suṇanti ^a^V3.0056^ea^. ^b^na pariyāpuṇantī^eb^ti yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ vaḷañjantāpi sakkaccaṃ na vaḷañjenti. pañcamaṃ uttānameva.
[03] 156^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^appaṭisaraṇo^eb^ti appatiṭṭho. ācariyā hi suttantassa paṭisaraṇaṃ nāma, tesaṃ abhāvā appaṭisaraṇo hoti. sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^M3.0055^ea^ ^b^puggalaṃ upanidhāyā^eb^ti taṃ taṃ puggalaṃ upanikkhipitvā, sakkhiṃ katvāti attho. ^b^kacchamānāyā^eb^ti kathiyamānāya. sesamettha aṭṭhamañca uttānatthamevāti.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathessāmī^eb^ti dānānantaraṃ sīlaṃ, sīlānantaraṃ sagganti evaṃ desanānupubbiṃ kathaṃ vā, yaṃ yaṃ suttapadaṃ vā gāthāpadaṃ vā nikkhittaṃ hoti, tassa tassa anurūpakathaṃ kathessāmīti cittaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā paresaṃ dhammo desetabbo. ^b^pariyāyadassāvī^eb^ti tassa tassa atthassa taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ dassento. kāraṇañhi idha pariyāyoti vuttaṃ. ^b^anuddayataṃ paṭiccā^eb^ti ``mahāsambādhappatte satte sambādhato mocessāmī''ti anukampaṃ āgamma. ^b^na āmisantaro^eb^ti na āmisahetuko, attano catupaccayalābhaṃ anāsīsantoti attho. ^b^attānañca parañca anupahaccā^eb^ti attukkaṃsanaparavambhanādivasena attānañca parañca guṇupaghātena anupahantvā.

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^duppaṭivinodayā^eb^ti yāni hassādīni kiccāni nipphādetuṃ ^a^P3.0294^ea^ ṭhānāni uppannāni honti, tesu matthakaṃ asampattesu antarāyeva dunnīhārā duvikkhambhayā honti. ^b^paṭibhāna^eb^nti ^a^V3.0057^ea^ kathetukāmatā vuccati. imāni pañca duppaṭivinodayāni, na suppaṭivinodayāni. upāyena pana kāraṇena anurūpāhi paccavekkhaṇānusāsanādīhi sakkā paṭivinodetunti.
[06] saddhammavaggo paṭhamo.

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa ^a^M3.0056^ea^ paṭhame āghātaṃ paṭivinenti vūpasamentīti ^b^āghātapaṭivinayā. yattha bhikkhuno uppanno āghāto sabbaso paṭivinetabbo^eb^ti yattha ārammaṇe bhikkhuno āghāto uppanno hoti, tattha so sabbo imehi pañcahi paṭivinodetabboti attho. ^b^mettā tasmiṃ puggale bhāvetabbā^eb^ti tikacatukkajjhānavasena mettā bhāvetabbā. ^b^karuṇāya^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^upekkhā^eb^ pana catukkapañcakajjhānavasena bhāvetabbā. yasmā pana yaṃ puggalaṃ passato cittaṃ na nibbāti, tasmiṃ muditā na saṇṭhahati, tasmā sā na vuttā. ^b^asatiamanasikāro^eb^ti yathā so puggalo na upaṭṭhāti, kuṭṭādīhi antarito viya hoti, evaṃ tasmiṃ asatiamanasikāro āpajjitabbo. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānameva.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ dutiye āghāto etesu paṭivinetabboti ^b^āghātapaṭivinayā^eb^ ^a^P3.0295^ea^. āghāto etehi paṭivinetabbotipi ^b^āghātapaṭivinayā^eb^. paṭivinayoti hi paṭivinayavatthūnampi paṭivinayakāraṇānampi etaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tadubhayampi idha vaṭṭati. pañca hi puggalā paṭivinayavatthū honti pañcahi upamāhi pañca paṭipattiyo paṭivinayakāraṇāni. ^b^labhati ca kālena kālaṃ cetaso ^a^V3.0058^ea^ vivaraṃ cetaso pasāda^eb^nti kāle kāle samathavipassanācittassa uppannokāsasaṅkhātaṃ vivarañceva saddhāsampannabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ pasādañca labhati.

[03] ^b^rathiyāyā^eb^ti antaravīthiyaṃ. ^b^nantaka^eb^nti pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ. ^b^niggahetvā^eb^ti akkamitvā. ^b^yo tattha sāro^eb^ti yaṃ tattha thiraṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^taṃ paripātetvā^eb^ti taṃ luñcitvā. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha paṃsukūliko viya mettāvihārī daṭṭhabbo, rathiyāya nantakaṃ viya veripuggalo, dubbalaṭṭhānaṃ viya aparisuddhakāyasamācāratā, thiraṭṭhānaṃ viya parisuddhavacīsamācāratā, dubbalaṭṭhānaṃ chaḍḍetvā thiraṭṭhānaṃ ādāya gantvā sibbitvā rajitvā pārupitvā ^a^M3.0057^ea^ vicaraṇakālo viya aparisuddhakāyasamācārataṃ amanasikatvā parisuddhavacīsamācārataṃ manasikatvā verimhi cittuppādaṃ nibbāpetvā phāsuvihārakālo daṭṭhabbo.

[03] ^b^sevālapaṇakapariyonaddhā^eb^ti sevālena ca udakapappaṭakena ca paṭicchannā. ^b^ghammapareto^eb^ti ghammena anugato. ^b^kilanto^eb^ti ^a^P3.0296^ea^ maggakilanto. ^b^tasito^eb^ti taṇhābhibhūto. ^b^pipāsito^eb^ti pānīyaṃ pātukāmo. ^b^apaviyūhitvā^eb^ti apanetvā. ^b^pivitvā^eb^ti pasannaudakaṃ pivitvā. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha ghammābhitatto puriso viya mettāvihārī daṭṭhabbo, sevālapaṇakaṃ viya aparisuddhavacīsamācāratā, pasannaudakaṃ viya parisuddhakāyasamācāratā, sevālapaṇakaṃ apabyūhitvā pasannodakaṃ pivitvā gamanaṃ viya aparisuddhavacīsamācārataṃ amanasikatvā parisuddhakāyasamācārataṃ manasikatvā verimhi cittuppādaṃ nibbāpetvā phāsuvihārakālo daṭṭhabbo.

[03] ^b^khobhessāmī^eb^ti cālessāmi. ^b^loḷessāmī^eb^ti ākulaṃ karissāmi. ^b^apeyyampi taṃ karissāmī^eb^ti pivituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ karissāmi. ^b^catukkuṇḍiko^eb^ti jāṇūhi ca hatthehi ca bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhānena catukkuṇḍiko hutvā. ^b^gopītakaṃ pivitvā^eb^ti gāviyo viya mukhena ākaḍḍhento pivitvā. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha ghammābhitatto puriso viya mettāvihārī daṭṭhabbo, gopadaṃ viya veripuggalo, gopade parittaudakaṃ viya tassabbhantare parittaguṇo, catukkuṇḍikassa gopītakaṃ pivitvā pakkamanaṃ viya tassa aparisuddhakāyavacīsamācārataṃ amanasikatvā yaṃ so kālena kālaṃ ^a^P3.0297^ea^ dhammassavanaṃ nissāya cetaso vivarappasādasaṅkhātaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ labhati, taṃ manasikatvā cittuppādanibbāpanaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^ābādhiko^eb^ti ^a^V3.0059^ea^ iriyāpathabhañjanakena visabhāgābādhena ābādhiko. ^b^puratopissā^eb^ti puratopi bhaveyya. ^b^anayabyasana^eb^nti avaḍḍhivināsaṃ. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha so anāthagilāno viya sabbakaṇhadhammasamannāgato puggalo, addhānamaggo viya anamataggasaṃsāro, purato ca pacchato ca gāmānaṃ dūrabhāvo viya nibbānassa dūrabhāvo, sappāyabhojanānaṃ alābho viya sāmaññaphalabhojanānaṃ alābho, sappāyabhesajjānaṃ alābho ^a^M3.0058^ea^ viya samathavipassanānaṃ abhāvo, patirūpaupaṭṭhākānaṃ alābho viya ovādānusāsanīhi kilesatikicchakānaṃ abhāvo, gāmantanāyakassa alābho viya nibbānasampāpakassa tathāgatassa vā tathāgatasāvakassa vā aladdhabhāvo, aññatarassa purisassa disvā kāruññupaṭṭhānaṃ viya tasmiṃ puggale mettāvihārikassa kāruññaṃ uppādetvā cittanibbāpanaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^acchodakā^eb^ti pasannodakā. ^b^sātodakā^eb^ti madhurodakā. ^b^sītodakā^eb^ti tanusītasalilā. ^b^setakā^eb^ti ūmibhijjanaṭṭhānesu setavaṇṇā. ^b^supatitthā^eb^ti samatitthā. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha ghammābhitatto puriso viya mettāvihārī daṭṭhabbo, sā pokkharaṇī viya parisuddhasabbadvāro puriso, nhatvā pivitvā paccuttaritvā rukkhacchāyāya nipajjitvā yathākāmaṃ gamanaṃ viya tesu dvāresu ^a^P3.0298^ea^ yaṃ icchati, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittanibbāpanaṃ veditabbaṃ. tatiyacatutthāni heṭṭhā vuttanayāneva.
[03] 165^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^paribhava^eb^nti paribhavanto, evaṃ paribhavissāmīti paribhavanatthāya pucchatīti attho. ^b^aññātukāmo^eb^ti jānitukāmo hutvā.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^atthetaṃ ṭhāna^eb^nti atthi etaṃ kāraṇaṃ. ^b^no ce diṭṭheva dhamme aññaṃ ārādheyyā^eb^ti no ce imasmiṃyeva attabhāve arahattaṃ pāpuṇeyya. ^b^kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ devāna^eb^nti kāmāvacaradevānaṃ. ^b^aññataraṃ manomayaṃ kāya^eb^nti jhānamanena nibbattaṃ aññataraṃ suddhāvāsabrahmakāyaṃ. ^b^udāyī^eb^ti lāḷudāyī. so hi ``manomaya''nti sutvā ``āruppe na bhavitabba''nti ^a^V3.0060^ea^ paṭibāhi. thero ``sāriputto kiṃ jānāti, yassa sammukhā evaṃ bhikkhū vacanaṃ paṭikkosantī''ti evaṃ bālānaṃ laddhiuppattipaṭibāhanatthaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ anadhivāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.

[03] ^b^atthi nāmā^eb^ti amarisanatthe nipāto. teneva cettha ``ajjhupekkhissathā''ti anāgatavacanaṃ kataṃ. ayañhetthattho -- ānanda, tumhe theraṃ ^a^M3.0059^ea^ bhikkhuṃ viheṭhiyamānaṃ ajjhupekkhatha, na vo etaṃ marisayāmi na sahāmi nādhivāsemīti. kasmā pana bhagavā ānandatheraṃyeva evamāhāti? dhammabhaṇḍāgārikattā. dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa hi evaṃ vadanto paṭibāhituṃ bhāro. apicesa sāriputtattherassa piyasahāyo, tenāpissa esa bhāro. tattha kiñcāpi bhagavā ^a^P3.0299^ea^ ānandattheraṃ garahanto evamāha, na panesā tasseva garahā, sammukhībhūtānaṃ sabbesaṃyeva garahāti veditabbā. ^b^vihāra^eb^nti gandhakuṭiṃ.

[03] ^b^anacchariya^eb^nti na acchariyaṃ. ^b^yathā^eb^ti kāraṇavacanaṃ. ^b^āyasmantaṃyevettha upavānaṃ paṭibhāseyyā^eb^ti ettha bhagavatā ca evaṃ etadeva kāraṇaṃ ārabbha udāhaṭe āyasmatoyeva upavānassa paṭivacanaṃ paṭibhātu upaṭṭhātūti dīpeti. ^b^sārajjaṃ okkanta^eb^nti domanassaṃ anupaviṭṭhaṃ. ^b^sīlavā^eb^tiādīhi khīṇāsavasīlādīniyeva kathitāni. ^b^khaṇḍiccenā^eb^tiādīni sakkārādīnaṃ kāraṇapucchāvasena vuttāni. kiṃ khaṇḍiccādīhi kāraṇehi taṃ taṃ sabrahmacāriṃ sakkareyyunti ayañhettha adhippāyo.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^codakenā^eb^ti vatthusandassanā āpattisandassanā saṃvāsappaṭikkhepo sāmīcippaṭikkhepoti catūhi codanāvatthūhi codayamānena. ^b^kālena vakkhāmi no akālenā^eb^ti ettha cuditakassa kālo kathito, na codakassa. paraṃ codentena hi parisamajjhe vā uposathapavāraṇagge vā āsanasālābhojanasālādīsu vā na codetabbo, divāṭṭhāne nisinnakāle ``karotāyasmā okāsaṃ, ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ vattukāmo''ti evaṃ okāsaṃ kāretvā codetabbo. puggalaṃ pana upaparikkhitvā yo lolapuggalo abhūtaṃ vatvā bhikkhūnaṃ ayasaṃ āropeti, so okāsakammaṃ vināpi codetabbo. ^b^bhūtenā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0300^ea^ tacchena sabhāvena. ^b^saṇhenā^eb^ti maṭṭhena mudukena. ^b^atthasaṃhitenā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0061^ea^ atthakāmatāya hitakāmatāya upetena. ^b^avippaṭisāro upadahātabbo^eb^ti amaṅkubhāvo upanetabbo. ^b^alaṃ^eb^ ^a^M3.0060^ea^ ^b^te avippaṭisārāyā^eb^ti yuttaṃ te amaṅkubhāvāya. sesamettha uttānamevāti. aṭṭhamaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā pākaṭameva.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ navame khippaṃ nisāmayati upadhāretīti ^b^khippanisanti^eb^. suggahitaṃ katvā gaṇhātīti ^b^suggahitaggāhī. atthakusalo^eb^ti aṭṭhakathāya cheko. ^b^dhammakusalo^eb^ti pāḷiyaṃ cheko. ^b^niruttikusalo^eb^ti niruttivacanesu cheko. ^b^byañjanakusalo^eb^ti akkharappabhede cheko. ^b^pubbāparakusalo^eb^ti atthapubbāparaṃ, dhammapubbāparaṃ, akkharapubbāparaṃ, byañjanapubbāparaṃ, anusandhipubbāparanti imasmiṃ pañcavidhe pubbāpare cheko. tattha ^b^atthapubbāparakusalo^eb^ti heṭṭhā atthena upari atthaṃ jānāti, upari atthena heṭṭhā atthaṃ jānāti. kathaṃ? so hi heṭṭhā atthaṃ ṭhapetvā upari atthe vutte ``heṭṭhā attho atthī''ti jānāti. upari atthaṃ ṭhapetvā heṭṭhā atthe vuttepi ``upari attho atthī''ti jānāti. ubhato ṭhapetvā majjhe atthe vutte ``ubhato attho atthī''ti jānāti. majjhe atthaṃ ṭhapetvā ubhatobhāgesu atthe vutte ``majjhe attho atthī''ti jānāti. ^b^dhammapubbāparā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^anusandhipubbāpare^eb^ pana sīlaṃ ādiṃ katvā āraddhe suttante matthake chasu abhiññāsu ^a^P3.0301^ea^ āgatāsu ``yathānusandhiṃ yathānuparicchedaṃ suttanto gato''ti jānāti. diṭṭhivasena āraddhe upari saccesu āgatesupi ``yathānusandhinā gato''ti jānāti. kalahabhaṇḍanavasena āraddhe upari sāraṇīyadhammesu āgatesupi, dvattiṃsatiracchānakathāvasena āraddhe upari dasakathāvatthūsu (a0 ni0 10.69; udā031) āgatesupi ``yathānusandhinā gato''ti jānātīti.

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^abhibhū^eb^ti abhibhavitvā ṭhito jeṭṭhako. ^b^anabhibhūto^eb^ti aññehi anabhibhūto. ^b^aññadatthū^eb^ti ekaṃsavacane nipāto. dassanavasena ^b^daso,^eb^ sabbaṃ passatīti adhippāyo. ^b^vasavattī^eb^ti sabbaṃ janaṃ vase vatteti. ^b^yathā passato^eb^ti iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ vā hotu aniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ vā ^a^M3.0061^ea^, yenākārena taṃ passantassa. ^b^anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hotī^eb^ti anantarāyeva arahattaṃ ^a^V3.0062^ea^ uppajjati. ^b^yathā suṇato^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. atha vā yaṃ cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nirantarameva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, taṃ tassa arahattaṃ cakkhuviññāṇānantaraṃ nāma hoti. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ^b^idaṃ dassanānaṃ agga^eb^nti. dutiyapadepi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^yathā sukhitassā^eb^ti yena maggasukhena sukhitassa. ^b^anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hotī^eb^ti samanantarameva arahattaṃ uppajjati. ^b^idaṃ sukhānaṃ agga^eb^nti idaṃ maggasukhaṃ sukhānaṃ uttamaṃ. ^b^yathā saññissā^eb^ti idhāpi maggasaññāva adhippetā. ^b^yathā bhūtassā^eb^ti yasmiṃ bhave yasmiṃ attabhāve ṭhitassa. ^b^anantarā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0302^ea^ anantarāyena arahattaṃ uppajjati.. ^b^idaṃ bhavānaṃ agga^eb^nti ayaṃ pacchimo attabhāvo bhavānaṃ aggaṃ nāma. atha vā ^b^yathā bhūtassā^eb^ti yehi khandhehi maggakkhaṇe bhūtassa vijjamānassa. ^b^anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hotī^eb^ti maggānantarameva phalaṃ uppajjati. ^b^idaṃ bhavānaṃ agga^eb^nti idaṃ maggakkhaṇe khandhapañcakaṃ bhavānaṃ aggaṃ nāmāti.
[06] āghātavaggo dutiyo.
[03] 171-173^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa paṭhamadutiyatatiyesu agāriyappaṭipatti kathitā. sotāpannasakadāgāminopi hontu, vaṭṭantiyeva.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^bhayānī^eb^ti cittutrāsabhayāni. ^b^verānī^eb^ti akusalaverānipi puggalaverānipi ^a^V3.0063^ea^. ^b^cetasika^eb^nti cittanissitaṃ. ^b^dukkha^eb^nti kāyapasādavatthukaṃ dukkhaṃ. ^b^domanassa^eb^nti domanassavedanaṃ. imasmiṃ sutte viratipahānaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^M3.0062^ea^ ^b^upāsakapatikuṭṭho^eb^ti upāsakapacchimako. ^b^kotūhalamaṅgaliko^eb^ti ``iminā idaṃ bhavissatī''ti evaṃ pavattattā kotūhalasaṅkhātena diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalena samannāgato. ^b^maṅgalaṃ pacceti no kamma^eb^nti maṅgalaṃ oloketi, kammaṃ na oloketi. ^b^ito ca bahiddhā^eb^ti imamhā sāsanā bahiddhā. ^b^pubbakāraṃ karotī^eb^ti dānādikaṃ kusalakiccaṃ paṭhamataraṃ karoti.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^P3.0303^ea^ ^b^kinti maya^eb^nti kena nāma upāyena mayaṃ. ^b^pavivekaṃ pīti^eb^nti paṭhamadutiyajjhānāni nissāya uppajjanakapītiṃ. ^b^kāmūpasaṃhita^eb^nti kāmanissitaṃ duvidhe kāme ārabbha uppajjanakaṃ. ^b^akusalūpasaṃhita^eb^nti ``migasūkarādayo vijjhissāmī''ti saraṃ khipitvā tasmiṃ viraddhe ``viraddhaṃ mayā''ti evaṃ akusale nissāya uppajjanakaṃ. tādisesu pana ṭhānesu avirajjhantassa ``suṭṭhu me viddhaṃ, suṭṭhu me pahaṭa''nti uppajjanakaṃ ^b^akusalūpasaṃhitaṃ sukhaṃ somanassaṃ^eb^ nāma. dānādiupakaraṇānaṃ asampattiyā uppajjamānaṃ pana ^b^kusalūpasaṃhitaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassa^eb^nti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^vaṇijjā^eb^ti vāṇijakammāni. ^b^upāsakenā^eb^ti tisaraṇagatena. ^b^satthavaṇijjā^eb^ti āvudhabhaṇḍaṃ kāretvā tassa vikkayo. ^b^sattavaṇijjā^eb^ti manussavikkayo. ^b^maṃsavaṇijjā^eb^ti sūkaramigādayo posetvā tesaṃ vikkayo. ^b^majjavaṇijjā^eb^ti yaṃkiñci majjaṃ kāretvā tassa vikkayo. ^b^visavaṇijjā^eb^ti visaṃ kāretvā tassa vikkayo. iti sabbampi imaṃ vaṇijjaṃ neva attanā kātuṃ, na pare samādapetvā kāretuṃ vaṭṭati.

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V3.0064^ea^ ^b^pabbājentī^eb^ti raṭṭhamhā pabbājenti. ^b^yathāpaccayaṃ vā karontī^eb^ti yathādhippāyaṃ yathājjhāsayaṃ karonti. ^b^tatheva pāpakammaṃ pavedentī^eb^ti yathā tena kataṃ, taṃ tatheva aññesaṃ ārocenti kathenti.

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^M3.0063^ea^ ^a^P3.0304^ea^ ^b^saṃvutakammanta^eb^nti pihitakammantaṃ. ^b^ābhicetasikāna^eb^nti uttamacittanissitānaṃ. ^b^diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāna^eb^nti paccakkheyeva dhamme pavattikkhaṇe sukhavihārānaṃ. ^b^ariyakantehī^eb^ti ariyānaṃ kantehi maggaphalasīlehi.

[03] ^b^ariyadhammaṃ samādāyā^eb^ti ettha ariyadhammoti pañca sīlāni kathitāni. ^b^merayaṃ vāruṇi^eb^nti catubbidhaṃ merayaṃ pañcavidhañca suraṃ. ^b^dhammañcānuvitakkaye^eb^ti navavidhaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ anussativaseneva vitakkeyya. ^b^abyāpajjhaṃ hitaṃ citta^eb^nti niddukkhaṃ mettādibrahmavihāracittaṃ. ^b^devalokāya bhāvaye^eb^ti brahmalokatthāya bhāveyya. ^b^puññatthassa jigīsato^eb^ti puññena atthikassa puññaṃ gavesantassa. ^b^santesū^eb^ti buddhapaccekabuddhatathāgatasāvakesu. ^b^vipulā hoti dakkhiṇā^eb^ti evaṃ dinnadānaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti. ^b^anupubbenā^eb^ti sīlapūraṇādinā anukkamena. sesaṃ tikanipāte vuttatthameva.

[03] 180^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^sitaṃ pātvākāsī^eb^ti mahāmaggeneva gacchanto taṃ sālavanaṃ oloketvā ``atthi nu kho imasmiṃ ṭhāne kiñci sukāraṇaṃ uppannapubba''nti addasa kassapabuddhakāle gavesinā upāsakena kataṃ sukāraṇaṃ. athassa etadahosi -- ``idaṃ sukāraṇaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa apākaṭaṃ paṭicchannaṃ, handa naṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa pākaṭaṃ karomī''ti maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ padese ṭhitova sitapātukammaṃ ^a^P3.0305^ea^ akāsi, aggaggadante dassetvā mandahasitaṃ hasi ^a^V3.0065^ea^. yathā hi lokiyamanussā udaraṃ paharantā ``kahaṃ kaha''nti hasanti, na evaṃ buddhā. buddhānaṃ pana hasitaṃ haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākāramattameva hoti.

[03] hasitañca nāmetaṃ terasahi somanassasahagatacittehi hoti. tattha lokiyamahājano akusalato catūhi, kāmāvacarakusalato catūhīti aṭṭhahi cittehi hasati, sekhā akusalato diṭṭhigatasampayuttāni dve apanetvā chahi cittehi hasanti, khīṇāsavā catūhi sahetukakiriyacittehi, ekena ahetukakiriyacittenāti pañcahi cittehi ^a^M3.0064^ea^ hasanti. tesupi balavārammaṇe āpāthamāgate dvīhi ñāṇasampayuttacittehi hasanti, dubbalārammaṇe duhetukacittadvayena ca ahetukacittena cāti tīhi cittehi hasanti. imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātusomanassasahagatacittaṃ bhagavato pahaṭṭhākāramattahasitaṃ uppādeti.

[03] taṃ panetaṃ hasitaṃ evaṃ appamattakampi therassa pākaṭaṃ ahosi. kathaṃ? tathārūpe hi kāle tathāgatassa catūhi dāṭhāhi cātuddīpikamahāmeghamukhato samosaritā vijjulatā viya virocamānā mahātālakkhandhappamāṇā rasmivaṭṭiyo uṭṭhahitvā tikkhattuṃ siravaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dāṭhaggesuyeva antaradhāyanti. tena saññāṇena āyasmā ānando bhagavato pacchato gacchamānopi sitapātubhāvaṃ jānāti.

[01] ^b^iddha^eb^nti samiddhaṃ. ^b^phīta^eb^nti atisamiddhaṃ sabbapāliphullaṃ viya. ^b^ākiṇṇamanussa^eb^nti janasamākulaṃ. ^b^sīlesu aparipūrakārī^eb^ti pañcasu sīlesu asamattakārī. ^b^paṭidesitānī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0306^ea^ upāsakabhāvaṃ paṭidesitāni. ^b^samādapitānī^eb^ti saraṇesu patiṭṭhāpitānīti attho. ^b^iccetaṃ samasama^eb^nti iti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ sabbākārato samabhāveneva samaṃ, na ekadesena. ^b^natthi kiñci atireka^eb^nti mayhaṃ imehi kiñci atirekaṃ natthi. ^b^handā^eb^ti vavassaggatthe nipāto. ^b^atirekāyā^eb^ti visesakāraṇatthāya paṭipajjāmīti attho. ^b^sīlesu paripūrakāriṃ dhārethā^eb^ti pañcasu sīlesu samattakārīti jānātha. ettāvatā tena pañca sīlāni samādinnāni nāma honti. ^b^kimaṅga pana na maya^eb^nti mayaṃ pana keneva kāraṇena paripūrakārino na bhavissāma. sesamettha uttānamevāti.
[06] upāsakavaggo tatiyo.

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^V3.0066^ea^ paṭhame ^b^mandattā momūhattā^eb^ti neva samādānaṃ jānāti, na ānisaṃsaṃ. attano pana mandattā momūhattā aññāṇeneva āraññako ^a^M3.0065^ea^ hoti. ^b^pāpiccho icchāpakato^eb^ti ``araññe me viharantassa `ayaṃ āraññako'ti catupaccayasakkāraṃ karissanti, `ayaṃ bhikkhu lajjī pavivitto'tiādīhi ca guṇehi sambhāvessantī''ti evaṃ pāpikāya icchāya ṭhatvā tāya eva icchāya abhibhūto hutvā āraññako hoti. ummādavasena araññaṃ pavisitvā viharanto pana ^b^ummādā cittakkhepā^eb^ āraññako nāma hoti. ^b^vaṇṇita^eb^nti ^a^P3.0307^ea^ idaṃ āraññakaṅgaṃ nāma buddhehi ca buddhasāvakehi ca vaṇṇitaṃ pasatthanti āraññako hoti. ^b^idamatthita^eb^nti imāya kalyāṇāya paṭipattiyā attho etassāti idamatthī, idamatthino bhāvo idamatthitā. taṃ idamatthitaṃyeva nissāya, na aññaṃ kiñci lokāmisanti attho. sesamettha ito paresu ca uttānatthameva.
[06] araññavaggo catuttho.

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa paṭhame ^b^brāhmaṇadhammā^eb^ti brāhmaṇasabhāvā. ^b^sunakhesū^eb^ti kukkuresu. ^b^neva kiṇanti na vikkiṇantī^eb^ti na gaṇhantā kiṇanti, na dadantā vikkiṇanti. ^b^sampiyeneva saṃvāsaṃ saṃbandhāya sampavattentī^eb^ti piyo piyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paveṇiyā bandhanatthaṃ saṃvāsaṃ pavattayanti ^a^V3.0067^ea^. ^b^udarāvadehaka^eb^nti udaraṃ avadihitvā upacinitvā pūretvā. ^b^avasesaṃ ādāya pakkamantī^eb^ti yaṃ bhuñjituṃ na sakkonti, taṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā gahetvā gacchanti. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.

[03] 192^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^tvampi no^eb^ti tvampi nu. ^b^pavattāro^eb^ti pavattayitāro. ^b^yesa^eb^nti yesaṃ santakaṃ. ^b^mantapada^eb^nti ^a^P3.0308^ea^ vedasaṅkhātaṃ mantameva. ^b^gīta^eb^nti aṭṭhakādīhi dasahi porāṇakabrāhmaṇehi sarasampattivasena sajjhāyitaṃ. ^b^pavutta^eb^nti aññesaṃ vuttaṃ, vācitanti attho. ^b^samīhita^eb^nti samupabyūḷhaṃ rāsikataṃ, piṇḍaṃ ^a^M3.0066^ea^ katvā ṭhapitanti attho. ^b^tadanugāyantī^eb^ti etarahi brāhmaṇā taṃ tehi pubbehi gītaṃ anugāyanti anusajjhāyanti. ^b^tadanubhāsantī^eb^ti taṃ anubhāsanti. idaṃ purimasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^bhāsitamanubhāsantī^eb^ti tehi bhāsitaṃ anubhāsanti. ^b^sajjhāyitamanusajjhāyantī^eb^ti tehi sajjhāyitaṃ anusajjhāyanti. ^b^vācitamanuvācentī^eb^ti tehi aññesaṃ vācitaṃ anuvācenti. ^b^seyyathida^eb^nti te katameti attho. ^b^aṭṭhako^eb^tiādīni tesaṃ nāmāni. te kira dibbena cakkhunā oloketvā parūpaghātaṃ akatvā kassapasammāsambuddhassa bhagavato pāvacanena saha saṃsandetvā mante ganthesuṃ. aparāpare pana brāhmaṇā pāṇātipātādīni pakkhipitvā tayo vede bhinditvā buddhavacanena saddhiṃ viruddhe akaṃsu. ^b^tyāssu'me^eb^ti ettha ^b^assū^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ, te brāhmaṇā ime pañca brāhmaṇe paññāpentīti attho.

[03] ^b^mante adhīyamāno^eb^ti vede sajjhāyanto gaṇhanto. ^b^ācariyadhana^eb^nti ācariyadakkhiṇaṃ ācariyabhāgaṃ. ^b^na issatthenā^eb^ti na yodhājīvakammena uppādeti. ^b^na rājaporisenā^eb^ti na rājupaṭṭhākabhāvena. ^b^kevalaṃ bhikkhācariyāyā^eb^ti suddhāya bhikkhācariyāya eva. ^b^kapālaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0309^ea^ ^b^anatimaññamāno^eb^ti taṃ bhikkhābhājanaṃ anatimaññamāno. so hi puṇṇapattaṃ ādāya sīsaṃ nhāto kuladvāresu ṭhatvā ``ahaṃ aṭṭhacattālīsa vassāni komārabrahmacariyaṃ cariṃ, mantāpi me gahitā, ācariyassa ācariyadhanaṃ dassāmi, dhanaṃ me dethā''ti yācati. taṃ sutvā manussā yathāsatti yathābalaṃ aṭṭhapi soḷasapi satampi sahassampi denti. evaṃ sakalagāmaṃ caritvā laddhadhanaṃ ācariyassa niyyādeti. taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^evaṃ kho doṇa brāhmaṇo brahmasamo hotī^eb^ti evaṃ brahmavihārehi samannāgatattā brāhmaṇo brahmasamo nāma hoti.

[03] ^b^neva^eb^ ^a^V3.0068^ea^ ^b^kayena na vikkayenā^eb^ti neva attanā kayaṃ katvā gaṇhāti, na parena vikkayaṃ katvā dinnaṃ. ^b^udakūpassaṭṭha^eb^nti udakena upassaṭṭhaṃ pariccattaṃ. so hi yasmiṃ kule vayappattā dārikā atthi, gantvā tassa dvāre tiṭṭhati. ``kasmā ṭhitosī''ti vutte ``ahaṃ aṭṭhacattālīsa vassāni komārabrahmacariyaṃ cariṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ tumhākaṃ demi, tumhe mayhaṃ dārikaṃ dethā''ti vadati. te dārikaṃ ānetvā tassa hatthe udakaṃ pātetvā denti. so taṃ udakūpassaṭṭhaṃ bhariyaṃ gaṇhitvā gacchati. ^b^atimīḷhajo^eb^ti atimīḷhe ^a^M3.0067^ea^ mahāgūtharāsimhi jāto. ^b^tassa sā^eb^ti tassa esā. ^b^na davatthā^eb^ti na kīḷanatthā. ^b^na ratatthā^eb^ti na kāmaratiatthā. ^b^methunaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0310^ea^ ^b^uppādetvā^eb^ti dhītaraṃ vā puttaṃ vā uppādetvā ``idāni paveṇi ghaṭīyissatī''ti nikkhamitvā pabbajati. ^b^sugatiṃ saggaṃ loka^eb^nti brahmalokameva sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^devasamo hotī^eb^ti dibbavihārehi samannāgatattā devasamo nāma hoti.

[03] ^b^tameva puttassādaṃ nikāmayamāno^eb^ti yvāssa dhītaraṃ vā puttaṃ vā jātaṃ disvā puttapemaṃ puttassādo uppajjati, taṃ patthayamāno icchamāno. ^b^kuṭumbaṃ ajjhāvasatī^eb^ti kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā kuṭumbamajjhe vasati. sesamettha uttānamevāti.

[03] 193^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^pagevā^eb^ti paṭhamaññeva. ^b^kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhitenā^eb^ti kāmarāgaggahitena. ^b^kāmarāgaparetenā^eb^ti kāmarāgānugatena. ^b^nissaraṇa^eb^nti tividhaṃ kāmarāgassa nissaraṇaṃ vikkhambhananissaraṇaṃ, tadaṅganissaraṇaṃ, samucchedanissaraṇanti. tattha asubhe paṭhamajjhānaṃ vikkhambhananissaraṇaṃ nāma, vipassanā tadaṅganissaraṇaṃ nāma, arahattamaggo samucchedanissaraṇaṃ nāma. taṃ tividhampi nappajānātīti attho. ^b^attatthampī^eb^tiādīsu arahattasaṅkhāto attano attho attattho nāma, paccayadāyakānaṃ attho parattho nāma, sveva duvidho ubhayattho nāma. iminā nayena sabbavāresu attho veditabbo.

[03] ayaṃ pana viseso -- ^b^byāpādassa nissaraṇa^eb^ntiādīsu hi dveva nissaraṇāni vikkhambhananissaraṇañca samucchedanissaraṇañca. tattha byāpādassa tāva mettāya paṭhamajjhānaṃ vikkhambhananissaraṇaṃ nāma, anāgāmimaggo samucchedanissaraṇaṃ, thinamiddhassa ālokasaññā vikkhambhananissaraṇaṃ ^a^V3.0069^ea^, arahattamaggo ^a^P3.0311^ea^ samucchedanissaraṇaṃ. uddhaccakukkuccassa yo koci samatho vikkhambhananissaraṇaṃ, uddhaccassa panettha arahattamaggo, kukkuccassa anāgāmimaggo samucchedanissaraṇaṃ. vicikicchāya dhammavavatthānaṃ vikkhambhananissaraṇaṃ, paṭhamamaggo samucchedanissaraṇaṃ.

[03] yā panettha ^b^seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, udapatto saṃsaṭṭho lākhāya vā^eb^tiādikā upamā vuttā, tāsu ^b^udapatto^eb^ti udakabharitā pāti. ^b^saṃsaṭṭho^eb^ti ^a^M3.0068^ea^ vaṇṇabhedakaraṇavasena saṃsaṭṭho. ^b^ukkudhito^eb^ti kudhito. ^b^ussadakajāto^eb^ti usumakajāto. ^b^sevālapaṇakapariyonaddho^eb^ti tilabījakādibhedena sevālena vā nīlamaṇḍūkapiṭṭhivaṇṇena vā udakapiṭṭhiṃ chādetvā nibbattena paṇakena pariyonaddho. ^b^vāterito^eb^ti vātena erito kampito. ^b^āvilo^eb^ti appasanno. ^b^luḷito^eb^ti asannisinno. ^b^kalalībhūto^eb^ti kaddamībhūto. ^b^andhakāre nikkhitto^eb^ti koṭṭhakantarādibhede anālokaṭṭhāne ṭhapito. imasmiṃ sutte bhagavā tīhi bhavehi desanaṃ nivaṭṭetvā arahattanikūṭena niṭṭhapesi, brāhmaṇo pana saraṇamatte patiṭṭhitoti.

[03] 194^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^kāraṇapālī^eb^ti pāloti tassa nāmaṃ, rājakulānaṃ pana kammante kāretīti kāraṇapālī nāma jāto. ^b^kammantaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0312^ea^ ^b^kāretī^eb^ti pātova uṭṭhāya dvāraṭṭālakapākāre akate kāreti, jiṇṇe paṭijaggāpeti. ^b^piṅgiyāniṃ brāhmaṇa^eb^nti evaṃnāmakaṃ anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhitaṃ ariyasāvakaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ. so kira pātova uṭṭhāya gandhamālādīni gāhāpetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā nagaraṃ āgacchati, idaṃ brāhmaṇassa devasikaṃ vattanti. taṃ so evaṃ vattaṃ katvā āgacchantaṃ addasa. ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti ``ayaṃ brāhmaṇo paññavā ñāṇuttaro, kahaṃ nu kho pātova gantvā āgacchatī''ti cintetvā anukkamena santikaṃ āgataṃ sañjānitvā ``handa kuto nū''tiādivacanaṃ avoca.

[03] tattha ^b^divā divassā^eb^ti divasassāpi divā, majjhanhikakāleti attho. ^b^paṇḍito maññe^eb^ti bhavaṃ piṅgiyānī samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ paṇḍitoti maññati, udāhu noti ayamettha attho. ^b^ko cāhaṃ, bho^eb^ti, bho, samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyajānane ahaṃ ko nāma? ^b^ko ca samaṇassa ^a^V3.0070^ea^ gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jānissāmī^eb^ti kuto cāhaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jānissāmi, kena nāma kāraṇena jānissāmīti evaṃ sabbathāpi attano ajānanabhāvaṃ dīpeti. ^b^sopi nūnassa tādisovā^eb^ti yo samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jāneyya, sopi nūna dasa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ patto tādiso ^a^M3.0069^ea^ buddhoyeva bhaveyya. sineruṃ vā hi pathaviṃ vā ākāsaṃ vā pametukāmena tappamāṇo daṇḍo ^a^P3.0313^ea^ vā rajju vā laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, samaṇassa gotamassa paññaṃ jānantenapi tassa ñāṇasadisameva sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. ādaravasena panettha āmeḍitaṃ kataṃ. ^b^uḷārāyā^eb^ti uttamāya seṭṭhāya. ^b^ko cāhaṃ, bho^eb^ti, bho, ahaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa pasaṃsane ko nāma. ^b^ko ca samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pasaṃsissāmī^eb^ti kena kāraṇena pasaṃsissāmi.

[03] ^b^pasatthappasattho^eb^ti sabbaguṇānaṃ upari carehi sabbalokapasatthehi attano guṇeheva pasattho, na tassa aññehi pasaṃsanakiccaṃ atthi. yathā hi campakapupphaṃ vā nīluppalaṃ vā padumaṃ vā lohitacandanaṃ vā attano vaṇṇagandhasiriyāva pāsādikañceva sugandhañca, na tassa āgantukehi vaṇṇagandhehi thomanakiccaṃ atthi. yathā ca maṇiratanaṃ vā candamaṇḍalaṃ vā attano ālokeneva obhāsati, na tassa aññena obhāsanakiccaṃ atthi, evaṃ samaṇo gotamo sabbalokapasatthehi attano guṇeheva pasattho thomito, sabbalokassa seṭṭhataṃ pāpito. na tassa aññena pasaṃsanakiccaṃ atthi.

[03] pasatthehi vā pasatthotipi ^b^pasatthappasattho^eb^. ke pana pasatthā nāma? rājā pasenadi kosalo kāsikosalavāsikehi pasattho, bimbisāro aṅgamagadhavāsīhi, vesālikā licchavī vajjitaṭṭhavāsīhi pasatthā, pāveyyakā mallā kosinārakā mallā aññepi te te khattiyā tehi tehi jānapadehi pasatthā, caṅkiādayo brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇagaṇehi, anāthapiṇḍikādayo upāsakā upāsakagaṇehi, visākhāādikā upāsikā anekasatāhi upāsikāhi, sakuludāyiādayo paribbājakā anekehi paribbājakasatehi, uppalavaṇṇattheriādikā mahāsāvikā anekehi bhikkhunisatehi, sāriputtattherādayo mahātherā ^a^P3.0314^ea^ anekasatehi bhikkhūhi, sakkādayo devā anekasahassehi devehi, mahābrahmādayo brahmāno anekasahassehi brahmehi pasatthā. te sabbepi dasabalaṃ thomenti vaṇṇenti pasaṃsantīti bhagavā ``pasatthappasattho''ti vuccati. ^b^atthavasa^eb^nti atthānisaṃsaṃ.

[03] athassa ^a^V3.0071^ea^ ^a^M3.0070^ea^ so attano pasādakāraṇaṃ ācikkhanto ^b^seyyathāpi, bho, puriso^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^aggarasaparititto^eb^ti bhojanarasesu pāyāso sneharasesu gosappi, kasāvarasesu khuddakamadhu aneḷakaṃ, madhurarasesu sakkarāti evamādayo aggarasā nāma. tesu yena kenaci parititto ākaṇṭhappamāṇaṃ bhuñjitvā ṭhito. ^b^aññesaṃ hīnāna^eb^nti aggarasehi aññesaṃ hīnarasānaṃ. ^b^suttaso^eb^ti suttato, suttabhāvenāti attho. sesupi eseva nayo. ^b^tato tato^eb^ti suttādīsu tato tato. ^b^aññesaṃ puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇāppavādāna^eb^nti ye aññesaṃ puthūnaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ laddhisaṅkhātappavādā, tesaṃ. ^b^na pihetī^eb^ti na pattheti, te kathiyamāne sotumpi na icchati. ^b^jighacchādubbalyapareto^eb^ti jighacchāya ceva dubbalabhāvena ca anugato. ^b^madhupiṇḍika^eb^nti sālipiṭṭhaṃ bhajjitvā catumadhurena yojetvā kataṃ baddhasattupiṇḍikaṃ, madhurapūvameva vā. ^b^adhigaccheyyā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0315^ea^ labheyya. ^b^asecanaka^eb^nti madhurabhāvakaraṇatthāya aññena rasena anāsittakaṃ ojavantaṃ paṇītarasaṃ.

[03] ^b^haricandanassā^eb^ti suvaṇṇavaṇṇacandanassa. ^b^lohitacandanassā^eb^ti rattavaṇṇacandanassa. ^b^surabhigandha^eb^nti sugandhaṃ. ^b^darathā^eb^dayo vaṭṭadarathā, vaṭṭakilamathā, vaṭṭapariḷāhā eva. ^b^udānaṃ udānesī^eb^ti udāhāraṃ udāhari. yathā hi yaṃ telaṃ mānaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, vissanditvā gacchati, taṃ avasekoti vuccati. yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, ajjhottharitvā gacchati, taṃ oghoti vuccati. evamevaṃ yaṃ pītivacanaṃ hadayaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, adhikaṃ hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā bahi nikkhamati, taṃ udānanti vuccati. evarūpaṃ pītimayavacanaṃ nicchāresīti attho.

[03] 195^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^nīlā^eb^ti idaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikaṃ. ^b^nīlavaṇṇā^eb^tiādi tasseva vibhāgadassanaṃ. tattha na tesaṃ pakativaṇṇo nīlo, nīlavilepanavilittattā panetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^nīlavatthā^eb^ti paṭadukūlakoseyyādīnipi tesaṃ nīlāneva honti. ^b^nīlālaṅkārā^eb^ti nīlamaṇīhi nīlapupphehi alaṅkatā, tesaṃ hatthālaṅkāra-assālaṅkāra-rathālaṅkāra-sāṇivitānakañcukāpi sabbe nīlāyeva honti. iminā nayena sabbapadesu attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^padumaṃ^eb^ ^a^M3.0071^ea^ ^b^yathā^eb^ti yathā satapattaṃ rattapadumaṃ. ^b^kokanada^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^pāto^eb^ti pageva suriyuggamanakāle ^a^V3.0072^ea^. ^b^siyā^eb^ti bhaveyya. ^b^avītagandha^eb^nti ^a^P3.0316^ea^ avigatagandhaṃ. ^b^aṅgīrasa^eb^nti bhagavato aṅgamaṅgehi rasmiyo niccharanti, tasmā aṅgīrasoti vuccati. ^b^tapantamādiccamivantalikkhe^eb^ti dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu mahādīpesu ālokakaraṇavasena antalikkhe tapantaṃ ādiccaṃ viya virocamānaṃ. ^b^aṅgīrasaṃ passā^eb^ti attānameva vā mahājanaṃ vā sandhāya evaṃ vadati.

[03] 196^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^mahāsupinā^eb^ti mahantehi purisehi passitabbato mahantānañca atthānaṃ nimittabhāvato mahāsupinā. ^b^pāturahesu^eb^nti pākaṭā ahesuṃ. tattha supinaṃ passanto catūhi kāraṇehi passati dhātukkhobhato vā anubhūtapubbato vā devatopasaṃhārato vā pubbanimittato vāti.

[03] tattha pittādīnaṃ khobhakaraṇapaccayappayogena khubhitadhātuko ^b^dhātukkhobhato^eb^ supinaṃ passati. passanto ca nānāvidhaṃ supinaṃ passati pabbatā patanto viya, ākāsena gacchanto viya, vāḷamigahatthicorādīhi anubaddho viya ca. ^b^anubhūtapubbato^eb^ passanto pubbe anubhūtapubbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ passati. ^b^devatopasaṃhārato^eb^ passantassa devatā atthakāmatāya vā anatthakāmatāya vā atthāya vā anatthāya vā nānāvidhāni ārammaṇāni upasaṃharanti. so tāsaṃ devatānaṃ ānubhāvena tāni ārammaṇāni passati. ^b^pubbanimittato^eb^ passanto puññāpuññavasena uppajjitukāmassa atthassa vā anatthassa vā pubbanimittabhūtaṃ supinaṃ passati bodhisattamātā viya puttapaṭilābhanimittaṃ, kosalarājā viya soḷasa supine, ayameva bhagavā bodhisattabhūto ime pañca mahāsupine viya cāti.

[03] tattha yaṃ dhātukkhobhato anubhūtapubbato ca supine passati, na taṃ saccaṃ hoti. yaṃ devatopasaṃhārato passati, taṃ saccaṃ vā hoti alikaṃ vā. kuddhā hi devatā upāyena ^a^P3.0317^ea^ vināsetukāmā viparītampi katvā dassenti. yaṃ pana pubbanimittato passati, taṃ ekantaṃ saccameva ^a^M3.0072^ea^ hoti. etesaṃ catunnaṃ mūlakāraṇānaṃ saṃsaggabhedatopi supinabhedo hotiyeva.

[03] taṃ panetaṃ catubbidhampi supinaṃ sekhaputhujjanāva passanti appahīnavipallāsattā, asekhā na ^a^V3.0073^ea^ passanti pahīnavipallāsattā. kiṃ panetaṃ passanto sutto passati paṭibuddho, udāhu neva sutto na paṭibuddhoti? kiñcettha yadi tāva sutto passati, abhidhammavirodho āpajjati. bhavaṅgacittena hi supati, taṃ rūpanimittādiārammaṇaṃ rāgādisampayuttaṃ vā na hoti. supinaṃ passantassa ca īdisāni cittāni uppajjanti. atha paṭibuddho passati, vinayavirodho āpajjati. yañhi paṭibuddho passati, taṃ sabbohārikacittena passati. sabbohārikacittena ca kate vītikkame anāpatti nāma natthi. supinaṃ passantena pana katepi vītikkame ekantaṃ anāpatti eva. atha neva sutto na paṭibuddho passati, na nāma passati. evañca sati supinassa abhāvo ca āpajjati? na abhāvo. kasmā? yasmā kapimiddhapareto passati. vuttañhetaṃ -- ``kapimiddhapareto kho, mahārāja, supinaṃ passatī''ti.

[03] ^b^kapimiddhapareto^eb^ti makkaṭaniddāya yutto. yathā hi makkaṭassa niddā lahuparivattā hoti, evaṃ yā niddā punappunaṃ kusalādicittavokiṇṇattā lahuparivattā, yassā pavattiyaṃ punappunaṃ bhavaṅgato uttaraṇaṃ hoti, tāya yutto supinaṃ passati. tenāyaṃ supino kusalopi hoti akusalopi abyākatopi. tattha supinante cetiyavandanadhammassavanadhammadesanādīni ^a^P3.0318^ea^ karontassa kusalo, pāṇātipātādīni karontassa akusalo, dvīhi antehi mutto āvajjanatadārammaṇakkhaṇe abyākatoti veditabbo. svāyaṃ dubbalavatthukattā cetanāya paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ asamattho. pavatte pana aññehi kusalākusalehi upatthambhito vipākaṃ deti. kiñcāpi vipākaṃ deti, atha kho avisaye uppannattā abbohārikāva supinantacetanā. so panesa supino kālavasenapi divā tāva diṭṭho na sameti, tathā paṭhamayāme majjhimayāme pacchimayāme ca. balavapaccūse pana asitapītakhāyite sammā pariṇāmaṃ gate kāyasmiṃ ojāya patiṭṭhitāya aruṇe uggacchamāneva diṭṭho ^a^M3.0073^ea^ supino sameti. iṭṭhanimittaṃ supinaṃ passanto iṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhati, aniṭṭhanimittaṃ passanto aniṭṭhaṃ.

[03] ime pana pañca mahāsupine neva lokiyamahājano passati, na mahārājāno, na cakkavattirājāno, na aggasāvakā, na paccekabuddhā, na sammāsambuddhā, eko sabbaññubodhisattoyeva passati. amhākaṃ pana bodhisatto kadā ime supine passīti? ``sve buddho bhavissāmī''ti cātuddasiyaṃ pakkhassa rattivibhāyanakāle passi. terasiyantipi vadantiyeva. so ime supine disvā uṭṭhāya pallaṅkaṃ ābhuñjitvā nisinno cintesi -- ``sace mayā ^a^V3.0074^ea^ kapilavatthunagare ime supinā diṭṭhā assu, pitu mahārājassa katheyyaṃ. sace pana me mātā jīveyya, tassā katheyyaṃ. imasmiṃ kho pana ṭhāne imesaṃ paṭiggāhako nāma natthi, ahameva paṭigaṇhissāmī''ti. tato ``idaṃ imassa ^a^P3.0319^ea^ pubbanimittaṃ idaṃ imassā''ti sayameva supine paṭiggaṇhitvā uruvelagāme sujātāya dinnaṃ pāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha bodhiṃ patvā anukkamena jetavane viharanto attano makulabuddhakāle diṭṭhe pañca mahāsupine vitthāretuṃ bhikkhū āmantetvā imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.

[03] tattha ^b^mahāpathavī^eb^ti cakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pūretvā ṭhitā mahāpathavī. ^b^mahāsayanaṃ ahosī^eb^ti sirisayanaṃ ahosi. ^b^ohito^eb^ti ṭhapito. so pana na udakasmiṃyeva ṭhapito ahosi, atha kho pācīnasamuddassa uparūparibhāgena gantvā pācīnacakkavāḷamatthake ṭhapito ahosīti veditabbo. ^b^pacchime samudde dakkhiṇe samudde^eb^ti etesupi eseva nayo. ^b^tiriyā nāma tiṇajātī^eb^ti dabbatiṇaṃ vuccati. ^b^nābhiyā uggantvā nabhaṃ āhacca ṭhitā ahosī^eb^ti naṅgalamattena rattadaṇḍena nābhito uggantvā passantassa passantasseva vidatthimattaṃ ratanamattaṃ byāmamattaṃ yaṭṭhimattaṃ gāvutamattaṃ aḍḍhayojanamattaṃ yojanamattanti evaṃ uggantvā uggantvā anekayojanasahassaṃ nabhaṃ āhacca ṭhitā ahosi. ^b^pādehi ussakkitvā^eb^ti agganakhato paṭṭhāya pādehi abhiruhitvā. ^b^nānāvaṇṇā^eb^ti eko nīlavaṇṇo, eko pītavaṇṇo, eko lohitavaṇṇo, eko paṇḍupalāsavaṇṇoti evaṃ nānāvaṇṇā. ^b^setā^eb^ti paṇḍarā parisuddhā. ^b^mahato mīḷhapabbatassā^eb^ti tiyojanubbedhassa gūthapabbatassa. ^b^uparūpari^eb^ ^a^P3.0320^ea^ ^b^caṅkamatī^eb^ti matthakamatthake caṅkamati ^a^M3.0074^ea^. dīghāyukabuddhā pana tiyojanike mīḷhapabbate anupavisitvā nisinnā viya honti.

[03] evaṃ ettakena ṭhānena pubbanimittāni dassetvā idāni saha pubbanimittehi paṭilābhaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^yampi, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. tattha sabbaguṇadāyakattā buddhānaṃ arahattamaggo ^b^anuttarā sammāsambodhi^eb^ nāma. tasmā yaṃ so cakkavāḷamahāpathaviṃ sirisayanabhūtaṃ addasa, taṃ buddhabhāvassa pubbanimittaṃ. yaṃ himavantapabbatarājānaṃ bimbohanaṃ addasa, taṃ sabbaññutaññāṇabimbohanassa pubbanimittaṃ. yaṃ cattāro hatthapāde cakkavāḷamatthake ṭhite addasa, taṃ dhammacakkassa appaṭivattiyabhāve pubbanimittaṃ. yaṃ attānaṃ uttānakaṃ nipannaṃ addasa, taṃ tīsu bhavesu avakujjānaṃ sattānaṃ uttānamukhabhāvassa pubbanimittaṃ. yaṃ akkhīni ummīletvā passanto ^a^V3.0075^ea^ viya ahosi, taṃ dibbacakkhupaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ. yaṃ yāva bhavaggā ekālokaṃ ahosi, taṃ anāvaraṇañāṇassa pubbanimittaṃ. sesaṃ pāḷivaseneva veditabbanti.

[03] 197^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^nemittā^eb^ti nimittapāṭhakā. ^b^tejodhātu pakuppatī^eb^ti mahāaggikkhandho uppajjati. ^b^pāṇinā udakaṃ sampaṭicchitvā^eb^ti uppannaṃ utusamuṭṭhānaṃ udakaṃ tiyojanasatena hatthena paṭiggahetvā. ^b^pamattā hontī^eb^ti attano kīḷāya pamattā honti vippavuṭṭhasatino. tesañhi sakāya ratiyā ``ramāmā''ti citte uppanne akālepi ^a^P3.0321^ea^ devo vassati, tadabhāve na vassati. taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ -- ``na kālavassa''nti. aṭṭhamanavamāni uttānatthāneva.

[03] 200^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^nissāraṇīyā^eb^ti nissaṭā visaññuttā. ^b^dhātuyo^eb^ti attasuññasabhāvā. ^b^kāmaṃ manasikaroto^eb^ti kāmaṃ manasikarontassa, asubhajjhānato vuṭṭhāya agadaṃ gahetvā visaṃ vīmaṃsanto viya vīmaṃsanatthaṃ kāmābhimukhaṃ cittaṃ pesentassāti attho. ^b^na pakkhandatī^eb^ti nappavisati. ^b^nappasīdatī^eb^ti pasādaṃ nāpajjati. ^b^na santiṭṭhatī^eb^ti nappatiṭṭhahati. ^b^na vimuccatī^eb^ti na adhimuccati. yathā pana kukkuṭapattaṃ vā nhārudaddulaṃ vā aggimhi pakkhittaṃ paṭilīyati patikuṭati pativaṭṭati na saṃpasārīyati, evaṃ paṭilīyati ^a^M3.0075^ea^ na saṃpasārīyati. ^b^nekkhammaṃ kho panā^eb^ti idha nekkhammaṃ nāma asubhesu paṭhamajjhānaṃ, tadassa manasikaroto cittaṃ pakkhandati. ^b^tassa taṃ citta^eb^nti tassa taṃ asubhajjhānacittaṃ. ^b^sugata^eb^nti gocare gatattā suṭṭhu gataṃ. ^b^subhāvita^eb^nti ahānabhāgiyattā suṭṭhu bhāvitaṃ. ^b^suvuṭṭhita^eb^nti kāmato vuṭṭhitaṃ. ^b^suvimutta^eb^nti kāmehi suṭṭhu vimuttaṃ. ^b^kāmapaccayā āsavā^eb^ nāma kāmahetukā cattāro āsavā. ^b^vighātā^eb^ti dukkhā. ^b^pariḷāhā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0322^ea^ kāmarāgapariḷāhā. ^b^na so taṃ vedanaṃ vediyatī^eb^ti so taṃ kāmavedanaṃ vighātapariḷāhavedanañca na vediyati. ^b^idamakkhātaṃ kāmānaṃ nissaraṇa^eb^nti idaṃ asubhajjhānaṃ kāmehi nissaṭattā kāmānaṃ nissaraṇanti akkhātaṃ. yo pana taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasanto tatiyamaggaṃ patvā anāgāmiphalena nibbānaṃ disvā ``puna kāmā nāma natthī''ti jānāti. tassa cittaṃ accantanissaraṇameva. sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[03] ayaṃ ^a^V3.0076^ea^ pana viseso -- dutiyavāre mettājhānāni byāpādassa nissaraṇaṃ nāma. tatiyavāre karuṇājhānāni vihiṃsāya nissaraṇaṃ nāma. catutthavāre arūpajjhānāni rūpānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nāma. accantanissaraṇañcettha arahattaphalaṃ yojetabbaṃ. pañcamavāre ^b^sakkāyaṃ manasikaroto^eb^ti suddhasaṅkhāre pariggaṇhitvā arahattaṃ pattassa sukkhavipassakassa phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya vīmaṃsanatthaṃ pañcupādānakkhandhābhimukhaṃ cittaṃ pesentassa. ^b^idamakkhātaṃ sakkāyassa nissaraṇa^eb^nti idaṃ arahattamaggena ca phalena ca nibbānaṃ disvā ṭhitassa bhikkhuno ``puna sakkāyo natthī''ti uppannaṃ arahattaphalasamāpatticittaṃ sakkāyassa nissaraṇanti akkhātaṃ. idāni evaṃ sakkāyanissaraṇaṃ nirodhaṃ patvā ṭhitassa khīṇāsavassa vaṇṇaṃ kathento ^b^tassa kāmanandīpi nānusetī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^nānusetī^eb^ti na nibbattati. ^b^ananusayā^eb^ti anibbattiyā. sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] brāhmaṇavaggo pañcamo.
[06] catutthapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 201^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa ^a^V3.0077^ea^ ^a^M3.0076^ea^ ^a^P3.0323^ea^ paṭhame ^b^kimilāya^eb^nti evaṃnāmake nagare. ^b^niculavane^eb^ti mucalindavane. ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti ayaṃ kira thero tasmiṃyeva nagare seṭṭhiputto satthu santike pabbajitvā pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ paṭilabhi. so attanā nivutthaṃ khandhasantānaṃ anussaranto kassapadasabalassa sāsanosakkanakāle pabbajitvā catūsu parisāsu sāsane agāravaṃ karontīsu nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā pabbataṃ āruyha tattha samaṇadhammaṃ katvā attano nivutthabhāvaṃ addasa. so ``satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ pucchissāmī''ti etaṃ ``ko nu kho, bhante''tiādivacanaṃ avoca.

[03] ^b^satthari agāravā viharanti appatissā^eb^ti satthari gāravañceva jeṭṭhakabhāvañca anupaṭṭhapetvā viharanti. sesesupi eseva nayo. tattha cetiyaṅgaṇādīsu chattaṃ dhāretvā upāhanā āruyha vicaranto nānappakārañca niratthakakathaṃ kathento satthari agāravo viharati nāma. dhammassavanagge pana nisīditvā niddāyanto ceva nānappakārañca niratthakakathaṃ kathento dhamme agāravo viharati nāma. saṅghamajjhe bāhāvikkhepakaṃ nānattakathaṃ kathento theranavamajjhimesu ca cittīkāraṃ akaronto saṅghe agāravo viharati nāma. sikkhaṃ aparipūrento sikkhāya agāravo viharati nāma. aññamaññaṃ kalahabhaṇḍanādīni karonto aññamaññaṃ agāravo viharati nāma. dutiyaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 203-204^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V3.0078^ea^ ^b^ajjavenā^eb^ti ujubhāvena avaṅkagamanena. ^b^javenā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0324^ea^ padajavena. ^b^maddavenā^eb^ti sarīramudutāya. ^b^khantiyā^eb^ti adhivāsanakkhantiyā. ^b^soraccenā^eb^ti sucisīlatāya. bhikkhuvāre ^b^ajjava^eb^nti ñāṇassa ujukagamanaṃ. ^b^javo^eb^ti sūraṃ hutvā ñāṇassa gamanabhāvo. ^b^maddava^eb^nti ^a^M3.0077^ea^ sīlamaddavaṃ. ^b^khantī^eb^ti adhivāsanakkhantiyeva. ^b^soraccaṃ^eb^ sucisīlatāyeva. catutthe pañca balāni missakāni kathitāni.

[03] 205^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^cetokhilā^eb^ti cittassa thaddhabhāvā, kacavarabhāvā, khāṇukabhāvā. ^b^satthari kaṅkhatī^eb^ti satthu sarīre vā guṇe vā kaṅkhati. sarīre kaṅkhamāno ``dvattiṃsavarapurisalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nāma sarīraṃ atthi nu kho natthī''ti kaṅkhati, guṇe kaṅkhamāno ``atītānāgatapaccuppannajānanasamatthaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ atthi nu kho natthī''ti kaṅkhati. ^b^vicikicchatī^eb^ti vicinanto kicchati, dukkhaṃ āpajjati, vinicchetuṃ na sakkoti. ^b^nādhimuccatī^eb^ti evametanti adhimokkhaṃ na paṭilabhati. ^b^na sampasīdatī^eb^ti guṇesu otaritvā nibbicikicchabhāvena pasīdituṃ anāvilo bhavituṃ na sakkoti. ^b^ātappāyā^eb^ti kilesasantāpakavīriyakaraṇatthāya. ^b^anuyogāyā^eb^ti punappunaṃ yogāya. ^b^sātaccāyā^eb^ti satatakiriyāya. ^b^padhānāyā^eb^ti padahanatthāya. ^b^ayaṃ paṭhamo cetokhilo^eb^ti ayaṃ satthari vicikicchāsaṅkhāto ^a^P3.0325^ea^ paṭhamo cittassa thaddhabhāvo evametassa bhikkhuno appahīno hoti.

[03] ^b^dhamme^eb^ti pariyattidhamme ca paṭivedhadhamme ca. pariyattidhamme kaṅkhamāno ``tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassānīti vadanti, atthi nu kho etaṃ natthī''ti kaṅkhati. paṭivedhadhamme kaṅkhamāno ``vipassanānissando maggo nāma, magganissandaṃ phalaṃ nāma, sabbasaṅkhārapaṭinissaggo nibbānaṃ nāmāti vadanti, taṃ atthi nu kho natthī''ti kaṅkhati. ^b^saṅghe kaṅkhatī^eb^ti ``ujuppaṭipanno''tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vasena ``evarūpaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipanno cattāro maggaṭṭhā cattāro phalaṭṭhāti aṭṭhannaṃ puggalānaṃ samūhabhūto saṅgho nāma atthi nu kho natthī''ti kaṅkhati. ^b^sikkhāya^eb^ kaṅkhamāno ``adhisīlasikkhā nāma adhicittādhipaññāsikkhā nāmāti vadanti, sā atthi nu kho ^a^V3.0079^ea^ natthī''ti kaṅkhati. ^b^ayaṃ pañcamo^eb^ti ayaṃ sabrahmacārīsu kopasaṅkhāto pañcamo cittassa thaddhabhāvo kacavarabhāvo khāṇukabhāvo.

[03] 206^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^cetasovinibandhā^eb^ti cittaṃ vinibandhitvā muṭṭhiyaṃ katvā viya gaṇhantīti cetasovinibandhā. ^b^kāme^eb^ti vatthukāmepi kilesakāmepi. ^b^kāye^eb^ti ^a^M3.0078^ea^ attano kāye. ^b^rūpe^eb^ti bahiddhārūpe. ^b^yāvadattha^eb^nti yattakaṃ icchati, tattakaṃ. ^b^udarāvadehaka^eb^nti udarapūraṃ. tañhi udaraṃ avadehanato udarāvadehakanti vuccati. ^b^seyyasukha^eb^nti mañcapīṭhasukhaṃ, utusukhaṃ vā. ^b^passasukha^eb^nti ^a^P3.0326^ea^ yathā samparivattakaṃ sayantassa dakkhiṇapassa vāmapassānaṃ sukhaṃ hoti, evaṃ uppannasukhaṃ. ^b^middhasukha^eb^nti niddāsukhaṃ. ^b^anuyutto^eb^ti yuttappayutto viharati. ^b^paṇidhāyā^eb^ti patthayitvā. ^b^sīlenā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^sīla^eb^nti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ. ^b^vata^eb^nti vatasamādānaṃ. ^b^tapo^eb^ti tapacaraṇaṃ. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti methunavirati. ^b^devo vā bhavissāmī^eb^ti mahesakkhadevo vā bhavissāmi. ^b^devaññataro vā^eb^ti appesakkhadevesu vā aññataroti.

[03] 207-208^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^vātaṃ anulometī^eb^ti vātaṃ anulometvā harati. ^b^vatthiṃ sodhetī^eb^ti dhamaniyo suddhā karoti. ^b^āmāvasesaṃ pācetī^eb^ti sace āmāvasesakaṃ hoti, taṃ pāceti. aṭṭhame ^b^acakkhussa^eb^nti na cakkhūnaṃ hitaṃ, cakkhuṃ visuddhaṃ na karoti.

[03] 209^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^āyatakenā^eb^ti dīghena, paripuṇṇapadabyañjanakaṃ gāthāvattañca vināsetvā pavattena. ^b^sarakuttimpi nikāmayamānassā^eb^ti evaṃ gītassaro kātabboti sarakiriyaṃ patthayamānassa. ^b^samādhissa bhaṅgo hotī^eb^ti samathavipassanācittassa vināso hoti.

[03] 210^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^V3.0080^ea^ ^b^dukkhaṃ supatī^eb^ti nānāvidhaṃ supinaṃ passanto dukkhaṃ supati. ^b^dukkhaṃ paṭibujjhatī^eb^ti paṭibujjhantopi uttasitvā salomahaṃso paṭibujjhati. imasmiṃ sutte satisampajaññaṃ missakaṃ kathitaṃ.
[06] kimilavaggo paṭhamo.

[03] 211^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa ^a^M3.0079^ea^ ^a^P3.0327^ea^ paṭhame ^b^akkosakaparibhāsako^eb^ti dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosako, bhayadassanena paribhāsako. ^b^chinnaparipantho^eb^ti lokuttaraparipanthassa chinnattā chinnaparipantho. ^b^rogātaṅka^eb^nti rogoyeva kicchajīvikāyāvahanato rogātaṅko nāma.
[03] 212^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^adhikaraṇakārako^eb^ti catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ aññatarassa kārako. ^b^anadhigata^eb^nti pubbe appattavisesaṃ.

[03] 213^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^dussīlo^eb^ti asīlo nissīlo. ^b^sīlavipanno^eb^ti vipannasīlo bhinnasaṃvaro. ^b^pamādādhikaraṇa^eb^nti pamādakāraṇā. idañca suttaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ vasena āgataṃ, pabbajitānampi pana labbhateva ^a^V3.0081^ea^. gahaṭṭho hi yena yena sippaṭṭhānena jīvikaṃ kappeti, yadi kasiyā, yadi vaṇijjāya, pāṇātipātādivasena pamatto taṃ taṃ yathākālaṃ sampādetuṃ na sakkoti, athassa mūlaṃ vinassati. māghātakālepi pāṇātipātaṃ adinnādānādīni ca karonto daṇḍavasena mahatiṃ bhogajāniṃ nigacchati. pabbajito dussīlo pamādakāraṇā sīlato buddhavacanato jhānato sattāriyadhanato ca jāniṃ nigacchati. gahaṭṭhassa ``asuko asukakule jāto dussīlo pāpadhammo pariccattaidhalokaparaloko salākabhattamattampi na detī''ti catuparisamajjhe pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati. pabbajitassa ``asuko nāsakkhi sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ buddhavacanaṃ ^a^P3.0328^ea^ gahetuṃ, vejjakammādīhi jīvati, chahi agāravehi samannāgato''ti evaṃ abbhuggacchati.

[03] ^b^avisārado^eb^ti gahaṭṭho tāva ``avassaṃ bahūnaṃ sannipātaṭṭhāne koci mama kammaṃ jānissati, atha maṃ niggaṇhissanti vā, rājakulassa vā dassantī''ti sabhayo upasaṅkamati. ^b^maṅkubhūto^eb^ ca patitakkhandho adhomukho ^a^M3.0080^ea^ aṅguṭṭhakena bhūmiṃ kasanto nisīdati, visārado hutvā kathetuṃ na sakkoti. pabbajitopi ``bahū bhikkhū sannipatitā, avassaṃ koci mama kammaṃ jānissati, atha me uposathampi pavāraṇampi ṭhapetvā sāmaññā cāvetvā nikkaḍḍhissantī''ti sabhayo upasaṅkamati, visārado hutvā kathetuṃ na sakkoti. ekacco pana dussīlopi dappito viya carati, sopi ajjhāsayena maṅku hotiyeva.

[03] ^b^sammūḷho kālaṃ karotī^eb^ti tassa hi maraṇamañce nipannassa dussīlakammaṃ samādāya vattitaṭṭhānaṃ āpāthaṃ āgacchati. so ummīletvā idhalokaṃ passati, nimmīletvā paralokaṃ. tassa cattāro apāyā upaṭṭhahanti, sattisatena sīse pahariyamāno viya hoti. so ``vāretha vārethā''ti viravanto marati. tena vuttaṃ -- ``sammūḷho kālaṃ karotī''ti. pañcamapadaṃ uttānameva. ānisaṃsakathā vuttavipariyāyena veditabbā.
[03] 214^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^bahubhāṇismi^eb^nti paññāya aparicchinditvā bahuṃ bhaṇante. ^b^mantabhāṇismi^eb^nti ^a^P3.0329^ea^ mantā vuccati paññā, tāya paricchinditvā bhaṇante.
[03] 215^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^V3.0082^ea^ ^b^verabahulo^eb^ti puggalaverenapi akusalaverenapi bahuvero. ^b^vajjabahulo^eb^ti dosabahulo.
[03] 216^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^luddo^eb^ti dāruṇo kakkhaḷo. ^b^vippaṭisārī^eb^ti maṅkubhāvena samannāgato.
[03] 217^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^apāsādike^eb^ti apāsādikehi kāyakammādīhi samannāgate. ^b^pāsādike^eb^ti pasādāvahe parisuddhasamācāre. aṭṭhamanavamāni uttānatthāneva.

[03] 220^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^M3.0081^ea^ ^b^pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā madhurāya^eb^nti ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto cārikaṃ caramāno madhurānagaraṃ sampāpuṇitvā antonagaraṃ pavisituṃ ārabhi. athekā micchādiṭṭhikā yakkhinī acelā hutvā dve hatthe pasāretvā jivhaṃ nillāletvā dasabalassa purato aṭṭhāsi. satthā antonagaraṃ appavisitvā tatova nikkhamitvā vihāraṃ agamāsi. mahājano khādanīyabhojanīyañceva sakkārasammānañca ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ adāsi. satthā tassa nagarassa niggaṇhanatthāya imaṃ suttaṃ ārabhi. tattha ^b^visamā^eb^ti na samatalā. ^b^bahurajā^eb^ti vātapaharaṇakāle uddhatena rajakkhandhena pariyonaddhā viya hoti. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] akkosakavaggo dutiyo.

[03] 221^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa ^a^V3.0083^ea^ ^a^P3.0330^ea^ paṭhame ^b^anavatthacārika^eb^nti avavatthitacārikaṃ. ^b^sutaṃ na pariyodapetī^eb^ti yampissa sutaṃ atthi, taṃ pariyodapetuṃ na sakkoti. ^b^sutenekaccena avisārado hotī^eb^ti thokathokena sutena vijjamānenāpi ñāṇena somanassappatto na hoti. ^b^samavatthacāre^eb^ti samavatthitacāre. dutiyaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 223-224^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^bahubhaṇḍo^eb^ti bahuparikkhāro. ^b^bahubhesajjo^eb^ti sappinavanītādīnaṃ bahutāya bahubhesajjo. ^b^byatto^eb^ti byāsatto. ^b^saṃsaṭṭho^eb^ti pañcavidhena saṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho hutvā. ^b^ananulomikenā^eb^ti sāsanassa ananucchavikena. catutthe ^b^vaṇṇamaccharī^eb^ti guṇamaccharī. ^b^dhammamaccharī^eb^ti pariyattimaccharī.

[03] 225-226^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^M3.0082^ea^ ^b^anāmantacāre āpajjatī^eb^ti ``nimantito sabhatto samāno santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyyā''ti sikkhāpade (pārā0 294) vuttaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. ^b^raho nisajjāyā^eb^tiādīnipi tesaṃ tesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ vasena veditabbāni. chaṭṭhe ^b^ativela^eb^nti atikkantapamāṇakālaṃ. sattamaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V3.0084^ea^ ^b^ussūrabhatte^eb^ti atidivāpacanabhatte. ^b^na kālena paṭipūjentī^eb^ti yāgukāle yāguṃ, khajjakakāle khajjakaṃ ^a^P3.0331^ea^, bhojanakāle bhojanaṃ apacantā yuttappayuttakālassa atināmitattā na kālena paṭipūjenti, attano citteneva denti nāma. tato tepi tesu attano gehaṃ āgatesu tatheva karonti. kulapaveṇiyā āgatā balipaṭiggāhikā devatāpi yuttappayuttakālena lābhaṃ labhamānāyeva rakkhanti gopayanti pīḷaṃ akatvā. akāle labhamānā pana ``ime amhesu anādarā''ti ārakkhaṃ na karonti.

[01] samaṇabrāhmaṇāpi ``etesaṃ gehe bhojanavelāya bhojanaṃ na hoti, ṭhitamajjhanhike dentī''ti maṅgalāmaṅgalesu kātabbaṃ na karonti. ^b^vimukhā kammaṃ karontī^eb^ti ``pāto kiñci na labhāma, khudāya paṭipīḷitā kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkomā''ti kammaṃ vissajjetvā nisīdanti. ^b^anojavantaṃ hotī^eb^ti akāle bhuttaṃ ojaṃ harituṃ na sakkoti. sukkapakkho vuttavipallāsena veditabbo.

[03] 229^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^sabhīrū^eb^ti saniddo mahāniddaṃ niddāyati. ^b^sappaṭibhayo^eb^ti taṃ nissāya bhayaṃ uppajjati, tasmā sappaṭibhayo. ^b^mittadubbhī^eb^ti pānabhojanadāyakampi mittaṃ dubbhati hiṃsati. mātugāmepi eseva nayo.
[03] 230^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^M3.0083^ea^ ^b^ghoraviso^eb^ti kakkhaḷaviso. ^b^dujjivho^eb^ti dvidhā bhinnajivho. ^b^ghoravisatā^eb^ti ghoravisatāya. sesadvayepi eseva nayo.
[06] dīghacārikavaggo tatiyo.
[03] 231^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^V3.0085^ea^ ^a^P3.0332^ea^ paṭhame ^b^na ākappasampanno^eb^ti samaṇākappena sampanno. ^b^abhāvanīyo hotī^eb^ti vaḍḍhanīyo na hoti. dutiyaṃ uttānameva.
[03] 233^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^paṭibalo^eb^ti kāyabalena ca ñāṇabalena ca samannāgatattā paṭibalo.
[03] 234^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^khaṇḍaphulla^eb^nti patitaṭṭhānañca bhinnaṭṭhānañca. ^b^paṭisaṅkharotī^eb^ti paṭipākatikaṃ karoti. ^b^ārocetī^eb^ti idaṃ pavāritakulānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.

[03] 235^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^adhisīlesū^eb^ti pañcasu sīlesu. ^b^dhammadassane nivesetī^eb^ti catusaccadhammadassane patiṭṭhāpeti. ^b^arahaggata^eb^nti sabbasakkārānaṃ arahe ratanattayeva gataṃ, tīsu vatthūsu garucittīkāraṃ upaṭṭhapethāti attho. chaṭṭhaṃ uttānameva.
[03] 237^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^M3.0084^ea^ ^b^āvāsapaligedhī^eb^ti āvāsaṃ balavagiddhivasena gilitvā viya ṭhito. sesaṃ sabbaṃ uttānamevāti.
[06] āvāsikavaggo catuttho.

[03] 241^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa ^a^V3.0086^ea^ ^a^P3.0333^ea^ paṭhame ^b^duccarite sucarite^eb^ti idaṃ abhedato vuttaṃ, ^b^kāyaduccarite^eb^tiādi kāyadvārādīnaṃ vasena bhedato. ^b^saddhammā^eb^ti dasakusalakammapathadhammato. ^b^asaddhamme^eb^ti akusalakammapathasaṅkhāte assaddhamme.
[03] 249^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^sivathikāyā^eb^ti susāne. ^b^ārodanā^eb^ti ārodanaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^asucinā^eb^ti jigucchanīyena.
[03] 250^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^puggalappasāde^eb^ti ekapuggalasmiṃ uppannappasāde. ^b^ante nisīdāpetī^eb^ti bhikkhūnaṃ āsanapariyante nisīdāpeti. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] duccaritavaggo pañcamo.
[06] pañcamapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 251-253^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhassa ^a^M3.0085^ea^ ^a^V3.0087^ea^ paṭhame ^b^upasampādetabba^eb^nti upajjhāyena hutvā upasampādetabbaṃ. dutiye ^b^nissayo dātabbo^eb^ti ācariyena hutvā nissayo dātabbo. tatiye ^b^sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo^eb^ti upajjhāyena hutvā sāmaṇero gahetabbo. iti imāni tīṇipi suttāni paṭhamabodhiyaṃ khīṇāsavavasena vuttāni. catutthādīni anupadavaṇṇanāto uttānatthāneva.

[03] 272^b^.^eb^ bhattuddesakādīnaṃ ^a^P3.0334^ea^ vinicchayakathā samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ (cūḷava0 aṭṭha0 325) vuttanayena veditabbāti. ^b^sammato na pesetabbo^eb^ti pakatiyā sammato ``gaccha bhattāni uddisāhī''ti na pesetabbo.

[03] 273-285^b^.^eb^ ^b^sāṭiyaggāhāpako^eb^ti vassikasāṭikāya gāhāpako. ^b^pattaggāhāpako^eb^ti ``yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāya pattapariyanto, so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo''ti ettha vuttapattaggāhāpako.

[03] 293-302^b^.^eb^ ^b^ājīvako^eb^ti naggaparibbājako. ^b^nigaṇṭho^eb^ti purimabhāgappaṭicchanno. ^b^muṇḍasāvako^eb^ti nigaṇṭhasāvako. ^b^jaṭilako^eb^ti tāpaso. ^b^paribbājako^eb^ti channaparibbājako. ^b^māgaṇḍikā^eb^dayopi titthiyā eva. etesaṃ pana sīlesu paripūrakāritāya abhāvena sukkapakkho na gahito. sesamettha uttānamevāti.
[06] manorathapūraṇiyā aṅguttaranikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] pañcakanipātassa saṃvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
